string.name: desc
string.value: Your piratical tenacity instills you with the boons of damage reduction and improved stats.\nThis Link Skill can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate job character you have on this world. While this skill is active, the STR and DEX values for your equipment will be swapped. (Excludes stats for weapon, secondary weapon, Arcane Symbol, Sacred Symbol, and pet equipment slots.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Marks enemies struck by your Blast skill with a Divine Brand. Upon reaching the max number of stacks, Divine Brands detonate, inflicting additional damage that ignores some of the enemy's Defense. Blasts from party members under the effect of Divine Echo do not grant additional Divine Brand stacks.\nRequired Skill: #cBlast Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: Each time an enemy is struck by your Blast skill, they receive a stack of Divine Brand.\n#cDivine Brand Max Duration#: #time sec. When Divine Brand stacks #x times, an explosion deals #u% damage #w times to up to #v enemies. Explosion damage receives Ignore Defense +#ignoreMobpdpR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Holy Power]#\nAllows you to summon a more powerful divine hammer. Enhances the damage and range of Divine Charge. Divine Mark can be used at regular intervals. When Divine Mark is used, a brand of light appears at the target location, and detonates after a set period, striking enemies in a wide area. This explosion deals additional damage to normal enemies. Divine Mark explosions aren't triggered by party members affected by Divine Echo.\nRequired Skill: #cDivine Charge Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: #cDivine Mark# MP Cost: #mpCon. Cooldown: #cooltime sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Damage: #damage%. Number of Attacks: #attackCount. string.name: desc

Additionally, your deepened connection with the Evil Eye enhances Evil Eye Shock.\nYour Evil Eye's attacks will not cause you to take damage from attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cEvil Eye Shock II Lv. 20#

When the Dark Knight personally attacks, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #cWhen your HP reaches 0,# your dark contract keeps you alive,#c granting invincibility# based on the type selected in Accept Final Pact. Additionally, if you eliminate and successfully attack the required number of monsters for a set period of time after invincibility ends, cooldown will be reduced until the next contract.\nNot affected by cooldown reset. When HP is above a certain amount, permanently increases Final Damage, Speed, Critical Rate, and Critical Damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a poison-attribute totem, which spreads a toxic pool over the map horizontally. The pool cannot spread beyond the edge of a platform, but is highly combustible. If you cast fire magic over a toxic pool shortly after it is created, it will detonate, yielding a massive explosion. These explosions can also detonate neighboring toxic pools.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Totem Duration: #time
Summons a totem that transforms the surrounding area into a toxic pool which deals #dot% every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec to enemies within that pool.
#cCreeping Toxin Explosion#: MP Cost: #attackDelay. Chain explosions initiated by Creeping Toxin Explosion do not consume MP. Toxic pools can be detonated for 1.5 sec after they appear, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies. That explosion will detonate any other nearby toxic pools.
An enemy damaged by chain explosions, taking place within #t sec. of one another, takes #u2% less Final Damage from all explosions after the first.
Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#nbdR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flammable toxin that is highly combustible. Creates a massive explosion when detonated.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your maneuverability by enhancing the range of Teleport.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.\nRequired Skill: #cTeleport Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Teleport Distance: Horizontal +#x, Vertical +#y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores a portion of enemy Defense when attacking. Damage dealt increases with consecutive attacks. Stacks up to 5 times.

string.name: h
string.value: Ignores #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemy DEF. Successful attacks have a #prop% chance to increase your damage by #x% for #time sec (excludes minion damage).\nThis effect stacks up to #y times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Magic Attack and increases the duration of all buffs on you. Also permanently increases Knockback Resistance.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently Increased Magic ATT: +#madX, Buff Duration: +#bufftimeR%, Knockback Resistance: +#stanceProp%

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon meteors from the sky to attack a single enemy.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Summons meteors from the sky to deal a powerful fire attack to multiple enemies. Targets continue to take fire damage over time.

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.value: Increases the effect of Elemental Drain.

string.name: h
string.value: Increases the Final Damage of each damage-over-time effect inflicted by your skills by #x%

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases duration of Poison Mist damage over time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Poison Mist's damage over time damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Flame Sweep.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases damage over time for Flame Sweep.

string.value: Increases the damage for Mist Eruption.

string.name: desc
string.value: Boosts the DEF ignored by Mist Eruption.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the stats of all party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases all stats assigned APs by #x% for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Gather power to form an energy vortex, culminating in a powerful #cFire# explosion that damages the target. Chance to apply more damage over time.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Poison Mist's continuous damage. Upon using the skill, nearby Poison Mists explode, dealing fatal poison damage to enemies. The damage will increase proportional to the number of continuous damage effects applied to the target. You cannot detonate Mists set by others.\nNot affected by cooldown resets. If the mist explodes successfully, the cooldown of Flame Haze will reset.\nRequired Skill: #cPoison Mist Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Number of Explosions: #q, Ignore Defense: +#ignoreMobpdpR%. Final Damage Modifier: +20% for 2 explosions, +45% for 3 explosions, +80% for 4 explosions, +125% for 5 explosions. Max Simultaneous Mist Explosions: #y. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.\nMist Eruption's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds upon striking an enemy with 5 or more explosions. This cooldown reduction applies before other cooldown reductions.\n#c[Passive Effect]# Permanently increases Poison Mist's continuous damage to #x%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lets you use skills without spending MP by concentrating and drawing out unlimited mana. Also continually recovers HP and MP and increases the damage of all Magic Attacks.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Periodically restores your base HP and MP by #y%.
Increases Final Damage by #q% during the buff. Periodically increases Final Damage by #damage%, can increase up to #w%, Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Mana swirls around the character when #w2% remains of the final buff duration (accounting for duration-enhancing effects).
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a fire ifrit that attacks multiple enemies for a short time. Also permanently increases mastery. This skill isn't affected by enemy damage reflection skills.\n#cLevel 30 required to learn Elemental Fury.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Ifrit Summon Duration: #time sec.\nDamage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec. for #dotTime sec.\n[Passive Effect: Permanently increases Mastery by #mastery%]

string.name: desc
string.value: A fire-attribute attack. Sweeps the area in front of you with a powerful flame. Enemies struck by the flame are burned and take continuous damage. (Some enemies can resist this attack.)

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount\nBurn Duration: #time sec., Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec.

string.value: Surrounds multiple enemies with fire to temporarily paralyze them while inflicting heavy damage. Paralyzed enemies take continuous damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon meteorites from the sky to inflict intense fire damage against multiple enemies.#c Your attack skills permanently have a chance to summon a meteorite, which falls on a single enemy to inflict damage# (excludes Inferno Aura).

string.name: desc
string.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Magic ATT. Duration of all the buffs applicable to self will increase upon using skill.\nAn #cOn/Off skill# that is activated when the skill is used and deactivated when the skill is used again.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increases magic ATT by #madX. Buff duration increased by #x% upon using skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cSurrounds enemies with burning poisonous mist to make them untouchable# while slowing them down with continuous damage. Also forms Poison Mist clouds where the skill strikes enemies, or around you if no enemies are struck.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage on a Single Target: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, inflicts #dot% continuous damage at #prop% chance for #dotTime sec. #cMaintains untouchable status and slows enemy by #x%#. Upon hitting enemy, the Poison Mist forms on enemy location. If no enemy is hit, the Poison Mist forms on your location\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a blue flame that burns the enemy to the very soul. After burning and enemy, the blue flame spreads to a set number additional targets. Blue flame will first target any boss monsters within the area, starting with the boss with the highest HP. Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Attack Reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Blue Flames: #bulletCount
Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Blue flame splits after hitting the enemy, generating #v2 additional flames. Up to #x flames can be generated, including the original flame.
When multiple blue flames strike a single enemy, Final Damage decreases by #u% for subsequent flames.
Enemies burned by the blue flame take #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lets you use skills without spending MP by concentrating and drawing out unlimited mana. Also continually recovers HP and MP and increases the damage of all Magic Attacks.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Periodically restores your base HP and MP by #y%.
Increases Final Damage by #q% during the buff. Periodically increases Final Damage by #damage%, can increase up to #w%, Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Mana swirls around the character when #w2% remains of the final buff duration (accounting for duration-enhancing effects).
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons Elquines for a short time. Elquines can attack multiple enemies at once. Attacks from Elquines freeze enemies and do not trigger damage reflection. Learning the Elquines skill grants a permanent increase to Spell Mastery\nRequired skill: #cSpell Mastery Lv. 10 or above#

string.value: Summons spears of ice from the sky, showering multiple enemies with a nasty blizzard to freeze them. Upon attacking, permanently grants #ca chance to damage single a enemy with a Blizzard#.

string.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

string.value: Permanently increases Magic ATT. Duration of all the buffs applicable to self will increase upon using skill.\nAn #cOn/Off skill# that is activated when the skill is used and deactivated when the skill is used again.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ice-attribute attack. Freeze yourself and your enemies with cold, powerful air #cto stun them and continually reduce their Defense#.\nEnemies hit by this skill will resist any further stuns for 90 seconds.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, makes you invincible. Stuns up to #mobCount enemies and inflicts #damage% damage #attackCount times for #time sec. Reduce enemy #cMagic DEF by #w% and Weapon DEF by #v%#.
Stun Duration: +100%, depending on damage inflicted with Freezing Breath.
Only inflicts damage to stunned enemies.
This effect lasts as long as you hold down the key, up to #q sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Create and throw a Frozen Orb that fires ice shards everywhere to deal ice damage. The orb slows significantly when it encounters an enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value: Significantly increases the movement range of Teleport. Cannot be used with Teleport Boost.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off# with the skill key.\nRequired Skill: #cTeleport Mastery Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a large, unstable sphere of electricity to continuously zap enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

Hold the skill key down to cast continuously for up to #t sec. Inflicts a final attack dealing up to #x% damage #w times based on the time channeled.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Envelops party members in a shield of cold. Activating the skill while pressing the Down Arrow key while it is in effect will conjure a rapidly swirling icy vortex. Enemies within the vortex freeze more quickly.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off# with the skill key.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon per second. Grants Status Resistance: +#z, Elemental Resistance: +#w% and Damage Taken: -#y% to you and nearby party members.

Freezes up to #mobCount enemies periodically.
#cVortex#: Duration: #u sec. Allies within the vortex receive the effects of Absolute Zero Aura for the vortex's duration, even if they weren't nearby when Absolute Zero Aura was first cast, or if Absolute Zero Aura has since been toggled Off. Enemies within the vortex freeze more quickly.
Vortex Cooldown: #q sec.

Chalice Duration: #q sec, +#q2 sec per #s2 INT you possess.
Party members recover #u2% of HP upon using the Holy Water. Their HP Recovery is increased by #w2% per #dot INT your possess (this bonus is additive).

string.name: desc
string.value:
Shoot an arrow at a high angle. If you press and hold the skill key, you will fire continuously. While firing,#c press Up or Down to control the force of the shot#.
While casting the skill, press the Interact/Harvest key to set up an Arrow Blaster--which fires arrows automatically--at your location. With Action Customization enabled, you can set up the Arrow Blaster by pressing the attack key, instead of the Interact/Harvest key.
Unaffected by attack reflection.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. While casting, use the Interact/Harvest key to set up Arrow Blaster, firing arrows that deal #v% damage for #u sec.\nCooldown for installed Arrow Blaster: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fire arrows fast enough to leave afterimages.
After striking enemies with enough arrow-based attacks, creates afterimages that fires enemy-seeking arrows before vanishing. These arrows target a single enemy in front of the afterimage and damage any foes pierced on the way to the target. Arrow Blaster turret placement attacks don't count toward this skill's prerequisites.
Empowers Wind Arrow.
Can be toggled #cOn/Off.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. After successfully striking enemies #u times with arrow-based attacks, creates #w afterimages that fire an arrow towards an enemy ahead of them.

Every #u2 hits with Arrow Blaster, Hurricane, Silhouette Mirage, Inhuman Speed, Quiver Barrage, and Storm of Arrows count as 1 successful arrow-based strike.
Fired arrows pierce up to #mobCount enemies and deal #damage% damage #attackCount times on the way to its intended target.

Cooldown: #cooltime sec

#c[Passive Effect]# Increases Wind Arrow's Range and Damage by #damPlus%p.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Further enhances the strength of your Empowered Arrows.
Striking an enemy with Piercing Arrow or Snipe upgrades their next use to Empowered Piercing Arrow or Empowered Snipe, respectively. Empowered Piercing Arrow is enhanced to Empowered Piercing Arrow II.
Striking an enemy with Empowered skills grants you the Marked Target buff, which is unaffected by duration increases. Permanently increases Final Damage and Ignore Defense.
Required Skill: #cEmpowered Arrows Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: #cEmpowered Piercing Arrow II#: MP Cost: #mpCon. Pierces up to #mobCount enemies, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times. Explodes at end trajectory, dealing #x% damage #u times to up to #y enemies. #cEmpowered Snipe#: MP Cost: #w. Deals #z% damage #v times with +#s2% Ignore DEF and +100% Critical Rate. Enemies struck will be afflicted with a Double Tap debuff for #dot sec. Using Snipe on an enemy with the Double Tap debuff deals #u2% additional damage #v times. #cMarked Target#: Final Damage +#w2% for #time sec, Ignore Monster DEF: +#q2%. #c[Passive Effect] Final Damage +#pdR%, Ignore DEF: +#ignoreMobpdpR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that zeroes in on targets within range. Guided shots target the boss with the highest HP first if there is a boss within range, and are unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Cardinal Deluge Amplification.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to use the Double Jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# Double-tap the up arrow key to jump again while in mid-air. Double-tap the down arrow key to descend more quickly. If you use Action Customization, you can move up in the air with the up arrow and jump keys, and descend with the down arrow and jump keys.\n#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, allows you to jump a greater distance

string.name: desc
string.value: Gathers energy in the relic through combat. The use of a Cardinal Force skill will cause the relic's emblem to shift, and a successful hit will add to the gauge.\nUsing #cAncient Force# skills will consume the built-up gauge. After using a Cardinal Force skill, you can chain other Cardinal Force or #cAncient Force# skills together, allowing them to be used more quickly.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Maximum Charge: #u\nAttacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill charges the relic gauge by #y, and by #x for every guided arrow of Cardinal Deluge that hits an enemy.\nIf a different Cardinal Force skill is used next, the cooldown for all Ancient Force skills will be reduced by #t, except for the 5th Job Advancement skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases power built up in the relic through continuous combat to further weaken the effects of the Ancient Curse.

string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nEnhances the Cardinal Deluge skill.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Advanced Cardinal Force#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that launches an explosive arrow of condensed energy that flies straight ahead. The arrow will detonate when it hits an enemy or reaches its maximum range. \n#cLevel 20 required to learn Cardinal Burst Boost.#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies: #u, Damage: #v%, Attack Count: #w, when the arrow explodes.

string.value: Manifests the power stored within the relic to call forth magical arrows that chase and attack enemies in range for a set amount of time.\nThese magical arrows target the boss with the highest HP first, and are not affected by attack reflection skills.\nRequired skill: #cCardinal Deluge Amplification Lv. 5 or above#

string.name: h
string.value: When using Cardinal Burst while the relic displays the Deluge emblem, there is a #prop% chance to create #bulletCount magical arrows.\nThese magical arrows will chase and attack nearby enemies for #time sec, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Cardinal Force]#
An archery technique used to achieve high mobility. Release Swiftstrike Energy stored in your weapon as a short burst of speed that propels you to your destination, then swing your weapon to attack nearby enemies.
You can use the directional keys to move left, right, or up with this skill. If used without directional input, you will swing your weapon at your current location.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Advanced Cardinal Force#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge\nDeals #v% damage #w times to up to #u nearby enemies.\nYou gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #s2 sec, and can store up to a maximum of #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Manifests the power stored within the relic to call forth magical arrows that chase and attack enemies in range.\nThese magical arrows target the boss with the highest HP first, and are not affected by attack reflection skills.\nRequired skill: #cCardinal Burst Boost Lv. 5 or above#

string.name: h
string.value: When using Cardinal Deluge while the relic displays the Burst emblem, there is a #prop% chance to create #bulletCount magical arrows.\nThese magical arrows will chase nearby enemies for #time sec and explode on contact, dealing #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chance to dodge enemy attacks. If you succeed, attacks you land in the next second will result in Critical Hits. Also increases Knockback Resistance permanently.

string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value: Each time the Relic Gauge has been filled up by #x, your Final Damage is increased by #indiePMdR% for #time sec.\nRestores HP & MP by #y% when activated.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Max HP by #mhpR% and Final Damage by #pdR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase your combat ability by further perfecting your archery fundamentals.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls forth a dark-elemental Raven for a period of time. The summoned Raven can attack up to 4 enemies at once.\nThe Raven's attacks cannot be reflected by attack reflection skills. In addition, permanently increases your Defense.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summon a Raven for #time sec. Deals #damage% damage to up to 4 enemies at once.\n[Passive Effect: Increases your Defense by #pddR%]

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Ancient Force]#
Leap up and fire 3 explosive arrows downward. These arrows will explode when they come in contact with an enemy, or when they reach their maximum range.
If you are already airborne, the arrows will be fired immediately without the leap.
Permanently increases Normal Enemy Damage of Swarm Shot.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Explosions deal #u% damage #w times to up to #v enemies.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effect - Swarm Shot Normal Enemy Damage: +#nbdamPlus% points]

string.name: desc
string.value: Your growing resilience to the curse grants you the ability to resist abnormal status ailments for a set amount of time.\nAny status ailment received while this buff is active will further increase your status resistance. Permanently increases both your status resistance and all elemental resistances.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, increases Status Resistance by #s for #time sec. If afflicted by an abnormal status while this skill, Status Resistance will be increased by #x, and can be stacked up to #y times.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Status Resistance by #asrR and all Elemental Resistances by #terR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: With the relic finally made whole, its flow of energy has become more stable and potent, allowing you to enhance #cEnchant Force# skills with the power of the Cardinal Force.\nThe currently-displayed emblem determines the characteristics of #cEnchant Force# skills, and will be reset after an #cEnchant Force# skill is used.\nAfter using a Cardinal Force skill, you can chain #cEnchant Force# skills to use them in quick succession.

string.name: h
string.value: The Relic Gauge is charged by #y when attacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill, and by #x per hit from Cardinal Deluge's guided arrows.\nThe Shadow Raven will charge the Relic Gauge by #s for each enemy hit by its attacks. When you use another Cardinal Force skill, all Ancient Force and Enchant Force skills will have their cooldowns reduced by #w sec, except for 5th Job Advancement skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Overcoming the Ancient Curse allows you to turn its debilitating effects on your foes in battle.\nBow skills will inflict the curse on enemies, and the Shadow Raven will focus its attention on enemies with the curse when summoned.

string.name: h
string.value: Using certain skills will inflict enemies with the Ancient Curse debuff, which lasts for #time sec and can be stacked up to #x times.\nSkills that utilize the Ancient Bow deal an increased #y% Critical Damage to enemies for each stack of the curse debuff currently afflicting them.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances all Cardinal Force skills with the power of the restored Relic.

string.name: h
string.value:
When using Cardinal Force skills, MP Cost: #mpCon
#cCardinal Deluge#
Fires an arrow that deals #v% damage to up to #u enemies #w times.
Fires 1 additional arrow if a boss is within range. The additional arrow targets the boss with the highest HP first.
Bountiful Deluge Normal Enemy Damage: +#nbdR%
#cCardinal Burst#
An exploding arrow deals #y% damage to up to #x enemies #z times.
Bountiful Burst Normal Enemy Damage: +#s
#cCardinal Torrent#
Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge. Deals #u2% damage #v2 times to up to #s2 nearby enemies. You gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #w2 sec up to a maximum of #q. You cannot be pushed back while casting, and each enemy hit will receive 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that zeroes in on targets within range. The damage from the guided shots fired with this skill cannot be reflected.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Fires an arrow that deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times. If a boss monster is within the attack's range, fires #z additional arrows.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique that launches an explosive arrow of condensed energy that flies straight ahead. The arrow will detonate when it hits an enemy or reaches its maximum range.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies: #u, Damage: #v%, Attack Count: #w, when the arrow explodes.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cardinal Force]#\nAn archery technique used to achieve high mobility. Release Swiftstrike Energy stored in your weapon as a short burst of speed that propels you to your destination, then swing your weapon to attack nearby enemies.\nYou can use the directional keys to move left, right, or up with this skill. If used without directional input, you will swing your weapon at your current location.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge
Deals #v% damage #w times to up to #u nearby enemies.
1 You gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #s2 sec, and can store up to a maximum of #y.
You cannot be pushed back by enemy attacks while casting the skill, and each enemy hit by it will receive 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: Expands the power stored within the relic to hex your arrows with the curse's energy when using Deluge and Burst of Cardinal and Enchant skills. Permanently increases Attack Power.\nRequired Skill: #cCardinal Torrent Lv. 20 or above#

string.name: h
string.value: When using Cardinal Force and Enchant Force skills with the Deluge or Burst emblems, your attack has a #prop% chance to apply 1 stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nPermanently increases your Attack Power by #padR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Train in the forgotten techniques of the ancient archers to enhance your combat ability.

string.name: h
string.value: Bountiful Deluge Damage: +#u%p, Bountiful Burst Damage: +#v%p\nSwarm Shot First Arrow Damage: +#x%p, Additional Magical Arrows' Damage: +#y%p\nFinal Damage of Ancient Force and Enchant Force Skills: +#pdR%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your Ancient Bow Mastery, Attack Power, and Critical Damage.\nRequired Skill: #cAncient Bow Mastery Lv. 10#

string.value: Ancient Bow Mastery: +#mastery%. Attack Power: +#x, Critical Damage: +#criticaldamage%

string.name: desc
string.value: Greatly increases your DEX and Avoidability, and reduces damage taken. Also increases Knockback Resistance permanently.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Ancient Force]#\nCall forth spears of dark energy imbued with the power of the Ancient Curse to attacks nearby enemies.\nDeals greater damage to enemies afflicted with the Ancient Curse debuff. This skill can be cast while using other skills.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount. Final Damage increased by #x% per stack of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Attack nearby enemies with your bow, then let loose a magical arrow to attack enemies in a wider range.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Increases the magical arrow's effective range.
#cBurst Enhancement#
The bow attack will deal a powerful strike to a single enemy.
#cTorrent Enhancement#
The bow attack inflicts additional stacks of the Ancient Curse debuff on enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon. Bow attack deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, inflicting #x stack(s) of the Ancient Curse debuff.\nArrow attack deals #v% damage to up to #u enemies #w times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nAttack nearby enemies with your bow, then let loose a magical arrow to attack enemies in a wider range.\nFocuses power into the bow attack to deal a powerful close-range blow.

string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Instantly fills the Relic Gauge to its maximum capacity. The amount charged counts toward the activation of Guidance of the Ancients.\nFor #time sec, #x additional magical arrows will be created when Bountiful Deluge and Bountiful Burst are used, and the time required to generate a unit of Swiftstrike Energy is reduced to #u sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Manifest arrows like those spoken of in legend to rain destruction upon your foes.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Creates additional magical arrows when an enemy is hit.
#cBurst Enhancement#
Take aim at an enemy and loose an arrow with maximum destructive power.
#cTorrent Enhancement#
Grants the ability to attack while moving.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon per sec. Hold down the key to continuously attack up to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount times. \n#cThis skill will end early if the Relic gauge doesn't have enough points.# \nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nManifest arrows like those spoken of in legend to rain destruction upon your foes.\nEach enemy hit has a chance to generate additional magical arrows that attack nearby enemies. The magical arrows target the boss with the highest HP first.

string.name: h
string.value:
Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon per sec. Hold down the key to continuously attack up to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount times. Has a #z% chance to create #w magical arrows that attack #v times, dealing #u% damage.
While channeling this skill, damage taken from enemy attacks (including attacks that deal a fixed percentage of damage) is reduced by #indieDamReduceR%. 
#cThis skill will end early if the Relic gauge doesn't have enough points.# 
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nManifest arrows like those spoken of in legend to rain destruction upon your foes.\nUse the Up and Down arrow keys to control the firing angle. The arrow will detonate upon contact with the enemy or at the end of its range.

string.value:
Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon per sec. Hold down the key to intermittently fire arrows at the designated angle. The arrows' explosions deal #u2% damage, #v2 times, to up to #s2 enemies. The first arrow fired with this skill cannot be angled and is fired straight ahead.
While channeling this skill, damage taken from enemy attacks (including attacks that deal a fixed percentage of damage) is reduced by #indieDamReduceR%. 
#cThis skill will end early if the Relic gauge doesn't have enough points.# 
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

While Dark Sight is active, you can deactivate it either by using another skill or by pressing the Dark Sight skill key again. Note that certain movement skills will not cancel Dark Sight. Upon deactivating Dark Sight, its cooldown will vary according to damage dodged in proportion to your to Max HP.

Chance of Advanced Dark Sight increased within Smokescreen's range. In addition, enemies inside the Smokescreen will take more critical damage.\nYou are immune to knockback while casting Smokescreen, and Dark Sight will not deactivate upon casting.

string.name: desc
string.value: Awakens the Shadower's merciless instincts to increase Attack and ignore enemy DEF. As a passive effect, this skill allows you to rack up a Body Count with each attack, which can be used to further enhance your other attacks.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#x, additional #kp each point of Body Count (uses entire Body Count).\n[Passive Effects: Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Accumulate Body Count points upon attack]

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Awakens the Shadower's instinct to increase Attack.

string.name: desc
string.value: Attack an enemy's vital points over and over to deal tremendous damage. Cast the Assassinate skill once more after the first strike to deal a finishing blow. After the final blow, you will no longer be hidden. Also, you can deal a stronger final blow of Assassinate if you have the Murderous Intent buff. The Murderous Intent buff is consumed when enemy is hit. Targets the enemy with the highest HP first. During the use of this skill, no enemy attack can knock you back.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: #attackCount. Press the skill key once more to deal #s% damage #q times as the final blow.\nFinal Damage increases by #s2% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.

string.name: desc
string.value: Inflicts a brutal stab with the dagger. Pick Pocket's Meso drop rate is halved for this skill. Permanently increases Final Damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drops coins branded with an Assassin's Mark. Enhances Meso Explosion. Using Meso Explosion while this skill is active grants the Murderous Intent buff which enhances your next Assassinate's final blow. Pick Pocket and Bloody Money cannot be active at the same time. Mesos created with Blood Money will attack the boss with the highest HP first when detonated with Meso Explosion. Permanently increases Luck and Critical Damage. Unaffected by Combat Orders.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: h
string.value:

Move rapidly by double-tapping, and then holding, Left or Right.

If you input this command when you cannot activate Advanced Dash, Dash will activate instead.
[Dash Activation: Right-Right or Left-Left]

string.name: desc
string.value:
Call upon the power of the Sea Serpent that lies sleeping below the waves.
Your fighting skills periodically invoke the Sea Serpent's power to attack nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.
Can be toggled #cOn/Off#.
#cUnlocks Greater Sea Serpent I at Level 20.#

string.name: h
string.value: While #cactive#, your fighting skills trigger Sea Serpent skills. When a Sea Serpent skill triggers, #mpCon MP is consumed. Sea Serpent skills share a cooldown and cannot trigger while that cooldown is active.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.value: #c[Sea Serpent Skill]# Attack enemies in front of you with the Sea Serpent's shockwave.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances your connection with the Sea Serpent's power, allowing you to conjure a more powerful shockwave. Activates upon using fighting skills (excluding Octopunch) and isn't affected by cooldown reset effects.\nRequired Skill: #cSea Serpent Lv. 20#\n#cUnlocks Greater Sea Serpent II at Level 20.#

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value:
Using Sea Serpent skills generates Sea Serpent Scales which can be consumed to use even more powerful abilities.
Each Sea Serpent Skill generates one#c Serpent Scale# upon use.
Consume 5 Serpent Scales to enter Assault Mode, allowing you to harness more of the serpent's power. While in Assault Mode, your fighting skills trigger Assault skills instead of Sea Serpent skills. Assault Mode ends upon using 1 Assault skill. Assault Mode's duration is unaffected by buff duration extensions.
In Auto Mode, Serpent Scales are automatically consumed upon collecting 5 scales.
#cAuto Mode On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value: Mp Cost: #mpCon, consume #u Serpent Scales and be able to use assault skills for #time sec.\nGet 1 Serpent Stone on each Serpent Skill use. Max Serpent Stones: #u.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cosmic]#\nUses the dormant power in the orbs to create a meteor shower zone that continuously attacks the surroundings for a set time. Consumes all cosmic orbs upon use, and duration increases based on the number of cosmic orbs consumed. Cosmic Shower can be used without casting motion during Solar Slash, Luna Divide, and Styx Crossing. The duration of Cosmic Shower doesn't increase with the summons duration increase, and is unaffected by attack reflection. The attack count increase effect of Falling Moon doesn't apply.\nRequired Skill: #cSoul Element Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Cosmic]#
Releases cosmic orbs to attack. Consumes all cosmic orbs upon use, and decreases cooldown based on the number of cosmic orbs consumed. Cosmic Burst can be used without casting motion during Solar Slash, Luna Divide, and Styx Crossing. The released cosmic orbs target the boss with the highest HP first, and is unaffected by attack reflection. Cosmic Burst is not affected by effects which reset or reduce cooldown.
In Auto Mode, Cosmic Burst is used automatically when it's not on cooldown and cosmic orb is at max, upon landing Solar Slash, Luna Divide, or Styx Crossing.
Required Skill: #cSoul Element Lv. 10#
#cAuto Mode On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: desc
string.value: Hide in the shadows for a short time. While Dark Sight is active, you cannot be hit by enemies, but attacking will reveal you. The cooldown will change when Dark Sight is deactivated, depending on damage dodged. Using Shadow Jump does not deactivate Dark Sight. Press the skill key again to deactivate Dark Sight.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, hides in the shadows for #time seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: #cooltime seconds. Stacks up to #y times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Quickly move backwards.\nYou can #cmove in the air and during the last attack of throwing skills#, and cannot be pushed back when moving. If you've learned Dark Sight and used it during the last attack of a throwing skill, Dark Sight will be activated automatically for a short time.\nSP is not required for this skill, and it can be used #cupon job advancing to Night Walker.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Allows you to move a certain distance backwards.\nUsing during throwing skills will cause you to enter Dark Sight state for #q sec.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP while the triggered Dark Sight is active, its remaining duration will be reduced by #w% of the full duration.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use while in the middle of a jump to jump twice in a row. Can also be used with the Jump Key.
Also, the #clast attack of throwing skills# can be canceled with the Jump Key. If you've learned Dark Sight and used the Jump Key during the last attack of a throwing skill, Dark Sight will be activated automatically for a short time.
With Action Customization enabled, hold the right or left arrow key while pressing the skill key to jump in the corresponding direction, otherwise you will jump in place.
SP is not required for this skill, and it can be used #cupon job advancing to Night Walker.#
#cAction Customization On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\nUsing the Jump Key during throwing skills will cause you to enter Dark Sight state for #q sec.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP while the triggered Dark Sight is active, its remaining duration will be reduced by #w% of the full duration.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a Shadow Bat, which occasionally attacks when you do. Its attack rate is doubled against enemies marked with Darkness, and as many summoned bats attack as there are marks. 1 additional Shadow Bat is created at this time.
This skill is unaffected by enemy attack reflection skills. Cannot be used at the same time as Ravenous Bat. It's a dark-attribute attack.
This skill can be #ctoggled on/off# by using the skill key.
Required Skill: #cDark Elemental Lv. 1#
#cLevel 20 required to learn Bat Affinity.#

string.name: h
string.value: Summons a Shadow Bat for #w sec for every #z times that you hit with a Throwing Star skill. Max number of bats: #y.\nWhen using a Throwing Star skill, there is a #prop% chance for it to fly towards the target and inflict #damage% damage, then bounce off #mobCount enemies and inflict the same amount of damage before disappearing. Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#nbdR%\nRecovers #x% of Max HP on first damage.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Surge forward like ocean waves to sweep up enemies in range. (Some monsters can resist the sweep effect).
Can be canceled by holding the down key and pressing the skill key while surging forward. Can be linked with all skills, excluding Thunder and itself. The wave activates by canceling the skill that was used first. Some skills can link faster with Tidal Crash than other skills. Tidal Crash doesn't generate Lightning Charge.
With Action Customization enabled, you can cancel the skill by pressing its key again, without use of the arrow keys.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Swathes you in a curtain of cards to teleport long distances.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Use directional keys to teleport\n(Arrows shown only for the directions you can go)\nNumber of directional keys you can enter: #z, Each movement you make after the skill ends increases the cooldown by #cooltimeMS seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Steals the skills of Explorer characters nearby. Certain skills cannot be stolen, and Bishop's Heal will have its cooldown increased.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Shifts to steal mode upon use\nMove the mouse cursor to select the nearby Explorer character

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to manage skills stolen from other Explorer characters. Use this skill to forget stolen skills or call them up with Impeccable Memory. Skills may be assigned to an Impeccable Memory slot of the same rank or higher. Skills cannot be used immediately after being assigned.

string.name: h
string.value: Manage stolen skills. 30 second cooldown added.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks with Carte Blanc #u times. Grants one of the following effects for #time sec:\n#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%\n#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks enemies with Carte Noir #u times. Also grants one of the following effects for #time sec.
#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%
#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%
#cEndurance Card:# Abnormal Status Resistance +#x, Elemental Resistance +#y
#cDrain Card:# #z% of Max HP recovered when attacking

string.name: desc
string.value: Skill used exclusively in Phantom's tutorial.\nUse this skill to avoid being detected by the guards. #cYou will be detected if you collide with a guard.#

string.value: Skill used exclusively in Phantom's tutorial.\nDivert a guards attention with a little bit of coin.

string.name: h
string.value: Tosses Mesos to distract a guard

string.name: desc
string.value: Learn a Link Skill from another character within the world or remove the Link Skill that you currently learned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Judgment Draw can be set to either Auto Mode or Manual Mode. Double-click to switch between the two.

string.name: h
string.value: #cAuto Mode#: Automatically activates the Judgment Draw skill when your deck is full.\n#cManual Mode#: Judgment Draw must be used manually, even if your deck is empty.

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nTemporarily increases your Speed and Jump.

string.value: MP Cost: 50, Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10, Duration: 200 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nCreates a portal that leads to the nearest town. You (and only you) can use it multiple times until it disappears. Press Up arrow key to use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nAllows you to locate an enemy's weak spot to deal fatal damage to that enemy.

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP.

string.value: MP Cost: 80, Max HP and Max MP: +40%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, DEF: +425, Max HP: +475, Max MP: +475, Duration 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You learn how to use potions more efficiently to resolve supply shortage issues.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill your light gauge completely to gain bonus damage with light magic. Each light magic attack will also restore some HP.

string.name: h
string.value: Light skills deal an additional hit dealing 50% of Final Damage and restoring 1% of your base HP per cast.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill your dark gauge completely to gain bonus damage with dark magic. Dark magic uses 0 MP.\n#cCharacter Appearance Change On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value: Dark skills deal an additional hit proportional to the number of attacks that is 50% of final damage and use 0 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of light breaks down enemy DEF, allowing your attacks to penetrate.

string.name: h
string.value: Enemy DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR% when attacking enemies

string.name: desc
string.value: Your perfect balance between light and dark increases Knockback Resistance and reduces all enemy attacks to 1 damage. All your spells will deal extra damage with no cooldown. Light spells will recover HP, and dark spells will not use MP.\n#cCharacter Appearance Change on/off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value:
Knockback Resistance +#prop% for #time sec.
When using light and dark spells, delivers an additional attack inflicting #damage% of Final Damage for each hit.
When Equilibrium is active, delivers an additional attack inflicting 100% of Final Damage for each hit. Ignores all cooldowns.
Dark spells cost 0 MP. Light spells restore #x% of HP.
#cThe total number of hits cannot exceed 15 for both Light and Dark attacks.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Your perfect balance between light and dark increases Knockback Resistance and reduces all enemy attacks to 1 damage. All your spells will deal extra damage with no cooldown. Light spells will recover HP, and dark spells will not use MP.\n#cCharacter Appearance Change on/off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value: Knockback Resistance +#prop% for #time sec. When using light and dark spells, delivers an additional attack inflicting #damage% of Final Damage for each hit. When Equilibrium is active, delivers an additional attack inflicting 100% of Final Damage for each hit. Ignores all cooldowns. Dark spells cost 0 MP. Light spells restore #x% of HP.\n#cThe total number of hits cannot exceed 15 for both Light and Dark attacks.#

string.value: Willpower Lv. 20, Insight Lv. 20, INT +#intX , more MP increased from leveling, permanent immunity to the Darkness status.

string.name: h1
string.value: Allows you to create items under Lv. 75.

string.name: h2
string.value: Allows you to create items under Lv. 105.

string.name: h3
string.value: Allows you to create items under Lv. 135.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses bamboo to attack an enemy.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 2]\nAllows you to board a Spaceship. Tapping left or right twice enhances Movement Speed and Jump. #cExpires: MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM/PM UTC#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nTapping left or right twice enhances Movement Speed and Jump. #cExpires: MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM/PM UTC#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to change the condition of Krypto in the Space Mine. #cExpires: TKTKTK#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nUtilizes the rage of Pharaoh as an attack.

string.name: h1
string.value: Eliminates all monsters inside the Pyramid with a single blow.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nFly through the sky using the mysterious powers of the dragon race. You will take great damage if you fall. \nThis skill costs 90 MP to activate.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost (to activate): 90 MP, MP Cost (while active)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the Archangel sealed inside the Angelic Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the Archangel sealed inside the Dark Angelic Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the Archangel sealed inside the Angelic Blessing.

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: 0, Additional Jump distance\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: You have been transformed into an Ice Knight. Defeat the challengers and survive until time runs out.

string.name: ph
string.value: You have been transformed into an Ice Knight. Defeat the challengers and survive until time runs out.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the White Angel sealed inside the White Angelic Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Learn a Link Skill from another character within the world or remove the Link Skill that you currently learned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Teleports you forward to the furthest enemy in range. When no enemies are around, you'll be teleported forward a set distance.\n#cYou can teleport while using skills.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. When no enemies are around, you'll be teleported forward #range.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nTemporarily increases your Speed and Jump.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 50, Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10, Duration: 200 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nCreates a portal that leads to the nearest town. You (and only you) can use it multiple times until it disappears. Press Up to use it.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Uses 2 Magic Rocks, Portal Duration: 120 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nAllows you to locate an enemy's weak spot to deal fatal damage to that enemy.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 80, Crit Rate: +10%, Crit Damage: 8%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 80, Max HP and Max MP: +40%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, DEF: +425, Max HP: +475, Max MP: +475, Duration 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\n Increases damage by 10% when attacking monsters with the word Pig in their names.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\n Increases damage by 10% when attacking monsters with the word Stump in their names.

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
 Increases damage against Slime monsters by 10%. Excludes the following enemies:
- Guardian Angel Slime
- Troublemaker Slime
- Romantic Slime
- Explosive Slime
- Gold Slime
- Halo Slime

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Battle Mode ATT, Speed, and Jump permanently increase. #cDouble Swing Lv. 1#

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds your attacks to your Combo Count. Increases Attack Power, Defense, and Movement Speed with every 50 counts, stacking up to 10 times. Also, passively increases your knockback resistance.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Advanced Combo Ability.#\nRequired Skill: #cSmash Swing Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Knockback Resistance +#stanceProp%, For every 50 Combo Counts, ATT: +#y, DEF: +#z, Speed: +#w, Max Stacks: #x

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fires a burst of energy through your polearm to enemies in front. 
[Command: #cDown, Right + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Increases the range of the projectile.
Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Increases the number of projectiles.
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Increase Battle Mode ATT based on DEF.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon Aran's muscle memory to swing the polearm 3 times in a row, hard.\n[Command: Tap the #cAttack Key# multiple times]\n#cLevel 1 required to learn Polearm Mastery and Level 10 required to learn Swing Studies I.#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Attacks Per Swing: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.value: Press the attack key twice to perform a double attack on up to 6 enemies.

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: 2

string.value: Doubles the Attack Speed of your weapon. Must have a Polearm equipped.

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Weapon's Attack Speed increased by #y for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Surround yourself with bitingly cold air to reflect damage taken from bumping into enemies.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Attacks Per Swing: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Polearm Mastery, Attack Speed, and Final Damage.\nRequired Skill: #cSmash Swing Lv. 1#\n#cLevel 10 required to learn High Mastery.#

string.name: h
string.value: Polearm Mastery: +#mastery%, Attack Speed: +1, Final Damage: +#pdR%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Charges forward, quickly knocking back enemies in your path. Can be resisted by some monsters.
[Command: #cLeft, Down, Right + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Stun
Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Leaves an ice trail behind you that freezes enemies.
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Use command to stun enemies for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases STR and DEX through sheer physical training.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increase STR by #strX and DEX by #dexX.

string.name: desc
string.value: Regularly recovers some HP and MP, even in combat.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chance to deliver an additional hit after a direct attack. Must have a Polearm equipped.\nRequired Skill: #cPolearm Mastery Lv. 3#\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Advanced Final Attack.#

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Final Attack Skills]# Has a #prop% chance to deal Final Attack damage of #damage%.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Lifts multiple enemies in front of you into the air. Airborne enemies take more damage, including enemies lifted with Judgment Draw and Rolling Spin. Can be resisted by some monsters.
[Command: #cUp + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Increases your vertical jump
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage to Airborne Enemies: +#x%p

string.name: desc
string.value:
Uses centrifugal force to spin your polearm in place, lifting nearby enemies. Can be resisted by some monsters.
[Command: #cDown, Up + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Stun
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Stun Duration: #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances the effects of Aran's Command-activated skills.\n#cLevel 5 required to learn Command Mastery II#

string.name: h
string.value: Skill damage increases by #damage%p when the skill is triggered with a command.

string.name: desc
string.value: Through intense study, you've perfected your polearm swing. Increases swing damage and allows you to move while swinging. Also, you now know how to link Smash Swings with other skills to deal additional damage via a polearm afterimage.\nRequired Skill: #cSmash Swing Lv. 10#\n#cLevel 4 required to learn Aero Swing.#

string.name: h
string.value: Smash Swing Damage: +#damPlus% points\n#c[Final Attack Skills]# Creates an afterimage that attacks up to #mobCount enemies with #damage% damage #attackCount times when you use other direct attack skills after Smash Swing. Increases Speed during swings.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Charges forward, knocking back enemies in your path. Use command to stun enemies. Can be resisted by some monsters.
[Command: #cLeft, Down, Right + Attack Key#]

#cRight-click to lock command#

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Stun Duration: #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Absorbs some of the damage you dealt to the enemies as HP. Permanently increases your Max HP.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off\n#Required Skill: #cCombo Ability Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value: Recovers #x% of your Max HP when attacking enemies. Permanently increases Max HP by #mhpR%.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Activates a buff that absorbs a portion of damage received as HP. Can only absorb up to 20% of your Max HP. Can only be used when your #cCombo Count is 15 or higher#.\n[Command: #cDown, Down + Attack Key#]\nRequired Skill: #cCombo Ability Lv. 1#

string.value: #hcProp% chance to restore #x% of damage for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases damage and infuses your polearm with the powers of the ice spirit for a short time.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Masterfully counts up your attacks in a Combo Count. Increases Critical Rate and Attack Power with every 50 counts, stacking up to 10 times. Also passively increases your Knockback Resistance, Attack Power, Abnormal Status Resistance Chance, Critical Rate, and Critical Damage.\nRequired Skill: #cCombo Ability Lv. 10#\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Adrenaline Rush.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores a portion of a monster's defense and increases your damage.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Slams your polearm into the ground with great force, launching nearby enemies into the air. Enemies hit directly by the polearm will be frozen and take damage over time. Can be resisted by some monsters. You can control where the polearm lands.
[Command: #cUp, Down/Up, Right/Up, Left + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Freeze
#cRight-click to lock command#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Freeze Duration: #time sec, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Drops a giant axe of judgment on the enemies. Has a chance to freeze, and frozen enemies will receive damage over time. Can only be used when #cCombo Count is 40 or higher.#\n[Command : #cUp and Down Arrow Key + Attack Key#]\nRequired Skill: #cCombo Fenrir Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A rush of adrenaline pushes your battle prowess to its maximum. Adrenaline Rush is not affected by buff duration increase effects.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Finisher#.
Passively increases skill damage.
Required Skill: #cAdvanced Combo Ability Lv. 10#
#cLv. 20 required to learn Hyper Skill Adrenaline Generator#.

string.name: h
string.value: After reaching 1000 combos, enter by using Adrenaline Rush Activate within a certain period of time: For #time sec, Aran's skill damage will increase by #w%p, excluding Finisher/summoning/additional attack skills. Further, Aran's attack count will increase by #x, and the maximum number monsters hit will increase by #y.\nSkill damage permanently increases by #z%p

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate Adrenaline Rush. Can only be used when the skill level of Adrenaline Rush is 1 or higher.

string.name: h
string.value: Usable for #y seconds after reaching 1,000 combos. If Adrenaline Rush is not activated during that time, your Adrenaline will begin to diminish, and your combo count will be reduced to #x.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Uses your polearm blade as a hook to gather nearby enemies in front of you.
Dragon Link Activation Effect: Can be used while using the skill.
[Command: #cUp, Up + Attack Key#]
#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Swing your polearm around to deal massive damage, ignoring some DEF. Learn this skill to utilize Final Blow as the 3rd hit of Smash Swing.
[Command: #cDown + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: renders all enemy attacks ineffective. 
Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Shoots shockwaves in front of you.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Beyond Blade.#
#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Ignored Monster DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nShoots #u shockwaves that attack up to #x enemies with #y% damage #s times during Adrenaline Rush.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to use Smash Swing while airborne. Use Smash Swing while jumping, and Maha will stop you from falling. You'll be able to move around, just like on the ground. Also, passively increase Smash Swing's damage.
[Command: Combo #cAttack Key# while jumping]
Required Skill: #cSwing Studies I Lv. 4#
#cLevel 10 required to learn Swing Studies II.#

string.name: h
string.value: Can use Smash Swing while airborne, damage increases by #damPlus%p

string.name: desc

This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush. Can be resisted by some monsters.\n[Command: #cDown, Left, Right + Attack (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Key Down: 10 sec\n#cOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.

string.name: desc
string.value: Charge forward to strike a powerful blow, automatically targeting the boss with the highest Max HP within reach. If no boss is present, or its Max HP is lower than a nearby enemy, the nearest enemy will instead be targeted. If you change directions while charging the skill and there are no enemies in the direction you are facing, you will charge toward the nearest enemy. Charge the skill longer to do more damage. You're invincible while charging. This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush.\n[Command: #cDown, Right, Down + Attack Key (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Hold key down to charge and use arrow keys to change direction once activated. A Chase Cut that strikes #attackCount times, dealing #damage% to #mobCount monsters, is activated #q time(s). Invincible while charging. Damage increases by #s% for every 1 sec spent charging, up to 500%. Can charge for up to 5 sec.\n#cOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhances the effects of Aran's Command-activated skills\nRequired Skill: #cCommand Mastery I Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: Skill damage increases by #damage%p when the skill is triggered with a command.

string.name: desc
string.value: Through intense study, you've perfected your polearm swing and Smash Swing technique. Increases your speed and damage while swinging. The 2nd and 3rd hits of Smash Swing and Aero Swing become Final Blows.\nRequired Skill: #cAero Swing Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Smash Swing Damage: +#damPlus% points\n#c[Final Attack Skills]# Creates an afterimage that attacks up to #mobCount enemies with #damage% damage #attackCount times when you use other direct attack skills after Smash Swing. Increases Speed during swings.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon all of Aran's might to sweep enemies away with Maha. Damage increases when it is used as a link after using the Final Blow, and you're invincible while using it. Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Shoots out shockwaves in front of you and behind you.\nRequired Skill: #cFinal Blow Lv. 20#\n#cLevel 30 required to learn Fenrir Crash.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Deals up to 3 additional hits with consecutive key presses.
#c2 Hits:# Attack 5 times for #s% damage
#c3 Hits:# Attack 5 times for #u% damage.
Bonus Critical Rate: #cr%, Ignored Monster DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#nbdR%
Damage: +#z%p when used by linking with Final Blow.
Fires a shockwave that hits up to 6 enemies for 400% damage 5 times if in Adrenaline Rush state.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pummel your enemies with a series of swings so quick that your polearm becomes invisible. Forms a whirlwind around Aran, sucking in all enemies. This skill can be activated by command only during Adrenaline Rush.\n[Command: #cDown, Left, Right + Attack (held down)#]\nRequired Skill: #cAdrenaline Rush Lv. 20#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Swing your polearm around to deal massive damage, ignoring some DEF. Learn this skill to utilize Final Blow as the 3rd hit of Smash Swing.
[Command: #cDown + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: makes all enemy attacks ineffective. 
Additional Adrenaline Rush Effect: Shoots shockwaves in front of you.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Beyond Blade.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Mir immediately stops attacking and returns to Evan, scorching enemies with a curtain of flame. This skill advances alongside Dragon Breath. Activates when Evan uses #c[Return]# while Mir is using #cDragon Breath, Wind Breath, or Earth Breath.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Mir breathes out flames that homes in on enemies when his #cDragon Breath# melds with Evan's magic. Earth Breath advances alongside Dragon Breath. You won't take damage when this skill targets enemies with attack reflection. Activates when Evan uses #cEarth Circle# while Mir is using #cDragon Breath#.

string.value: A combo skill used after lifting enemies into the air with Rising Rush. Fly towards airborne enemies, peppering them with swift attacks. Can also be used by pressing the up key and basic attack after using Rising Rush. string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value:
Upon activation, Equilibrium does not trigger automatically when the light/dark gauge is full of the opposing element.
Instead, it enters a delay state where Equilibrium is triggered upon using the #cEquilibrium skill, Gate of Light, Aether Conduit, or Baptism of Light and Darkness#.
Even if Equilibrium Liberation is deactivated, you can only trigger Equilibrium when you use this skill if you're in a delay state

string.value: When direct skill attacks hit, there is a #prop% chance to increase damage by #damR% for #time secs. Can stack up to #x times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores enemy's Elemental Resistance when attacking for a short time. Also permanently ignores a portion of enemy defense, increases final damage, and increases Knockback Resistance.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Ignore Monster Elemental Resistance #y%, Duration: #time sec.\n[Passive: Final damage +#mdR%, Ignore Defense: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Knockback Resistance: +#stanceProp%]

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the stats of all party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases all stats assigned APs by #x% for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can change your skills by choosing again which fate you want to walk with, the path of light or the path of darkness. However, the story cannot be changed, and will continue on the path you initially chose.\nNot affected by effects which reset cooldowns.

string.name: desc
string.value: Immobilizes enemies and blasts them with magic power.\nEnemies hit by this will resist stuns for 90 seconds and won't be stunned by other skills, such as Armageddon.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Stun Duration: #time sec, Invincible while casting.\nStun Duration: up to +100% depending on damage inflicted with Armageddon.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Recalls the oath of the Maple Heroes to increase damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage: +#indieDamR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Equilibrium status begins.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Puts you in Equilibrium mode immediately upon use. Equilibrium mode from Equalize will not be affected by buff duration increase.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Light Magic]\nEmit a powerful arrow of light that splits when it hits enemies to deal splash damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: desc
string.value: [Dark Magic]\nAttacks the enemy by dropping a star of destruction created by the power of darkness. The fallen star slides forward towards enemies by inertia and then explodes. Cooldown does not apply during Equilibrium state. Morning Star is unaffected by attack reflection, though some monsters can still resist. Also permanently increases Final Damage and Boss Damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Knockback Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Explosion Damage: #w%. Collision occurs up to #s times for each enemy.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effects - Final Damage +#mdR%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: [Dark Magic]\nOpens the Abyssal Rift under enemies to flood them with void energy.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate the booster to move quickly. Using skills in the air will consume the booster gauge. As soon as you land, the booster gauge will recover. Jett Boosters cannot be added to the Skill Macro.\n#cRight-click to lock the Mechanic Dash command.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Booster Max: #x, All Skill Activation MP Cost: #y
#cDouble Acceleration#: While in the air, press the jump or skill key to perform a mid-air jump. Use with the up arrow key to jump upward. Consumes #z of the booster. Can be used even when not mounted on the Mech, in which case it does not consume any of the booster.
#cBooster Deployment#: While in the air, press the Down key, together with the jump or skill key, to hover in the air at a cost of #q of the booster per sec. 
#cMechanic Dash#: Press Left twice, Right twice, or, if on the ground, Left/Right plus the skill key to dash in a straight line. If used in the air, consumes #q2 of the booster. Cooldown: #t sec.

string.name: desc

string.value: Exceed speeds up your attacks and makes you more powerful, but also strains your body and decreases the amount of HP you drain through Life Sap. When you reach the skill's final stage, the attacks will change. Your Overload increases if you use another Exceed skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Make potions more effective. * Does not work on items that recover percentages of health, like Elixirs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Change the star powers on your equipment. Increases Max HP based on the Star Force enhancement level of your equipped item. The higher the total Star Force enhancements on your equipped items, the more this skill increases your Max HP. * Star Force Enhancements on Medals and Titles cannot receive the effect of Star Force Conversion, nor do Star Force increases that come from guild skills.

string.name: h
string.value: Max HP increases proportional to the Star Force on your equipped items

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate a blood pact to convert your HP to Attack Power. This pact lets you ignore Warrior and Demon Avenger equipment stat requirements. Recovery skill efficiency increases do not affect HP recovery from the Demon Avenger's skills. In situations where HP cannot be recovered, HP consumed by the 1st through 4th tier job skills will be reduced.

string.name: h
string.value:
Damage Range calculated based on Max HP.
Only a set percentage of Bonus HP from Equipment items are applied.
Base HP confers a greater Damage Range than HP bonuses from equipment and items.
Allows you to ignore stat requirements on Warrior and Demon Avenger equipment.

Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.value: Targets and attacks the enemy closest to you. Has a chance to stun the enemy. Allows you to teleport in any direction using the directional keys, and also while in the air.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns damage taken from enemies to the dealer, along with a chance to stun them. Cannot return more than half of an enemy's HP at once. Can be resisted by some monsters.
