string.name: desc
string.value:
While this skill is active, using Combat Teleport will create a streak of black lightning between your starting and ending positions, injuring enemies and marking them with a Dark Brand. Attacking enemies marked by Dark Brands will consume the Brand and inflict additional damage.
Learning Dark Shock causes Dark Chain and Battle Burst to inflict Dark Brands, although Dark Brands cannot be activated by those skills or minions. Also, using Hasty Aura will increase the movement range of Combat Teleport. (To toggle that function, right-click Hasty Aura on the skill UI.)
Required Skill: #cCombat Teleport Lv.5+#
#cLevel 20 required to learn Abyssal Lightning.#
Can be toggled #cOn/Off#.

Afflicts enemies with Dark Brand for #time sec. If you attack enemies with Dark Brand, the brand activates and deals an additional #x% damage #y number of times. Brand activated attacks deal #bdR% bonus damage against bosses. Brand is consumed upon attacking #s times.

string.value: MP Cost per sec: #mpCon, Damage: +#indieDamR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effect: Magic ATT +#madR%]

string.name: desc
string.value: Release an ominous aura to weaken your enemies. Use it once more, or use another aura, to cancel it. Weakening Aura has some delay before its effects begin to work, but those effects will linger for a time even after the aura deactivates. Does not apply Combat Orders.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost per sec: #mpCon, Enemy DEF: -#x%. Requires #y sec to apply but will be in effect #time sec after aura deactivation.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Jaguar Skill]# Swipes at multiple enemies with consecutive attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a well-tamed Jaguar to ride. Increases Speed and Knockback Resistance while riding. Use Summon Jaguar or a Jaguar Skill to get off the Jaguar and walk alongside it. If a Jaguar was summoned by Jaguar Storm, you can use Jaguar Skills without dismounting from the Jaguar.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Speed While Riding: #x, Knockback Resistance: +#y%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows your Jaguar to make another leap during a jump. Can be used up to two times.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, allows you to jump a greater distance

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Crossbow Attack Speed for a short time.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Crossbow Attack Speed increased for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Manage captured Jaguars. You can reach the Jaguar Habitat through Black Jack in the Secret Square. Your stats are increased by capturing special Jaguars. Snow White and Onyx Jaguar stats do not stack.

string.name: h
string.value: Manage captured Jaguars using the mouse

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summon a Jaguar to fight by your side. Your Jaguar will target enemies you attack. You can command the Jaguar to use the #c[Jaguar Skill]#. Attacks enemies, starting with the the boss with the highest HP within attack range. If no bosses are present, attacks in the direction the character is facing.
While the Jaguar is summoned, use the skill again while holding the Down Arrow key to fix the Jaguar in place and order it to attack nearby enemies.
While fixed in place, the Jaguar prioritizes the boss with the highest HP within attack range. When the Jaguar and the character are separated by a certain amount of distance, the Jaguar will move to join the character.
You can also use the mount skill to ride the Jaguar.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fire high-speed arrows, together with Jaguar artillery, like a catastrophic rainstorm. Hold the skill key to fire arrows continuously. Can be used while in motion, and can triple jump (at a reduced attack speed) while in use. If Wild Arrow Blast hits, an additional grenade will launch, targeting enemies that Wild Arrow Blast has not already attacked.
If you have a Jaguar summoned, you can only attack 1 enemy at a time with this skill, but your damage to Boss Monsters, and your range, will be greater.
#cRight-click# to use a new prototype Arrow Blast instead of Wild Arrow Blast. The new Arrow Blast can only be used while riding the Jaguar.
Required Skill: #cEnduring Fire Lv.10
#cLevel 30 required to learn Wild Arrow Blast Type X#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the giant robot SG-88 to bombard a group of enemies with missiles. An activation gauge pops up when this robot is summoned, and damage can be charged and amplified (up to double the base amount) by hitting the regular attack key. Invincible while using the skill. Not affected by effects which reset cooldown.\n#cLevel 30 required to learn Full Metal Barrage.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates Missile Tank mode during which your mech continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Siege Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. All attacks become critical hits.
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Swings your energy sword at enemies in the direction you're facing to dispel some buffs, bind them, and stun them. Bound enemies cannot have buff effects applied for the duration of the stun.\nDebuffs: Attack Power/Magic ATT Increase, DEF Increase, Obsidian Skin.\nEnemies hit by this will resist stuns for 90 seconds and won't be stunned by other skills, like Entangling Lash.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a powerful orbital laser cannon that can incinerate anything on the ground. Damage increases over time.

string.name: desc
string.value: When attacked by an enemy, generates a protective shield proportional to the damage taken. The total of the shield and current HP can't exceed the max HP or the shield will disappear. While using Blaster skills, you cannot be knocked back.

string.name: h
string.value: When hit, converts #x% of your damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates every 5 second. The maximum strength of the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nKnockback Resistance increases by 100% while using Blaster skills.\nPermanently increases Knockback Resistance by #stanceProp%, DEF by #pddX, and Max HP by #mhpR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Study the Arm Cannon to learn the basics of Revolving Cannon. Any enemies attacked directly by an overheated Arm Cannon will receive additional damage due to the excess heat, and the additional damage increases depending on your number of charged Dynamo Gauge stock.\n#cAffected skills: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, Ballistic Hurricane, Muzzle Flash, Hyper Magnum Punch, Gatling Punch, Bullet Blast#\n#cLv. 5 required to learn the 2nd Job skill 'Revolving Cannon Upgrade'.#

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Final Attack Type Skill]# When the Dynamo Gauge has at least 1 stock, direct attacks from the Arm Cannon will trigger additional attacks which deal #damage% #attackCount times. For each charged Dynamo Gauge stock, the damage of the additional hits increase by #x%.\nPermanently increases Movement Speed by #psdSpeed, Jump Power by #psdJump, and Max Movement Speed by #speedMax.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes a powerful straight punch in front of you with the explosive power of the Arm Cannon. Revolving Cannon triggers automatically when using this skill. You can also link this skill to Double Blast and Bullet Blast.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Bobbing.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nRevolving Cannon triggers automatically while using Magnum Punch and will additionally attack the same number of enemies for #y% damage #x times.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use your Arm Cannon to create additional explosions and deal damage. This cannot be used as a standalone skill. Either it triggers automatically during certain attacks or can be used manually during a certain attack.
Holding the key down to charge will manually reload your Ammo. You can charge while using other skills, and can charge up to 2 skills simultaneously.
#cSkills triggered automatically during Revolving Cannon: Magnum Punch, Double Blast#
#cSkills usable manually during Revolving Cannon: Revolving Blast#

string.name: h
string.value: Uses 1 Ammo, and your Ammo is reloaded if used as a key-down skill

string.name: desc
string.value:
Depletes the Dynamo Gauge to release massive explosions and shockwaves. Ignores Defense Rate of enemies' in melee range.
The Dynamo Gauge charges when using Revolving Cannon during certain offensive skills. Additional shockwaves are released based on Dynamo Gauge bars used, dealing extra damage based on proximity. Immune to damage from attack reflection.
Required skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv.5#
#cLv. 10 required to learn 'Revolving Blast'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Requires #x or more Dynamo Gauge bars. Attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times. Melee hits ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemy Defense Rate.\nReleases Shockwave 1, attacking up to #q enemies for #w% damage #w2 times.\n#cAfter use, you will Overheat for #time sec. While Overheated, the Dynamo Gauge is set to max, and you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use Bunker Buster Explosion.# On ending, depletes the Dynamo Gauge.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, allows you to jump a greater distance

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire your cannon to thrust in the direction opposite the way you are facing. The recoil that thrusts you will also damage nearby enemies. Using the skill while holding the up arrow key will cause an explosion on the ground that propels you upward. Attacking an enemy with attack reflection will not damage you, and the skill cannot be used while reloading.

string.name: h
string.value: Ammo Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Arm Cannon Mastery, Critical Rate, Attack Power, and Final Damage.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Gauntlet Expert.#

string.name: h
string.value: Mastery: +#mastery%, Critical Rate: +#cr%, Attack Power: +#padX, Final Damage: +#pdR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases STR and DEX through sheer physical training.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increase STR by #strX and DEX by #dexX.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintain control over your power to improve charge skills. Additionally, permanently increases Damage.\n#cLv. 14 required to learn 'Advanced Charge Mastery'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by #x%. Using a charge skill reloads #w Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nAt the start of charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently increases damage by #damR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves the potential for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon.\nRequired skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv. 5#\n#cLv. 20 required to learn 'Revolving Cannon Plus II'.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating: +#s% points
Revolving Cannon damage triggered during Magnum Punch +#s2% points.
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 4 bars. Maximum Ammo increased to 4.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 4 bars or higher increases damage by 40% points and will generate Shockwave 2, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Performs a powerful 2-hit combo in the direction you're facing using the momentum from your Arm Cannon. After you learn this skill, you can also activate it by repeatedly pressing the Magnum Punch button. Revolving Cannon triggers automatically when using this skill. Can be linked to Bobbing, Weaving, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, or Bullet Blast.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nRevolving Cannon triggers automatically while using Double Blast and will additionally attack the same number of enemies for #y% damage #x times.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Move forward while avoiding enemy attacks. Jumping will cancel this skill immediately. With Action Customization enabled, pressing the skill key again will cancel the skill immediately. Can be linked to Magnum Punch, Rocket Rush, or Bullet Blast.
If activated after a charge, #cany of your skill that was already activated will be canceled, and Bobbing will be activated. #You can charge a skill while using a different skill other than Bobbing, and up to 2 skills can be charged simultaneously. Also permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF.#
Required skill:#cMagnum Punch Lv. 20#
#cLevel 15 required to learn Weaving.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Bonus Avoidability #w% applied for 1.5 sec after activation.\n[Passive Effect - Magnum Punch Damage: +#damPlus% points]

string.name: desc
string.value: Doubles the attack speed of your weapon. Must have an Arm Cannon equipped. \nRequired Skill: #cArm Cannon Mastery Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Weapon Attack Speed: +2

string.name: desc
string.value: The cannon built into the Arm Cannon fires an explosive shell forward.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumed Bullets: #s2\nMax Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Against Normal Monsters: +#q%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Improves the potential for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon. This overwrites the increases from Revolving Cannon Plus.\n#cLv. 20 required to learn 'Revolving Cannon Plus III'.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points, and Shockwave 2 damage +#u% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points
Revolving Cannon damage triggered during Magnum Punch +#s2% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +#v% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 5 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 5.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 5 slots or higher increases its damage by 80% points and will generate Shockwave 3, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fortify your Blast Shield with some training. \nRequired Skill: #cBlast Shield Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: When hit, convert #x% of damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #asrR and Elemental Resistance by #terR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Research the most efficient movement and attack patterns for battle. Using linked skills or charge skills will increase your abilities. Additionally, Attack Power is permanently increased.\n#cLv. 9 required to learn 'Combo Training II'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Can be stacked up to #x times. Duration: #time sec. Final Damage increased by #y% per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every #w stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every #z stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by #padR%

string.name: desc
string.value:
Strike the ground to knock nearby enemies into the air. Affected enemies receive a debuff, increasing the final damage taken from Blaster's attack for a short time.
Can be linked to Magnum Punch or Bullet Blast.
Charge the skill by holding down the key. #cWhile charging, attacks won't knock you back. Releasing the charge will cancel any of your active skills, and will create an extra shockwave that deals additional attacks.#
You can charge skills even while other skills, aside from Hammer Smash, are in use, and up to 2 skills may be charged at once.
You will not take damage from shockwaves that strike enemies with attack reflection.
Also permanently increases Double Blast damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. Attacks #attackCount times. Applies Debuff on Hit: for #y seconds, Final Damage taken from Blaster's attack +#x%.\nWhen releasing charge, creates a shockwave that lasts for #q sec and hits up to #s enemies for #q2% damage #s2 times. Enemies struck by the shockwave will be afflicted by the Final Damage debuff.\n[Passive Effect - Double Blast Damage +#damPlus% points]

string.name: desc
string.value:
Move backward while avoiding enemy attacks. Jumping will cancel this skill immediately. With Action Customization enabled, press the skill key again to immediately cancel it. Can be linked to Rocket Rush, Muzzle Flash, or Bullet Blast.
If activated after a charge, #any of your skill that was already activated will be canceled, and Weaving will be activated.# You can charge a skill while using a different skill other than Weaving, and up to 2 skills can be charged simultaneously. Additionally, permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF.#
Required skill: #cBobbing Lv. 15#
#cLevel 15 required to learn Ballistic Hurricane.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Bonus Avoidability #w% applied for 1.5 sec after activation.\n[Passive Effect - Magnum Punch Damage: +#damPlus% points]

string.name: desc
string.value: Grab onto nearby enemies and drag them in the direction you're facing. Any enemy in your path will be bulldozed along and receive damage. This skill will not be activated if there are no enemies nearby to grab. Can be resisted by some monsters.\nRequired Skill: #cWeaving Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Enemies: #mobCount. If there are enemies in the skill's path, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #w, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#nbdR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Instantly approaches a nearby enemy while Weaving to perform an attack. Can only be used during Weaving, and can be activated by Weaving (unless Action Customization is enabled for that skill). It will not be activated if there is no enemy within range. Can be linked to Magnum Punch and Bullet Blast, and permanently increases Magnum Punch damage.\nRequired skill: #cWeaving Lv. 15#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n[Passive Effect - Magnum Punch Damage: +#damPlus% points]

string.name: desc
string.value: The final upgrade for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon. This overwrites the increases from Revolving Cannon Plus II.\nRequired skill: #cRevolving Cannon Plus II Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points, Shockwave 2 damage +#u% points, and Shockwave 3 damage +#u2% points.
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points
Revolving Cannon damage triggered during Magnum Punch +#s2% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +#v% points.
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 6 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 6.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 6 slots or higher increases its damage by 200% points and will generate Shockwave 4, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enhance the Blast Shield through rigorous mental training and perseverance. Additionally, permanently increase the damage of Rocket Rush and Magnum Cannon.\nRequired Skill: #cShield Training Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: When hit, convert #x% of damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increase Abnormal Status Resistance by #asrR%, Elemental Resistance by #terR%, and Knockback Resistance by #stanceProp%.\nKnockback attack of Rocket Rush and Magnum Cannon damage +#damPlus%p.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase Arm Cannon Mastery, Critical Damage, and Damage when attacking Boss Monsters.\nRequired Skill: #cArm Cannon Mastery Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintain control over your power to optimize charge skills. Overwrites the buffs from Charge Mastery. Additionally, permanently ignores a portion of enemies' Defense Rate when attacking, and decreases damage taken.\nRequired skill: #cCharge Mastery# Lv. 14

string.name: h
string.value: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by #x%. Using a charge skill reloads #w Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemies' Defense, and damage taken is reduced by #damAbsorbShieldR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Research the most efficient movement and attack patterns for battle. Using linked skills or charge skills will increase your abilities. This overwritesyour enhancements from Combo Training. Attack Power is further increased.\nRequired skill: #cCombo Training Lv. 9'.#

string.name: h
string.value: Can be stacked up to #x times. Duration: #time sec. Final Damage and Critical Rate increased by #y% and #q% respectively per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every #w stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every #z stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by #padX

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, Muzzle Flash, and Ballistic Hurricane. Does not increase damage of shockwaves.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the Defense Rate that is ignored by Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, and Shotgun Punch, Muzzle Flash, and Ballistic Hurricane.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the number of times that shockwaves generated by a charged Hammer Smash or a Shotgun Punch will hit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of Bunker Buster Explosion.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the damage of the shockwave generated by Bunker Buster Explosion.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants a guarding bonus during Bunker Buster Explosion.

string.name: h
string.value: Guard bonus during Bunker Buster Explosion. Damage reduction rate follows the rates in Charge Mastery.

string.name: desc
string.value: While the Blast Shield dissipates, recover your HP relative to the rate at which your shield dissipates.

string.name: h
string.value: Recover #x% of the dissipating Blast Shield as HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the cooldown of Vitality Shield.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reduces the cooldown of Ballistic Hurricane.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a Screw Blow accompanied by a shockwave. For a short time after, a spiraling shockwave will remain in that spot, dealing additional damage. Can be linked with Bobbing, Weaving, and Bullet Blast. Also permanently increases Double Blast damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP cost: #mpCon, Max Number of Enemies: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#nbdR%, then generates a shockwave\n#cShockwave#: attacks up to #z enemies for #s% damage #u times, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#q%p\n[Passive Effects: Double Blast Damage: +#w%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash all of your fighting prowess into a seamless cyclone of punches. Your rapid onslaught of punches creates a hurricane and pulls in nearby enemies. Can be resisted by some monsters. You can continue to move and attack while the skill is active. Also permanently increases Hammer Smash damage.\nRequired skill: #cBobbing Lv. 15# and #cWeaving Lv. 15#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Duration: #time sec. Upon using this skill, deliver a jumping uppercut that hits up to #z enemies for #s% damage #u times and sends them flying.
You can #cmove around#, using the #carrow keys#, while holding the skill key down.
If the attack succeeds, combo training remains at max level.
Hammer Smash Damage, aside from ShockWave, +#damPlus%p
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reloads Ammo. Rush, grab and stun an enemy you're facing. Prioritizes highest Max HP target in range. Revolving Cannon is usable while holding the enemy. Use Revolving Cannon on the enemy 6 times and perform this skill again to unleash a Bunker Buster for extra damage. Activates even when grabbing an enemy that can't be stunned. Invincible while holding the enemy. Bonus Bunker Buster attack ignores additional Defense Rate. Will not activate if no enemies are nearby. #cReusing# the skill will release the hold, but the stun will remain.\nThe affected enemy is immune to Stun for 90 seconds.\nRequired skill: #cBunker Buster Explosion Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Rushes and grabs enemies for #damage% damage. Stuns. Hits #attackCount times. Activate Revolving Cannon to attack up to #s more enemies up to 6 times. Each attack hits #s2 time(s) for #x%, #y%, #w%, #w2%, #q%, or #q2% damage.\nBonus Bunker Buster deals #z% damage #v times and ignores additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Defense Rate.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Convert an active Blast Shield to HP. You can't use this without a Blast Shield active, or if your HP is full. For a brief moment after using this skill, damage from attacks, including attacks that deal a percentage of your HP, will be reduced. The damage reduction is determined by the damage reduction of Charge Mastery. This buff is not affected by buff duration extension effects. Additionally, this skill permanently increases Rocket Rush and Magnum Cannon damage.\nRequired skill : #cShield Training II Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Recovers HP equal to the sum of the dissipated Blast Shield and #x% of your Max HP. The extended defense period lasts for #time sec.\nKnockback attack of Rocket Rush and Magnum Cannon damage increased by #damPlus%p.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the stats of all party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases all stats assigned APs by #x% for #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Rush forward with a powerful punch to cause a colossal explosion. 
Hold down the skill key to charge. This skill generates additional shockwaves based on charge time, dealing more damage to nearby enemies. While charging, you cannot be stunned or knocked back, and you will have improved defense and Abnormal Status resistance.
Additionally, being attacked while charging will improve your final damage output.
Hyper Magnum Punch's charge time is unaffected by Charge Mastery's charge time reduction effect.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% #attackCount times.
Generates a shockwave that attacks for #v% damage #v2 times.
Can be enhanced up to #z levels by charging, and each level of enhancement generates an additional shockwave that deals #q%, #q2%, #s2% damage #dot times.
While charging, the defense boosts from Charge Mastery are applied, and Abnormal Status Resistance increases by 100.
Each time you get hit while charging, the final damage increases by #x%, up to #y%.
Can be charged for up to #subTime sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Materializes the will of the Resistance to increase attack power.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage: +#indieDamR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

string.name: desc
string.value: By charging Revolving Cannon to its limit, increase its power and reduce reload time, all while increasing the rate at which the Dynamo Gauge cools down.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Duration: #time sec. Increases damage for skills that use Ammo by #y%. Ammo auto-reload time decreased by #x%. The Dynamo Gauge Overheat duration for Bunker Buster Explosion is reduced to 1 second.\nCooldown : #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Max HP and Max MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1] Receive the Dark Angel's blessing.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Unlock your hidden potential in your moment of need.

string.name: ph
string.value: Damage Over Time: #damage% damage to nearby enemies while HP is below #z%. Avoidability: +#y%.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Transform your axe into a giant sword to freeze multiple enemies at once. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c20 or higher#.\n[Command: #cUp, Up + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Freeze Chance: #prob%, Freeze Duration: #time sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Damages enemies over time with a blast of icy power. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c40 or higher#.\n[Command: #cDown + Right + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every 1 sec for #dotTime sec.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Strike enemies hard with a chance to stun. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c5 or higher.#\n[Command: #cDown + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Stun Chance: #prop%, Stun Duration: #time sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Curse your opponents by turning them into Ice Snails. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c160 or higher#.\n[Command: #cDown, Up + Attack Key#]

string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon. Snail Chance: #prop%, Snail Duration: #time

string.value: [Master Level: 1] Receive the White Angel's blessing.

string.value: A powerful force is released, based on Willpower of the Alliance.

#cCooldown: 1 day#
Not affected by cooldown reset or buff duration increase.

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of the shield protecting the Empress makes enemies vulnerable to Mihile's #cRadiant Soul#. Enemies hit with Royal Guard's counterattack receive a debuff. Using #cRadiant Soul skill# to attack enemies with the debuff creates a light shockwave that does an additional attack.\nThe light shockwave is centered on the boss with the highest Max HP among those hit with the Radiant Soul skill. If there is no boss, then it's centered on the closest enemy among those hit.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Advanced Offensive Defense.#

string.name: h
string.value:
When Royal Guard's counterattack hits, give enemy Offensive Defense debuff for #time sec
When #cRadiant Soul skill# hits enemy with the debuff, a light shockwave is created centered on the enemy that was hit. The Offensive Defense debuff disappears when the enemy is hit by the light shockwave.
#cLight Shockwave# - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fills up the Morph Gauge and transforms you into your Final Form immediately upon use.
Morph Gauge is recovered as much as the amount that was in possession before the transformation when Final Form through Final Trance ends.
If transformed into Final Form using Final Trance, the skill duration is not affected by skill duration buffs.
Required skill: #cFinal Form Lv. 10#

string.name: desc
string.value: Lay down multi-arrow suppression fire. The arrows scatter fragments around enemies they hit, dealing additional damage to surrounding targets.\nOccasionally results in the manifestation of uncontrolled, wild Malice.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Strike Arrow II.#

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value: Flit unseen through the shadows. Use the arrow keys to move in any direction. This skill can be used while using other skills.\nYou are #Stealthed# while using this skill, and cannot be hit. When using this skill on the ground, use it again to make a sudden stop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoot a special Drakas-made wire mechanism, hooking it to an overhead platform, then #cuse this skill again# to move along the wire. Press the key skill again, while on the move, to cancel the skill. Use the skill in conjunction with an arrow key to fire at a 45-degree angle. If you use this skill in the air, you will hover briefly. If you don't use the wire after hooking it to a platform, it will disappear.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, shoot a wire onto a platform, then use the skill again to move along the wire.\n[Passive Effect: Jump: +#psdJump]

string.name: desc
string.value: Leap once more while already in the air. Press the up key at the same to move upward.

string.name: h

string.name: desc
string.value:
Manifest your intrinsic ability to control an aspect of Satiras the Devil Dragon's power.
Create Malice periodically, and/or when a Whispershot skill hits, and gain one #cMalice Stone# each time it exceeds a certain amount. You can then use Malice Stones to enter a #Possessed# state that manifests the Malice of Satiras.
When in a Possessed state, most Whispershot skills are enhanced as Possess skills. Using any Possess skill once will cancel the Possessed state. Possess skills ignore both cooldown and ammunition limit, though a Possess skill will go into cooldown after use. Possession can't be used while in a Possessed state. If you use this skill while in the middle of using an attack skill, you can be in a Possessed state without the casting action of Possession.
While Possessed, you can control the Malice that results from a Strike Arrow.

string.name: h
string.value:
Create #x Malice when Whispershot skills hit, with more Malice created periodically.
Gather #w Malice to obtain a Malice Stone. You can carry up to #v Malice Stones.
Upon using this skill, consume either 1 Malice Stone or 100 Malice to enter a Possessed state for #time sec. 
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Follow up a Strike Arrow with additional suppression fire. After using Strike Arrow, you'll have a certain window to use this skill. Activates Arrow Fragments in the same way Strike Arrow does.\nRequired Skill: #cStrike Arrow Lv. 20#\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Strike Arrow III.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enticed by the scent of death, the fangs of the Devil Dragon materialize on the physical plane. Dragon Fang is summoned when Kain's direct skill attacks hit beyond a certain number, is unaffected by attack reflection, and targets the enemy with the highest max HP.
It follows Kain, but disappears when changing maps. If it disappears in this manner while it still has time on the clock, that time will translate into fewer hits required to activate the skill again.
Can be toggled #cOn/Off#.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Grip of Agony.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Summon Duration: #w sec
Kain's direct skill attacks activate Dragon Fang, which moves towards the enemy and deals #damage% damage #attackCount times. After activating, this skill casts Dragon Fang up to #mobCount times before returning. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +#nbdR%
Max Summons: #q
Attack Mode Cooldown: #u sec

Damage Against Normal Monsters: +#nbdR%\n#cCooldown: #t sec.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Gives the blessing of death to enemies exposed to malice. Blessing is given to enemies hit by the death domain from Thanatos Descent and with certain attacks from among #cPossess Skills#. When these enemies are attacked with #cExecute Skills#, the blessing materializes to destroy the enemies from within. The merit from materializing the blessing temporarily enhances blessing of death and Execute Skills, and #cresets cooldown of Shadow Step#.\nThis skill negates attack ignore and attack reflection effects, and [Possess/Execute] Unseen Sniper isn't affected by the merit buff.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Advanced Death Blessing.#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Focus your intentions toward a distant enemy, then fire before they see you. Hold the key down to increase your range. When you release the key, an invisible shot will shock the enemy. Not affected by Attack Speed increase buffs. While using, you'll have 100% Knockback Resistance.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Possess/Execute Skill]#\nShoot the enemy with an arrow concentrated with malice. The attack range increases as you continue aiming by holding the key down, and a huge arrow pierces when the key-down ends to deal a fatal blow. When an enemy is defeated with [Possess/Execute] Unseen Sniper, #cresets cooldown of Shadow Step#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Become Malice incarnate and grant others the ability to use Death's Blessing. Not affected by cooldown resets. Death's Blessing effects activated by other party member's attacks are unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cLevel 1 required to learn Thanatos Descent.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Your training in the ways of the Shadowdealers has left you with a permanent boost to Speed, Jump, Max Speed, and Avoidability.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your hard life on the streets has left you with a certain wisdom that some might attribute to luck.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use your chain to grapple to a platform or enemy. Press the skill key to launch the chain horizontally or at a vertical angle.
Striking horizontally only targets monsters, while striking vertically only targets platforms within a certain distance. While airborne, you can strike downward to temporarily slow your descent.
If the#c Skill key is pressed again# while the chain is tethered, you will quickly move to the target location. When the chain is tethered and while moving with the skill, you become temporarily #cstealthed# where you cannot be hit, and attacking or using skills will deactivate the stealth. The use of some skills will not deactivate Dark Sight.
Enemies struck by the skill are briefly #cslowed#. #cCan be used while using your other skills.#
#c[Up + Skill key]# Launches 45 deg. upward
#c[Down + Skill key]# Launches 45 deg. downward

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #u. #s% chance to slow enemies for #s2 sec. Enables Dark Sight state. Cannot be hit for #u2 sec. after you start moving.\nWhen you move, if you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP by using Dark Sight, Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by #z% of its maximum.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Press the#c Attack Key# to whip your chain forward, then bring it crashing down. Enemies hit by the 2nd strike are pushed back. Foes struck by the chain are#c slowed# for a short time.
Other attacks can be used between the 1st and 2nd strikes to inflict enhanced damage.
#cCan be used while using your other skills.#
#cSkill Lv. 10 required to learn Chain Arts: Thrash II.#

Skills used immediately after 1st hit gain +#x% Final Damage #c(Excludes Chain Arts: Thrash)#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Extensive training with a varied assortment of weapons increases the damage of#c all of your attacks#. Whenever you#c switch summoned weapons#, you execute a bonus attack and receive the Muscle Memory buff. The additional attack is unaffected by attack reflection and doesn't deactivate Dark Sight.
This buff stacks up to the#c number of summonable weapons# you possess (excluding Chain Arts). Summoning any weapon besides the last one used will refresh this buff. 
Muscle Memory is not affected by effects that increase buff duration.
#cLv. 10 required to learn Muscle Memory III.#

string.name: h
string.value: Triggers upon switching summoned weapons. #c[Stack Bonus]# Attack Skill Final Damage +#x% per stack, for #time sec. Stacks up to the number of weapon summon skills you possess (excluding Chain Arts).\nRefreshing this buff stack inflicts additional hits. #c[Bonus Hits]# Damage: #y%, Max Enemies Hit: #s, Number of Attacks: #w, Cooldown: 0.25 sec.\n#c[Passive Effect: Damage for Scimitar +#damPlus% points]#

string.name: desc
string.value: Whips your chain out far and fast, binding the enemy within range with the chain. Chain Arts: Beatdown binds the enemy with the highest max HP first.\nAfter being bound for a set time, the enemy is struck fast enough to leave afterimages. The power of the strike differs based on the number of additional hits by Muscle Memory activated during this time. Grants a full stack of Muscle Memory.\nNot affected by cooldown reset effects. Foes hit cannot be Stunned again for 90 sec by Chain Arts: Beatdown or other skills.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attacks: #attackCount, Stun Duration: #time sec. Increases stun duration up to 100% based on inflicted damage.
For #y sec after casting, depending on the #cnumber of additional hits activated by Muscle Memory#, follow-up attack power is divided into 3 levels. If the number of activations isn't met within this time, Strike occurs at the minimum level.
#cStrike#: When Muscle Memory number of activations is 0/#w/#v, respectively, attacks the group in their location based on the level with #s%/#q%/#u% damage, respectively, #u2 time(s), and activates a final attack that attacks #s2 enemies with #prop%/#range%/#subTime% damage, respectively, #q2 time(s)
During the consecutive attacks, activates a shockwave that attacks up to #w2 enemies with #v2% damage #z time(s). Additional DEF ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a zone in which your Attack Power and Magic Attack are increased. This zone is destroyed when you move outside it.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic ATT: +#indieMadR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fixes the player's Max Damage Range at 2,000,000 temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. The player's Max Damage Range is fixed at #x. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily fixes max MP at 500 to increase damage against Boss Monsters. Not affected by cooldown reset, and cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Fixed Max MP: #x MP, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily decreases max HP to increase damage against Boss Monsters. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: -#x, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Decreases the max MP and ignores a certain percentage of the Defense Rate temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset, and cannot be used by classes that do not use MP.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max MP: -#x%, Ignore DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily doubles your Max HP. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max HP: +#indieMhpR%, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases Critical Damage. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Critical Damage: +#x%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily nullifies enemy's Defense Rate by a percentage of your Critical Rate. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Ignored Defense increases by #x% of your Critical Rate. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily replaces the value of your Critical Rate with the value of the main stat that you invested all of your AP into. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, changes your Critical Rate value to #x% of your main stats. Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (This may end up reducing your Critical Rate.)

string.name: desc
string.value: A portion of the main stat value that you invested your AP into temporarily becomes the value of your Knockback Resistance. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, changes your Knockback Resistance to #x% of one of your main stats, Cooldown: #cooltime sec. (This may end up reducing your Knockback Resistance.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases your main stats by the sum of all stats. For Xenon, increases the highest stat out of STR, DEX, and LUK. If stats are all the same, increases LUK. For Demon Avenger, increases HP by applying multiplier to that value. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Increases the main stats by #x% of the sum of all your stats. Increases HP of Demon Avenger by #t times this value. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases STR by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Increases STR by #x% of your current character level. Increases HP of Demon Avenger by #t times this value. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases DEX by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases INT by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases LUK by the character's current level temporarily. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of your current character level. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases STR by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Increases STR by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. Increases HP of Demon Avenger by #t times this value. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases DEX by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases DEX by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases INT by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases INT by #x% of the equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of your main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases LUK by a portion of your main weapon's ATT. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases LUK by #x% of your equipped main weapon's Attack Power. (Of the main weapon's Attack Power and Magic Attack, the higher value will be applied.) Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases attack speed. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, increases Attack Speed by #indieBooster. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to temporarily deal damage to enemies even when they are under Attack Ignore and attack reflection. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, ignores enemy Attack Ignore and attack reflection effects. Does 100% damage. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Ignores a percentage of enemy Defense Rate, but also decreases your Defense temporarily during attacks. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Ignored Enemy DEF: #indieIgnoreMobpdpR%, Defense: -#indiePddR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Amplifies incoming damage by a certain amount and reflects it for a limited period of time. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Amplifies incoming damage by #x% and reflects it. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Has a chance to cancel all Abnormal Statuses. Not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Grants a #prop% chance to cancel all Abnormal Statuses and be immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use. Does nothing when no Abnormal Statuses are applied. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases Attack Power and Magic Attack. Effect ends when hit (attack reflection excluded). Not affected by cooldown reset effects.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Magic Attack: +#indieMadR%, Ends when hit, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

Required Skill: Lv. 20 Dragon Dive#

string.name: desc

string.value: This desert porter looks scrawny but possesses an iron will and hearty stamina.

string.name: desc
string.value: You don't know what's more impressive -- his enormous frame or his bulging muscles. He may be slow, but he can lift heavy loads with ease.

string.name: desc
string.value: Growing up in the desert made her way tougher than she looks. She fires up the morale of the other porters, allowing for faster movement.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
Periodically recovers HP and MP for 150 sec with the power of Fairy Tears.
Recovery amount increases based on the number of stacks when potions are used during recovery.
Max recovery amount is doubled for Demon Avenger.
1st Time: Recovers 1% of HP and MP per sec up to 1,000.
2nd Time: Recovers 1.5% of HP and MP per sec up to 1,500.
3rd Time: Recovers 2% of HP and MP per sec up to 2,000.
4th Time: Recovers 2.5% of HP and MP per sec up to 2,500.
5th Time: Recovers 3% of HP and MP per sec up to 3,000.

string.value: Consumes 1 Magic Whetstone, Duration: 40 min, Critical Damage: +#indieCD%, Buff vanishes when weapon and secondary weapon are unequipped or switched\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c2018# is the year of the Golden Dog!
Gather good energy in the lucky sack, and a Golden Dog will slowly fade into existence to help you hunt!
When the sack is full, the dog will glow with a brilliant #egolden light#n. Then you can use the skill to make it explode, inflicting#c damage to nearby enemies# and earning you #c200 Ark Points#. You also get #c20 Ark Points for every monster# the skill defeats.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

(Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: A soldier who was rescued from the Black Mage's powerful influence. The soldier will help you fight for #c20 seconds# and #cincrease both Attack Power & Magic ATT by 10#.\r\n#cSupport ends when you exit the field.#

string.value: An additional effect that activates when you overcome your fear of the Giant Monster. Increases obtained EXP by 150% for 5 minutes.\n#cEffect is removed when you leave the map#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a #cFlame Bird# who wants to help save the world. Summon the Flame Bird in a hunting ground where#c monsters near your level# appear. Defeat monsters when the bird is nearby to acquire #cFlame Bird's Determination#. It counts towards your determination count and also charges the Flame Bird's Energy. When its Energy is full, use the skill once more to temporarily ride around on the Flame Bird and attack nearby enemies.\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#\r\n#cYou cannot summon the Flame Bird if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A support effect that changes based on the number of Cygnus Support Troops present.
#cLevel 1: 10% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 2: 20% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 3: 30% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 4: 40% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted
Level 5: 50% increase to EXP obtained and damage inflicted

Support Troops and their effects disappear if you exit the area.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A support effect that changes based on the number of Resistance Support Troops present.
#cLevel 1: 10% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 2: 20% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 3: 30% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 4: 40% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate
Level 5: 50% increase to EXP obtained and Critical Rate

Support Troops and their effects disappear if you exit the area.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A support effect that changes based on the number of Nova Support Troops present.
#cLevel 1: 10% increase to EXP obtained, 20% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 2: 20% increase to EXP obtained, and 40% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 3: 30% increase to EXP obtained, and 60% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 4: 40% increase to EXP obtained, and 80% increase to Knockback Resistance
Level 5: 50% increase to EXP obtained, and 100% increase to Knockback Resistance

Support Troops and their effects disappear if you exit the area.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The air is saturated with the force of Erda.\n#cSkills with a cooldown of 5 seconds or longer will have their cooldowns set to 5 seconds for a short time.#\nBuff duration increase effect does not apply, and this effect will not apply to certain buff skills.

string.name: h1
string.value: #cSkills with a cooldown of 5 seconds or longer will have their cooldowns set to 5 seconds for a short time.# Buff duration increase effect does not apply to Erda Frenzy. #cLeaving the map will dispel the effect#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Draw Cleansing Light from the Alliance ship. Eliminate monsters in a hunting ground where#c monsters near your level# appear to call upon #cCleansing Light#. When the light shines upon the character 10 seconds later, you will acquire#c determination# and obtain#c additional determination# if the skill eliminates monsters.\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#\r\n#cYou cannot use this skill if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Peaceful Maple Tree appears to attacks nearby enemies that dare to disturb Maple World's harmony.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Tractor mount that can double jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Chick that can double jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: The #cLife Force# needed to heal Maple World is full. Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to obtain #c10 determination per monster, up to 500#. \r\n#cAttack Power & Magic ATT: +30.#\r\n#cIt will not activate if you have already collected all of the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
You're in a strange, mysterious place. 
The Alliance casts a powerful defense so that you won't be swept up by the dark energy.
#cYour Attack Power is greatly enhanced for 30 seconds, and the cooldown for some skills is set to 5 seconds.#
However, the Attack Power increase does not apply to those who are already strong enough.

string.name: desc
string.value:
You've removed the Seed of Life before it turned into a Transcendion.
Obtain additional EXP when you defeat monsters.
Eliminate the #cSeed of Life# before the buff ends to level up the buff.
#cLevel 1: Acquire 20% more EXP
Level 2: Acquire 30% more EXP
Level 3: Acquire 40% more EXP
Level 4: Acquire 50% more EXP
Level 5: Acquire 60% more EXP

string.name: desc
string.value:
Restore the destroyed world by remembering the journey you took to get to this point.
Obtain #cMaple Leaves of Peace# and#c determination# by eliminating#c monsters near your level#. You can activate#c one of four skills# when you've collected enough #cMaple Leaves of Peace#.
#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cYou cannot use this skill if you have already collected all of the determination you can for the day.#
#cOnly works in fields with Monsters Near Your Level.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
The air became saturated with Erda when the Light Giant took damage.
#cSkills with a cooldown of 5 seconds or longer will have their cooldowns set to 5 seconds for a short time, and EXP obtained will increase by 200%.#
Buff duration increase effect does not apply, and certain buff skills will be unaffected by this effect.
#cLeaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An effect granted to warriors who helped deal damage to the #cLight Giant#.\nIncreases EXP obtained by 100% for 3 min.\n#cLeaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a #cCotton Candy Unicorn#. Ride the Cotton Candy Unicorn with consecutive jumps to keep increasing your jump ability. Keep jumping up high to gather various fairies.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute, cherub-like fairy scatters the leaf dew at high speed to deal damage to your enemies. Holding down the skill key charges up a large water drop for a more powerful attack.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #u% \r\nCharged Dew Drop Mischief \r\nMax Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: #u2%

string.name: desc
string.value: Wonky the Fairy leaps and flies temporarily. Restores HP while in flight and does a radial attack when Dew Drop Mischief is used.

string.name: h
string.value:
Leap in the direction you're facing and fly for 4 seconds. 
Restores #x% of Max HP per sec while in flight. 
Duration: 15 sec 
Dew Drop Mischief fires a front radial attack while in flight. 
Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: #u%

string.name: desc
string.value: Protects the body with condensed dew drops infused with fairy energy.

string.name: h
string.value: No damage received beyond #x% of Wonky's maximum HP per hit. \r\nDamage Reflect: #y%, Duration: #time sec \r\nCooldown: 20 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Wonky the Fairy strikes the leaf 2 times at high speed.

string.name: h
string.value: On every hit, Number of Enemies in Front Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%. The opponent's character will become confused for #time sec on the second hit. Cooldown: 12 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collects power from everyone to fire an energy sphere in front of you. Hold down the skill key to charge the energy sphere up to 3 levels and release it to fire the energy sphere in the direction you are facing. The higher the charge level, the faster and more powerful the attack will be. #cThe charged energy sphere will cancel if Wonky enters the Last Stage while holding the charge.#

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Lv. 1 Damage: #v%, Lv. 2 Damage: #u%, Lv. 3 Damage: #u2%. Abnormal Status ignored while charging. Cooldown: 50 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Attack competitors and monsters in front of you with help from the ancient hero's spirit.
Enemies will be stunned for a set amount of time and pushed back.
For each competitor successfully hit, you'll earn 100 points.
Cannot be used while using certain skills.

string.name: h
string.value: SP Cost: 50%, Damage: #damage%, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Protect yourself from your opponent's attacks for a short time with the help of the ancient hero's spirit. You cannot move while you are under this protection. However, if you successfully defend against your opponent's attack, the protective shield will be destroyed. You'll then be able to move immediately and earn 100 points.\nCannot be used while using certain skills.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Blast an orb to attack opponents and monsters with the help of the ancient hero's spirit.
Competitors hit with the orb will be stunned for a set amount of time and pushed back.
For each competitor successfully hit, you'll earn 100 points.
Cannot be used while using certain skills.

string.name: h
string.value: SP Cost: 50%, Damage: #damage%, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing for those who have overcome Medusa's trials.\r\nBoss Damage: +30%\r\nDuration: 10 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Subject yourself to the training of a Glory Guard. Use this skill in the Glory Guard Drill Hall at the Outpost to choose between conducting Mock Battles and Tactical Research which grant EXP and Glory respectively. The amount of Glory you receive increases with your Guard Rank.

string.name: h
string.value: While using this skill in the Glory Guard Drill Hall, you will periodically gain Glory or Exp.\nGlory Acquired:#u\nEXP Acquired: Proportionate to Character Level (EXP Training requires Lv. 105+, and is limited to 8 hours a day.)

string.name: desc
string.value: A skill that's enhanced depending on your #cAdventurer Tier#. Eliminate#c monsters near your level# to charge your #cAdventure Power# and earn #cAdventure Points x100# at a fixed rate. Once your Adventure Power is full, your #cConcentration# will be enhanced for #c5 sec#, and you'll summon the #cDantes Statue# from Adventure Island. The summoned Dantes Statue deals great damage to surrounding enemies.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to toggle ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: You get #cAdventure Points x100# at a fixed rate when you eliminate monsters near your level. Max Enemies Hit: #c15#, #cDamage: 1,000%#, #cNumber of Attacks: 6#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons #cPixel Warriors# automatically in maps where#c monsters near your level# appear. Defeat these monsters to acquire #cPixel Power#. As you gather Pixel Power, the magic circle goes through 4 stages of growth. Upon reaching the#c final stage#,#c use the skill# to signal the Pixel Warrior to#c join the battle#, causing them to attack enemies for#c 1 min#. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cCannot be summoned if you have reached the Pixel Power limit for the day.#

string.name: h1
string.value: Pipi the Apprentice Magician fights by your side.\r\n#c[Pipi's Assistance]# Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 1,000%, Number of Attacks: 2

string.name: h2
string.value: Pipi the Apprentice Magician and Treasure Hunter Lloyd fight by your side.\r\n#c[Pipi's Assistance]# Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 1,000%, Number of Attacks: 2\r\n#c[Lloyd's Assistance]# Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 5

string.name: h3
string.value:
Pipi the Apprentice Magician, Treasure Hunter Lloyd, and Dragon Knight Harrier fight by your side.
#c[Pipi's Assistance]# Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 1,000%, Number of Attacks: 2
#c[Lloyd's Assistance]# Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 5
#c[Harrier's Assistance]# Max Enemies Hit: 9, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 4

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing for the heroes battling alongside the #cPixel Warriors#. Temporarily grants additional EXP for hunting monsters.

string.name: h
string.value: EXP +100% for 1 min when defeating monsters

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons #cPixel Warriors# automatically in maps where#c monsters near your level# appear. Defeat these monsters to acquire #cPixel Power#. As you gather Pixel Power the warriors' energy will charge up. When it is full, use the skill once more to summon a warrior to your current position to attack nearby enemies. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cCannot be summoned if you have reached the Pixel Power limit for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Defeat#c monsters near your level# to receive #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals. When you gather enough Pixel Power, #cPixel Monster Stage# is activated.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons #cSilverbristle#, the official animal of Pixel Kingdom. Defeat#c monsters near your level# while Silverbristle is summoned to obtain #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals. Silverbristle's energy gradually becomes stronger as you gather Pixel Power. After filling the energy gauge, use the skill once more to#c mount Silverbristle# and attack enemies. \r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: Grants #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals when hunting monsters near your level. Use to mount #cSilverbristle# when a sufficient amount of Pixel Power is gathered.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ride into battle on Silverbristle, the official animal of Pixel Kingdom. Activate once to mount, then again to perform a dash attack. Activate the skill while pressing Up to attack upward. The dash attack can be used from the air, and can be performed with the Jump key.\r\n\r\nMount Duration: 30 sec. 100% Knockback Resistance while mounted. Dash attack deals 2000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Mount Silverbristle for 30 sec, Grants #indieStance% Knockback Resistance while mounted. \nDash attack deals 2000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases EXP rewards by 200% for 30 sec when hunting monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nRide around on a Pirate Turtle mount that can use the double jump skill to move#c very quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons the Papyrus of Luck. You have a chance to obtain #cPixel Power# when you defeat monsters in hunting zones with#c monsters near your level# while the Papyrus is active. Obtaining a certain number of Pixel Power, will reveal#c one of the numbers# on the Papyrus's formula. After revealing#c three# numbers and#c completing the formula#, you will get Pixel Power and additional EXP based on the result of the formula.
Press the #cInteract/Harvest key# after completing the formula to randomly rearrange the positions of the numbers you revealed. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: Defeat monsters near your level to gain #c20 Pixel Power# at regular intervals.\r\nAdds #c1 random number# to the Papyrus equation every #c20th interval#.\r\nUpon completing the formula, you will receive#c1,500 Pixel Power# plus#c bonus EXP# based on the result of the formula (The EXP from the monster which completed the equation is multiplied).
