string.name: desc
string.value: Summons everyone's favorite tactician to collect supplies and transport them to the Alliance.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates the Riftbringer. 
Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones while Riftbringer is active has a chance to grant#c dimensional energy#. Once Riftbringer is completely filled with the#c dimensional energy#, a#c dimensional rift# will open and periodically summon#c Specter# monsters. Defeating these monsters grants#c Glory# and#c bonus EXP#. 

#cRight-click to toggle on/off.#

string.name: h
string.value: Defeating monsters near your level opens a#c dimensional rift# which summons Specter Monsters. Defeating these monsters grants #cGlory# and#c bonus EXP.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a #cPriest of Nerota# to search for Nerota's Relics. While summoned, defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones has a chance to grant #cGlory#. After you have gathered enough Glory, the priest will uncoverone of #cNerota's Relics#. Press the #cInteract/Harves keyt# near this relic to gain #cNerota's Power#. 

#cRight-click to turn On/Off.#
#cYou cannot summon the Priest of Nerota if you have already reached the daily Glory limit.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a #cPriest of Nerota# for #cNerota Relic Hunt.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a #cNerota's Blessing Orb# that lass for #c1 min# somewhere on the map. Touching this orb grants #cGlory#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates #cNerota's Protection# once every 10 sec for #c1 min,# dealing damage to nearby monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a Spisan piloting the#c Kaboom Bomber.# Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones has a chance to warm up the Kaboom Bomber, granting#c Glory.# The bomber's appearance changes according to its warm up stage. Use the skill# when Warm Up has reached its#c final stage,# to#c deploy# the bomber at your location where it will shoot flames.\r\n\r\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF. It will stop warming up if you exceed the daily Glory limit.#

string.name: h1
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 8 enemies for 250% damage 8 times over 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: h2
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 8 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: h3
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 15 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 45 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: h4
string.value: The deployed Kaboom Bomber attacks up to 15 enemies in a wide area for 250% damage 8 times for 60 sec. It cannot Warm Up or grant Glory if the skill is on cooldown.\r\n#cCooldown: 60 sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Press the Interact/Harvest key to drop a bomb. Can sink one Ebonstar Landing Ship.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates #cNerota's Protection# once every 10 sec for #c1 min,# dealing damage to nearby monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a #cNerota's Blessing Orb# that lass for #c1 min# somewhere on the map. Touching this orb grants #cGlory#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Destroys the enemy's siege engine. Aim at the Magi-bomb flying towards you, and attack it by#c clicking with the mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Destroys the enemy's siege engine. Aim at the Magi-bomb flying towards you, and attack it by#c clicking with the mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Seren, Templar of the sun god Mitra.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Red Aquastallion mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a powerful missile forward from Aquastallion's belly.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a Pinboom from Aquastallion's head.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a net missile from Aquastallion's mouth. Enemies hit by the net will be temporarily stunned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Aquastallion becomes temporarily invincible. Your HP will not be reduced by enemy missiles.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a protective shield using the Ancient Power extracted from Library Ghosts. You are protected from all attacks in the library when inside the protective shield.

string.name: h
string.value: Press the Interact/Harvest key to activate a protective shield for #c5 sec#.\r\n#cAll attacks are ignored# while within the protective shield.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates the Glory Guard Medal.
Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones while the Glory Guard Medal is active has a chance to grant#c Ancient Gods' Power#. Filling the Glory Guard Medal with power will activate #cGlory Guard's Brilliance#, instantly granting 2,000 Glory and a providing chance to gain glory from defeating monsters for the buff's duration.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: Activates #cGlory Guard's Brilliance#, granting 2,000 Glory.\r\nGrants Glory# when defeating regular monsters near your level while active.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates the Glory Guard Medal.
Defeating#c monsters near your level# in hunting zones while the Glory Guard Medal is active has a chance to grant#c Ancient Gods' Power#. Filling the Glory Guard Medal with power will activate #cGlory Guard's Brilliance#, granting a chance to gain glory from defeating monsters for the buff's duration.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: Activates #cGlory Guard's Brilliance#.\r\nGrants Glory# when defeating regular monsters near your level while active.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride an Ice Carriage mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride an Ice Carriage mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Blue Aquastallion mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Yellow Aquastallion mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a powerful missile forward from Aquastallion's belly.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a Pinboom from Aquastallion's head.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a net missile from Aquastallion's mouth. Enemies hit by the net will be temporarily stunned.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Goblin Bat that Phan lent you when he asked you to bust up Maple World's monsters. Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to make Tada excitedly appear and drop #cGoblin Coin# x1 periodically. (Can only trigger up to the daily limit)\n\n#cRight-click to toggle on/off.#

string.name: h
string.value: Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# for a slight chance to activate #cTada Time.# When #cTada Time# happens, the excited Tada will #cshow up multiple times in a row# (Up to 30 times).

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide the Haechi mount alongside your highest level character within the world. Press the Jump key twice in a row to use the High Altitude Flight skill. If your highest level character is Zero, Zero's gender will be determined based on your current character's gender.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide in glorious style on a Meso-Raining Goblin Cloud mount, which has the High Altitude Flight skill. Meso Cascade Pouches drop while you ride. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Thunder Bird mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the World Map Teleport skill while you're riding the Thunder Bird Mount.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tap your noble spirit to protect your charges from powerful opponents.

string.name: h
string.value: Boss Damage: +#bdR%\nIncreases damage by #x% up to #y% for each party member, including yourself, on the same map.\nIf you are not in a party, you will be considered to be in your own party.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Ghost of Halloween mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Radical Skateboard mount that can use the double jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Radical Skateboard mount that can use the double jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Holy Pink Beanity mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Help Arthur as he trains to become a knight!
Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# and there's a chance Arthur will help you, earning you #cRise Coin# x1 each time he does.

Once you've earned the maximum possible Rise Coins each day, Arthur's training will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# and there's a small chance Arthur will enter a #cfocused# state to deliver a #z-hit attack against monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Maple World's Santa mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Shrimp Tempura mount.

string.name: desc
string.value: Deal powerful damage to Arcanus with an old artillery weapon deserted in the Sharenian Culvert.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Snowmaker Mount that can use the High Altitude Flight skill. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.\r\n#cAfter getting on the mount in a map, double-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value:
Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to meet training goals and gain #cEileen's Support#. When active, you'll earn large quantities of #cRise Coins#.

Once you've earned the maximum possible Rise Coins each day, Eileen's Support will end for the day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to meet training goals and gain #cEileen's Support#. When active, you'll earn large quantities of #cRise Coins#.

Once you've earned the maximum possible Rise Coins each day, Eileen's Support will end for the day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of the Rune of Might bursts forth! #cTemporarily makes you gigantic.# You can jump higher by pressing the up arrow key and jump key together. Buff duration extenders do not apply to this item, and #cleaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of the Rune of Purification bursts forth! #cA Purifying Prism will appear. The prism absorbs energy when you eliminate monsters and releases the absorbed energy after a set amount, dealing damage to nearby enemies.# Buff duration extenders do not apply to this item, and #cleaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of the liberated rune bursts forth! #cConnects the rune and character via a divine beam to attack enemies in range.# Buff duration extenders do not apply to this item, and #cleaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of the liberated rune bursts forth! #cA flame is created upon attacking monsters, damaging them, and spreads to nearby enemies to deal bonus damage.# Buff duration extenders do not apply to this item, and #cleaving the map will dispel the effect.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to fill the pouch with magic.

Cannot be used once the maximum possible daily Rise Coins have been obtained.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: Once the pouch is filled, a powerful energy that attacks up to 15 enemies with 1,000% damage 5 times is released 4 times. #cRise Coins# can be earned each time the energy is released.

string.name: desc
string.value:
You are bound and weakened by the Black Mage's aura.

#cIncreases damage taken when hit by enemies.
Final Damage decreases when entering as a party of 2.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special Training with Toben Hair Hero.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Thunder Horse mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the World Map Teleport skill while you're riding the Thunder Horse Mount.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Bouncy Orange Mushroom mount, which can use the double jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: desc
string.value:
Join the <Neon Mushroom Watch> event in the VIP Hunter Club! If you discover a #cNeon Mushroom# while defeating #cmonsters near your level#, you can earn #c<Sweet 16 Points>#.

If you've already exceeded your daily limit for #c<Sweet 16 Coins>#, the Neon Mushroom Watch will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value:
If you discover a #cNeon Mushroom# while defeating #cmonsters near your level#, you can earn #c<Sweet 16 Points>#.
- #c100 points# for discovering a #cNeon Spore#
- #c200 points# for discovering a #cNeon Orange Mushroom#
- #c300 points# for discovering a #cNeon Horny Mushroom#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A VIP Premium service! A #c7-Star Catered Buffet#, just for patrons out on the hunt. As you enjoy the chef's banquet, you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># just for eating!

If you've already exceeded your daily limit for #c<Sweet 16 Coins>#,
the #c7-Star Catered Buffet# service will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value:
For each #cmonster near your level# that you defeat, you'll earn #c5 <Sweet 16 Points>#. If you defeat #c200# monsters near your level, the #c7-Star Catered Buffet# will arrive.



You'll get a delicious meal, plus 100 #c<Sweet 16 Points># just for eating it!

string.name: desc
string.value:
A VIP Premium service! A #c7-Star Catered Buffet#, just for patrons out on the hunt. As you enjoy the chef's banquet, you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># just for eating!

the #c7-Star Catered Buffet# service will end for that day.

#c<Sweet 16 Points># just for eating it!

string.name: desc
string.value: A skill provided to Hotel Maple VIPs.

string.name: name
string.value: VIP Skill: Increase Attack Power & Magic ATT

string.name: desc
string.value: Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Fireworks mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.\r\n#cPress the attack key while using the High Altitude Flight skill to set off the fireworks.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Kidult Shopping mount that can double jump and move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value:
A service for VIP Prestige members! #cTherapist Swanson# will come straight to you and rid you of your hunting fatigue.

As you hunt, the #caroma candle# will grow brighter and brighter, until it's #cTherapy Time#. Not only will it help you unwind, but you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># just for relaxing!

If you've already exceeded your daily limit for #c<Sweet 16 Coins>#, the #cSpecial Therapy# service will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value:
For every 20 #cmonsters near your level# that you defeat, you'll earn #c<Sweet 16 Points># based on the candle gauge.
 #c- Lv. 1: 40 points#
 #c- Lv. 2: 60 points#
 #c- Lv. 3: 100 points#

Upon defeating 300 monsters near your level, Therapy Time will start, and you'll earn many more #c<Sweet 16 Points>#. 

#cYou can earn 800 points in Therapy Time, up to 5 times per day.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A flute once belonging to Baek Gong, now used for training purposes. Eliminate #cmonsters near your level,# and a #cSonic Aura# may appear. 

If you've exceeded the number of #c<Awakening Coins># you can obtain for the day, the training will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value: If you eliminate monsters near your level and find Sonic Aura x10, Baek Gong's flute will begin to play, and you'll be able to find more Sonic Aura.\n(Up to #z can be found while the flute is playing.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride an Alluring Whale mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sword that carries Chun Gong's energy. As you proceed with hunting, you can fill up the #cSword Energy# to obtain #c<Awakening Coins>#.

If you've exceeded the number of #c<Awakening Coins># you can obtain for the day, the training will end for that day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Eliminate #cmonsters near your level# to fill up the #cSword Energy# 10 times, and a #cGiant Training Dummy# will be summoned. 
If you eliminate #cthree# Giant Training Dummies, Chun Gong will perform his #csword dance#, allowing you to obtain many <Awakening Coins> at once. 

#c- Upon eliminating each Giant Training Dummy, you'll earn <Awakening Coin> x10.
#c- When Chun Gong performs his sword dance, you'll randomly obtain <Awakening Coin> x #w, #v, or #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fritto fires his revolver to attack enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Bullets hit up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Hit enemies explode to attack up to 3 additional enemies for 40% damage 1 time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Switch to Pollo on the battleground.

string.name: h
string.value: If used in combination with left and right arrow keys, can switch while dashing. Use the skill without the directional keys to switch in place. Shares cooldown with Pollo's Quick Switch. Cooldown: 4 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Puppy charges forth to maul enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Puppy charges up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Hit enemies are stunned for 1.5 sec. Cooldown: 5 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fritto dances the courtship dance in a chicken suit.

string.name: h
string.value: Attacks up to #mobCount nearby enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Hit enemies have reduced speed. Cooldown: 15 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Inferno Wolf escapes and wipes out everything in sight.

string.name: h
string.value: The Inferno Wolf jumps up high and deals #damage% damage to #mobCount enemies in the area in front of it. Hit enemies are stunned for 3 sec. Shares cooldown with Pollo's Fireworks Finale. Cooldown: 50 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pollo shoots multiple bowgun bolts at enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Shoots bolts to attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s).

string.name: desc
string.value: Switch to Fritto on the battleground.

string.name: h
string.value: If used in combination with left and right arrow keys, can switch while dashing. Use the skill without the directional keys to switch in place. Shares cooldown with Fritto's Quick Switch. Cooldown: 4 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pollo unleashes a dizzying barrage of bowgun bolts to confuse enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Attacks #mobCount enemies in the targeted area, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Cooldown: 15 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pollo shoots a huge, specially-crafted Gatling Bowgun at the enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Shoots the Gatling Bowgun to attack up to #y enemies for #x% damage 12 times. Hold down the key to keep firing. Attack ends when the key is released. Cooldown: 20 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Inferno Wolf escapes and wipes out everything in sight.

string.name: h
string.value: The Inferno Wolf jumps up high and deals #damage% damage to #mobCount enemies in the area in front of it. Hit enemies are stunned for 3 sec. Shares cooldown with Fritto's Fireworks Finale. Cooldown: 50 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Make the necessary preparations to assassinate your target.

string.name: h
string.value: After completing Time to Prepare at least 1 time, then upon either defeating #x enemies or attacking a boss #u times, damage increases by #y% for #time sec, for every #w times you've stacked Time to Prepare.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Renee's magic orb can gather large amounts of #cErda#.
Defeat #cmonsters near your level# for a chance to obtain #cNeo Stones# and gather the #cErda# to fill the magic orb. 
The skill ends if you've already exceeded your daily limit for #c<Neo Stones>#.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Defeat monsters near your level for a chance to obtain Neo Stone x1 and a small amount of #cErda#.
There's a low chance to discover a large concentration of #cErda#, which will completely fill the magic orb.

Once the orb is full of #cErda#, its power will enable you to find even more #cNeo Stones#.
#c(Can discover up to 30.)#

string.name: desc
string.value: Make the necessary preparations to assassinate your target.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ride the Shiny Crescent Moon and stack up Neo Castle, floor by floor.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Renee's magic music box can gather #cErda#.
Defeat #cmonsters near your level# for a chance to obtain #cNeo Stones# and gather the #cErda# to fill the magic music box. 
The skills ends if you've already exceeded your daily limit for #c<Neo Stones>#.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Defeat monsters near your level for a chance to obtain Neo Stone x1 and a quantity of #cErda#.
Once the music box is full of #cErda#, it will play a song. While the song is playing, every monster you obtain will earn you Neo Stone x1.

Occasionally, the music box will play a rhythmic beat, granting you Neo Stone x3 for every monster you defeat while it's playing.#c
#c(You can defeat up to 20 monsters while the music is playing.)#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Warm Tangerine mount, which can use the double jump skill to move #cvery quickly#. #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: h1
string.value: DEF: +10, Speed: 170, Auto Pilot Speed: Very Fast, Jump: 120

string.name: desc
string.value:
A magic bell that can call Snowflake Reindeer.
Defeat #cmonsters near your level# for a chance to obtain #cNeo Stones#. 
The skill ends if you've already exceeded your daily limit for #cNeo Stones#.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value:
If you defeat #cmonsters near your level# and gather #cNeo Stone# x10, a #clarge magic bell# will appear.
Destroy the magic bell for a chance to call Snowflake Reindeer.
- Destroying the magic bell will also earn you #cNeo Stone# x20.
- If the Snowflake Reindeer do appear, you'll gain an additional #cNeo Stone# x20.

string.name: desc

string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to move like Peplock Holmes, the greatest detective in Maple World.

string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nUse the active skill of the currently equipped Special Skill Ring obtained from Tower of Oz.

string.name: h
string.value: Uses the currently equipped Special Skill Ring's active skill

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing from the Wildflower Spirits of Blooming Forest.

string.name: name
string.value: Blooming Skill: Increase Attack Power & Magic ATT

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the amount of #cEnemy DEF Ignored#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases #cArcane Power#.\n\nYou must have completed the quest #cA Greater Power#, after your 5th Job Advancement, to receive this effect.

string.name: desc
string.value: Travel alongside the Flower Spirits. Obtain #cWarm Sunlight# dropped upon defeating enemies near your level to #cfill 1 slot of the Flower Gauge with sunlight power# and receive #c<Blooming Coin> x1#. Ends upon reaching the daily #c<Blooming Coin># limit.\n\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
Travel alongside Hana the Red Flower Spirit.
#cFloral Blessing# activates once the Flower Gauge is filled with sunlight power.
#c[Hana: Sow Seeds]# Grants 20 Blooming Coins and deals 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.

string.name: h2
string.value:
Travel alongside Hana the Red Flower Spirit and Duna the Blue Flower Spirit.
#cFloral Blessing# activates once the Flower Gauge is filled with sunlight power.
#c[Hana: Sow Seeds]# Grants 20 Blooming Coins and deals 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.
#c[Duna: Rain Call]# Deals 1200% damage to up to 15 enemies 5 times. Occasionally rains flowers, granting an additional 10 Blooming Coins.

string.name: h3
string.value:
Travel alongside Hana Red Flower Spirit, Duna the Blue Flower Spirit, and Sena the Yellow Flower Spirit.
#cFloral Blessing# activates once the Flower Gauge is filled with sunlight power.
#c[Hana: Sow Seeds]# Grants 20 Blooming Coins and deals 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.
#c[Duna: Rain Call]# Deals 1200% damage to up to 15 enemies 5 times. Occasionally rains flowers, granting an additional 10 Blooming Coins.
#c[Sena: Sun's Embrace]# Causes 5 flowers to bloom, dealing 1000% damage to up to 5 enemies 5 times in a random location. The blooms last for 15 seconds. Occasionally, a fancy flower will bloom, granting an additional 20 Blooming Coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to become the cutest pink rabbit in Maple World and move that little tail like there's no tomorrow.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Surround yourself with impenetrable armor, temporarily making yourself immune to all damage (except fall damage) and abnormal status (except for incapacitation from electrical wires).

string.name: h
string.value: Temporarily immune to damage and abnormal status.\r\nHowever, you're still vulnerable to fall damage and electrical wires.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's #cGift Showtime#, presented by Manager Fritto. You can obtain loads of EXP by performing a #cGift Showtime# special, up to 10 times a day!\n\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: Defeat monsters near your level to send your viewers a thank-you gift.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rush in the direction you're moving to tackle an opponent ahead of you. If the opponent you tackle has the ball, the ball will start rolling across the field.

string.name: h
string.value: - #cTackle# applies stun for 2 sec.\r\n- If you have the ball, you can't perform tackles, even if you rush.\r\n#c- Cooldown: 3 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Kick the ball in the direction you are moving. Of course, you need to have the ball before you can kick it.

string.name: h
string.value: Hold the key down to build up power, then kick it a long distance.\r\n- If the ball hits another character, that character can take the ball.\r\n#c- Cooldown: 3 sec.

string.value: Kick the ball in the direction you are moving. Of course, you need to have the ball before you can kick it.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's #cPrancing with the Stars# presented by Manager Fritto! You can obtain loads of EXP by performing in #cPrancing with the Stars#, up to 10 times a day!\n\n#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: Defeat monsters near your level to broadcast together with friends in the LIVE Studio.

string.name: name
string.value: Prancing with the Stars: Orange Mushroom, Gamma, and Omega

string.name: name
string.value: Prancing with the Stars: Superstar Pink Bean

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 3]
The 3 chick siblings are delivering a special full-course meal. Defeat enemies near your level to #cfill up the delivery gauge# and get #c5 Chu Chu Points# per enemy. Ends if you reached the daily #c<Chu Chu Coin># limit.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
Delivers Pibik's appetizer.
#cFood# is placed when the delivery gauge is full.
#c[Appetizer: Big Hand]# Chu Chu Coin Obtained: 20, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5

string.name: h2
string.value:
Pibik and Pimi deliver the appetizer and main dish, respectively.
#cFood# is placed when the delivery gauge is full.
#c[Appetizer: Big Hand]# Chu Chu Coin Obtained: 20, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5
#c[Main Dish: Lion's Roar]# Chu Chu Coin Obtained: 40, Damage: 1200%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5

string.name: h3
string.value:
Pibik, Pimi, and Pidol deliver the appetizer, main dish, and dessert, respectively.
#cFood# is placed when the delivery gauge is full.
#c[Appetizer: Big Hand]# Chu Chu Coin Obtained: 20, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5
#c[Main Dish: Lion's Roar]# Chu Chu Coin Obtained: 40, Damage: 1200%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5
#c[Dessert: Food Truck]# Chu Chu Coin Obtained: 60, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5, Attack Repetition Interval: 5

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain Chu Chu Coin x20 and deal 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain Chu Chu Coin x40 and deal 1200% damage to up to 15 enemies 5 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain Chu Chu Coin x60 and deal 1000% damage to up to 15 enemies 5 times, repeating it 5 times at set intervals.

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 2]
Playtime is essential for children! Use the toys children like for them to grow up happily. For every 20 enemies near your level you defeat,
the #cChildlike Gauge fills 1 slot#.
Ends upon reaching the daily #c<Memory Token># limit.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
When their hearts are filled with love, the twins can channel that love into a powerful wave attack.
#cHeart Wave# is shot when the childlike gauge is full.
#c[Happy Playtime: Heart Wave]# Memory Token Obtained: 20, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5

string.name: h2
string.value:
The twins love to play and cause a mess everywhere they go by jumping up and down.
#cMess Everywhere# activates when the childlike gauge is full.
#c[Happy Playtime: Mess Everywhere]# Memory Token Obtained: 20, Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain Memory Token x20 and deal 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain Memory Token x20 and deal 1000% damage to up to 15 enemies 5 times.

string.name: name
string.value: Rith and Ellie: Attack Power & Magic ATT

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the amount of #cEnemy DEF Ignored#.

string.name: name
string.value: Rith and Ellie: Normal Enemy Damage

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase #cArcane Power#.\n\nMust have completed the quest #cA Greater Power#, after your 5th Job Advancement, to receive this effect.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Rose Sightseeing mount, capable of High Altitude Flight, to move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Balloon Puppy.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Full of Spring mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 2]
A camera imbued with the mysterious power of Rith and Ellie. For every 15 enemies near your level you defeat,
the #cFilm Gauge fills 1 slot#.
Ends upon reaching the daily #c<Memory Token># limit.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
Rith and Ellie take on cute poses and help in battle.
#cClick Click with Everyone# activates when the film gauge is full.
#c[Click Click Momentree: Click Click with Everyone]# Memory Token Obtained: 20, summons Rith and Ellie for Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5. Summoned Rith and Ellie disappear after attacking enemies 4 times.

string.name: h2
string.value:
Rith and Ellie take cool photos of the hero.
#cOne, Two, Three, Momentree# activates when the film gauge is full.
#c[Click Click Momentree: One, Two, Three, Momentree]# Memory Token Obtained: 20, summons Rith and Ellie for Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 5. Summoned Rith and Ellie disappear after attacking enemies 4 times.

string.name: name
string.value: Click Click Momentree: One, Two, Three

string.value: Obtain Memory Token x20 and deal 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.

string.name: name
string.value: Click Click Momentree: One, Two, Three

string.value: Obtain Memory Token x20 and deal 1000% damage to up to 10 enemies 5 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain Memory Token x20 and deal 1000% damage to up to 15 enemies 5 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a 7000-Day Joy mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a watermelon mount, which can double jump and move #cvery quickly.#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Surfing mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.value: Ignition Blaze: Attack Power & Magic ATT

string.value: Increases the amount of #cEnemy DEF Ignored#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase #cArcane Power#.\n\nMust have completed the quest #cA Greater Power#, after your 5th Job Advancement, to receive this effect.

string.name: name
string.value: DJ Selena's Showtime! - Flame Group Dance

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Flaming Mike presents a flashy dance with disciplined moves. Every time 100 enemies near your level are defeated,
the #cfever gauge fills up a slot#. When three slots are filled, the fever skill activates.
It ends when the #c<daily fever activations># reach 20.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
Flaming Mike presents a splendid dance with disciplined moves.
When the fever gauge fills up three slots, #cFlame Group Dance# activates.
#c[Flame Group Dance: Burning Up]# Mike deals 1600% damage 5 times to up to 10 enemies.
#c[Flame Group Dance: Finishing Stroke]# Mike deals 1600% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies in a wider range.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mike deals 1600% damage 5 times to up to 10 enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mike deals 1600% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies in a wider range.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Walking Time With Bichon mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Mister Ignition presents a splendid dance he has been keeping secret. Every time 50 enemies near your level are defeated,
the #cfever gauge fills up a slot#. When five slots are filled, the fever skill activates.
It ends when the #c<daily fever activations># reach 20.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
Mister Ignition presents a splendid dance he has been keeping secret.
When the fever gauge fills up five slots, #cAmazing Ignition# activates.
#c[Amazing Ignition: This Is Nothing]# Mister Ignition deals 1600% damage 5 times to up to 10 enemies.
#c[Amazing Ignition: Amazing Movement]# Mister Ignition periodically deals 1000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies nearby for 5 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mister Ignition deals 1600% damage 5 times to up to 10 enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mister Ignition deals 1000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies in a wider range.

string.name: name
string.value: Amazing Ignition Finale: Super Amazing Movement

string.name: desc
string.value: Mister Ignition deals 1000% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies in a wider range.

string.name: name
string.value: DJ Selena's Showtime! - Amazing Ignition Finale

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Mister Ignition presents a dance he has been hiding up his sleeves. Every time 50 enemies near your level are defeated,
the #cfever gauge fills up a slot#. When five slots are filled, the fever skill activates.
It ends when the #c<daily fever activations># reach 20.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value: Mister Ignition presents a dance he has been hiding up his sleeves.\r\nWhen the fever gauge fills up five slots, #cAmazing Ignition Finale# activates.\r\n#c[Amazing Ignition Finale: Super Amazing Movement]# Mister Ignition periodically deals 1000% 5 times to up to 15 enemies nearby for 5 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Hologram Inferno Wolf mount, which can use the double jump skill to move #cvery quickly.# #cDouble-click a destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available in some regions, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount in additional regions.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Shoot the #cBeach Ball# to a direction you want.

string.name: h
string.value: Shoot Beach Ball to the cursor's direction

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Thunder Goldfish mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can use the World Map Teleport skill while you're riding the Thunder Goldfish.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nA luxurious yacht used in the Full Moon Party.\nAllows you to ride the Midnight Luxury Yacht mount, which has the High Altitude Flight skill. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nRide around on a Sparkly Rainbow mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cStar Candy# is calling you!\n\n#cYou can talk to Ant and cancel the transformation.#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Busy Worker Ant.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nFairy Wings will help you with High Altitude Flight. Press the Jump key twice in a row to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nCan ride a Blue Pony that can use the Double Jump skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nMove #cvery quickly# with Glowy Butterflies that can use the Jag Jump skill. #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level : 1]\nMove #cvery quickly# with black angel wings that can use the Double Jump skill. #cDouble-click the destination on the World Map# to fly there automatically. (Auto Pilot is only available on some continents, including Victoria Island. #cBuy a Flight Permit from Instructor Irvin# to use the Smart Mount on more continents.)

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to ride a Franken Ghost mount. Double-tap the jump key in town to use the High Altitude Flight skill.

string.value: Get discounts when purchasing items from stores and bonuses when selling items to stores. (Does not apply to items with resell prices of 70% or more of their purchase prices.)\n[Requirement]: #cGuild Lv. 10+#\n[Required Skill]: #cSpotting Small Change Lv. 3+#

Increases your success rate when you use regular scrolls or Spell Traces. #cExcludes the following scroll types#:

Bonus Potential Scroll

string.value: When you fail a scroll or Spell Trace enhancement, there's a chance the upgrade count will not be consumed.\n[Requirement]: #cGuild Lv. 25+#\n[Required Skill]: #cItem Salvation Lv. 4+#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Shoot an arrow at a high angle. If you press and hold the skill key, you will fire continuously. While firing,#c press Up or Down to control the force of the shot#.
While casting the skill, press the Interact/Harvest key to set up an Arrow Blaster--which fires arrows automatically--at your location. With Action Customization enabled, you can set up the Arrow Blaster by pressing the attack key, instead of the Interact/Harvest key.
Unaffected by attack reflection.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.value: [Master Level: 1] Receive the Dark Angel's blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you use a skill, the duration is adjusted and the cooldown is reduced. A damage increase effect that can be stacked occurs depending on the attacker.

string.name: h
string.value:
Reduces Zero's attack skill cooldown by #y seconds (excluding used skill, Transcendent skill, and 5th Job skills).
#c[Detect]#: When Alpha attacks, damage increases by 1% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 5 times.
#c[Strength]#: When Beta attacks, damage increases by 1% for 20 seconds. Can stack up to 5 times
#cEffect for [Detect] and [Strength] remains even when tagged.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill is unlocked at Lv. 100.

string.name: desc
string.value: Receive the Goddess Rhinne's blessings, reducing the damage taken from enemies while ignoring a portion of their defense. \n#cStrengthen this skill by collecting Goddess Teardrops.# \r\n

string.value: When attacking, damage +#x% for #time sec. Max stacks: #maxLevel

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A battle style unique to Alpha and Beta. Tags a Zero on standby, then moves slightly forward.\n#cRight-click to turn Forward Tag ON/OFF#.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Tag]#: While on standby, use Zero's skills to switch attackers.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec. \n#c[Assist]#: After using Tag to switch, for up to 3 seconds, use Assist for fire support. Cannot be activated while using the previous Assist skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nWith the aid of a legendary spirit, you can now use scrolls on items that you can't equip.

string.name: desc
string.value: Channel the power of the Transcendents to increase the Attack Power, Magic ATT, Attack Speed, Speed, Jump, Defense, Elemental Resistance and Status Resistance of all nearby party members. Can be toggled #cOn/Off.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Compress local time to move quickly.\n#cCommand Lock : Right-click#

string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, press arrow keys UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT and then use the skill to move in the corresponding direction \nDouble-tap UP UP, DOWN DOWN, LEFT LEFT, RIGHT RIGHT to move in that direction\n#cCan be used on a ladder or rope. Can be linked with Burst Jump

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants the Goddess Rhinne's protection, temporarily increasing all stats for you and your party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Capture this moment in your Hourglass. If you get knocked out, time will rewind to the captured moment instead.\nNot affected by Cooldown reset.

Also increases damage for a short time if Zero is Level 200 or above.\nTime Holding is not affected by cooldown reset and does not affect other skills that are not affected by cooldown reset.

string.name: desc
string.value: Beta's attack has a chance to bind boss monsters. Bound enemies will bleed and are more vulnerable to Alpha's attacks. Critical Bind does not share resistance with other incapacitation skills. Using Critical Bind on a boss with an active incapacitation effect whose remaining duration is less than half of Critical Bind's duration will refresh its duration to match that of Critical Bind.

string.value:
Beta's Attack Bind Chance: #prop%, Duration: #time sec. Targets who are not stunned, including normal monsters, will be debuffed for the same amount of time.
Alpha's attacks gain +#x% Critical Rate and +#z% Critical Damage against targets who are stunned by Critical Bind.
The Bind effect will expire after inflicting damage proportional to the remaining effect duration.
#cStunned enemies will resist Critical Bind, and be immune to stunning, for #w sec. afterwards.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Attacks enemies in front of you, and creates a vortex at the target location that causes additional damage.

string.name: h
string.value: Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount.\n#c[Vortex]#: Max Enemies Hit: #x, Damage: #y% per 0.5 sec, Number of Attacks: #z, Duration: #s sec.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1] Receive the Dark Angel's blessing.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Unlock your hidden potential in your moment of need.

string.name: ph
string.value: All attacks become critical hits when HP is below #z%, MP Cost: #y%

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Transform your axe into a giant sword to freeze multiple enemies at once. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c20 or higher#.\n[Command: #cUp, Up + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Freeze Chance: #prob%, Freeze Duration: #time sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Damages enemies over time with a blast of icy power. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c40 or higher#.\n[Command: #cDown + Right + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage Over Time: #dot% damage every 1 sec for #dotTime sec.

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Strike enemies hard with a chance to stun. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c5 or higher.#\n[Command: #cDown + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Monsters Hit: #mobCount, Stun Chance: #prop%, Stun Duration: #time sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Curse your opponents by turning them into Ice Snails. Usable when Ice Gauge is charged to #c160 or higher#.\n[Command: #cDown, Up + Attack Key#]

string.name: ph
string.value: Ice Gauge Cost: #iceGageCon. Snail Chance: #prop%, Snail Duration: #time

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

string.name: desc
string.value: Expands Pink Bean's Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc Inventory tabs.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently adds #x Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc Inventory slots.

string.name: desc
string.value: A curse you have been afflicted with since passing through Black Bean's strange portal.

string.name: h
string.value: Can equip all Warrior job equipment, but cannot obtain SP, cannot trade with other characters, and cannot gain Professions.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1] Grants the blessing of the White Angel.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful force is released, based on Willpower of the Alliance.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increases STR: +#strX, DEX: #dexX, INT: #intX, LUK: #lukX, ATT: #padX, Magic ATT: #madX

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nWith the aid of a legendary spirit, you can now use scrolls on items that you can't equip.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 3]\nAllows you to use alchemy to create items. The items you can create depend on your character level.

string.value: Allows you to create items under Lv. 105.

string.value: Allows you to create items under Lv. 135.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses bamboo to attack an enemy.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 2]\nAllows you to board a Spaceship. Tapping left or right twice enhances Movement Speed and Jump. #cExpires: MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM/PM UTC#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nTapping left or right twice enhances Movement Speed and Jump. #cExpires: MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM/PM UTC#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nAllows you to change the condition of Krypto in the Space Mine. #cExpires: TKTKTK#

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nUtilizes the rage of Pharaoh as an attack.

string.name: h1
string.value: Eliminates all monsters inside the Pyramid with a single blow.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nFly through the sky using the mysterious powers of the dragon race. You will take great damage if you fall. \nThis skill costs 90 MP to activate.

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP.

string.value: MP Cost: 80, Max HP and Max MP: +40%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's power is practically overflowing!

string.name: h
string.value:
Attack Speed: +1, bonus +1 for every #x level(s)
Critical Rate: #y + 1% more for every #z level(s)
Damage: +#w% for every level
ATT increases #v for every #s level(s)
Warrior Weapon Mastery: +#u%

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's basic powers stem from being a natural-born boss monster. His awesome abilities make him totally different from regular monsters.

string.name: h
string.value:
Perform a body attack. Damage is #x% + #y% per level. Body attacks are not affected by attack reflection and do not work while hanging on ropes.
Knockback Resistance: +#stanceProp%, 
Jump: +#psdJump, Speed: +#psdSpeed, Max Speed: +#speedMax 
Max HP: +#mhpR%, Max MP: +#mmpR%
Abnormal Status Resistance: +#asrR, Ignore DEF: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, Damage Taken: -#damAbsorbShieldR% 
Item Drop Rate: +#dropR%, Mesos Obtained: +#mesoR%, EXP Obtained: +#expR%
Chance for Yummy Meat to drop every time you eliminate a monster.
When not performing a body attack, #u Mini Bean(s) appear at a #w2% chance to deal #v% + #w% damage per level #u2 time(s) to nearby enemies. However, after a Mini Bean attacks, no more Mini Beans will be formed for #v2 sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized using tools can be fun! Keep tapping the attack key to deal several consecutive attacks with lots of tools and move forward. You don't bump into monsters when moving forward.\nIncreases damage for other skills after use. Can be linked to other skills.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec
#c1st hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Final Damage of next skill: +#x%
#c2nd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #s, Final Damage of next skill: +#q% 
#c3rd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: #w2, Final Damage of next skill:+ #q2%
#c4th hit#: Required Level: 80, Max Enemies Hit: #speedMax, Damage: #psdJump% + #psdSpeed% per level, Number of Attacks: #dotInterval, Final Damage of next skill: +#dotTime%

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized using tools can be fun! Keep tapping the attack key to deal 4 consecutive attacks with lots of tools and move forward.\nIncreases damage for other skills after use. Can be linked to other skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized rolling around is way faster than walking. Can be used on the ground and in the air. It even changes depending on where it is used. Not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #cOn Ground#: MP Cost: #mpCon per sec. While you hold down the skill key, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #w% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount while moving. After a set time, size gets bigger, Damage: #z% + #s% per level, Max Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n#cIn Air#: MP Cost: #v, press the right arrow twice during a jump to use it and rolls forward in the air to attack, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #y% + 1% for every #u level(s), Number of Attacks: #q2, Cooldown: 0.5 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean lands from the air more slowly than usual. It reminds you of something...

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Falling Speed during Keydown: #x, Can only be used in the air.

string.name: desc
string.value: When Pink Bean is tired from exploring Maple World, he has many cool ways to relax. This skill produces different effects depending on the action. Not affected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all methods#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec, Won't bump into monsters after use for +#x sec, EXP obtained: +#y%, Cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.
#cTongue Out#: Max Enemies Hit: #z, Enemy DEF: -#s%
#cNom Nom Meat#: Recovers #w% of your Max HP per sec
#cZzz#: Fully Recovers HP and MP, ATT: +#u%
#cMysterious Cocktail#: Status Resistance: +#v
#cPink Bean Headset#: ATT: +#s2%, Status Resistance: +#w2

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves growing monstrous plants, and this is a perfect spot for one! The plant's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cPosie#: Use with the down arrow key, Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #x% + #u% per level, Duration: #v sec
#cBreezy#: Max Enemies Hit: #psdSpeed, Damage: #z% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #w
#cPretty#: Use with the up arrow key, Duration: #s sec, Seduces to decrease DEF by #s2%, Speed by #psdJump

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves soaring through the skies of Maple World! Not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Duration for charging: #time sec. The more you charge, the further you can jump. Reach max distance in #dotTime sec\nYou can use direction keys during the jump to adjust the distance. Attack a max of #mobCount enemies, inflicts #damage% + damage #w% per level, then jump again, up to #z more time(s).\nCan be used in the air, but will drop you to the ground immediately.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean cheers on the whole party with his special brand of adorableness! Boosts Party EXP, Speed, Attack Power, and Magic Attack Power. However, the obtained EXP bonus is halved for any party members on different maps than the caster.\nUnaffected by buff duration increases.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec, Cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nDuration: #time sec, All party member EXP: +#indieExp%, Speed: +#indieSpeed, ATT/Magic ATT: +#indiePadR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is one of the finest yo-yo-ers of this generation! Watch this burning trick that clobbers enemies multiple times. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
You can get up to #x yo-yo(s) every #s sec, and they are used when you use the skill.
#c1st Hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Can be used consecutively as a 2-hit attack.
#c2nd Hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #w% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #q2. Use the skill consecutively to link as one hit.
#cBuff#: Blazing Yo-yo Damage: +#s2%, Duration: #time sec, can be stacked up to #u2 time(s). Buff disappears when a skill that is not Blazing Yo-yo is used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean's love for all things pink can be... dangerous. This knocks over a pink pillar to deal heavy damage. During cooldown, there's a chance for Mini Beans to come to your aid, and every time they attack it lowers the cooldown on this skill. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #z% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Chance to summon Mini Beans during cooldown: +#y%
Each time Mini Beans attack, cooldown decreases by #x sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is a huge music buff, and has no qualms about busting out with his instruments. Each instrument has its own special effect.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cElectric Guitar#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #x% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, When attack hits, party members' ATT and M. ATT will increase by #v% for #time sec
#cWhistle#: Max Enemies Hit: #u2, Damage: #z% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #psdSpeed, Hit Enemies will get DoT of #w% + 1% per level for #v2 sec
#cMegaphone#: Max Enemies Hit: #q2, Damage: #s% + #s2% per level, Hit enemies will have their accuracy decrease by #y% for #psdJump sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: With each attack, Pink Bean's fan club members, the Mini Beans, come out and attack alongside Pink Bean. What great groupies!

string.name: h
string.value: Chance to summon Mini Beans on attack: #z%, Duration: #x, Number of Mini Beans summoned: #u\nMini Beans' attacks: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #s% per level\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off# with the skill key.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It won't copy certain movement skills, and while it will act out summoning and buff skills, they'll have no additional effect.\nPink Bean sometimes will sometimes look back, notice the shadow, and wonder whether shadows can do that.\n* The shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is #x% of the final damage for #time sec, can summon up to 3 shadows, cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Jealous of a goddess's boon to her followers, Pink Bean came up with a way to temporarily increase the stats of all his party members.\nThis effect stacks with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, Rhinne's Protection and Hero of El Nath. They say imitation is the highest form of flattery.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, won't bump into monsters after use, cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nIncreases all stats assigned APs by 1% for every #y level for #time sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean is interested in moving through portals and keeps on opening new ones to random places. Sometimes someone familiar comes out of those portals.\nThere are still many devoted to following Pink Bean. Still as popular as ever.\nGo, Pink Beans! is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, opens portals within a fixed range and summons someone that resembles Pink Bean.\nThat someone is angry and creates at least #x and at most #y areas. Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Attacked: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #q% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Ballerina Pink Bean dons a tutu and gives a twirl. That's some incredible centrifugal force! Strong enough to break through rocks, even.\nCan move while using. Increases Damage, attack range, and Speed when used long enough. \nCannot be copied by Pink Shadow.

string.name: h
string.value: This is a continuous channeled skill. Hold the skill key down to cast continuously for up to #time sec. Increases damage, attack range, and speed when used longer than a specific duration.\nPer Attack - MP Cost: MP #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #x% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Doubles Final Damage when used longer than a specific duration.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loves zooming around on a scooter made just for him! And don't worry! It's not a battle scooter or anything, so it won't even sting if he hits you with it.\nCannot be copied by Pink Shadow.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon per second. While holding the skill key, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + 1% per #y level(s), Number of Attacks: #attackCount while moving. Speed: #x, Max Key-down Time: #time sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean has taken a keen interest in the sculptures he saw while traveling through Maple World. Now he's recreated his visit to the Temple of Time.\nLook at those masterfully-crafted sculptures! Wait, why are they moving? What the... Ahhh!\nTwilight of Gods ignores damage reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP cost: #mpCon. Re-creates Twilight of Gods for #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #attackCount, Number of Attacks: #mobCount per sculpture for the duration. Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cAriel#: Damage: #u% + #u2% per level, every #w sec
#cSolomon the Wise and Rex the Wise#: Damage: #v% + #q% per level, every #s sec
#cHugin and Munin#: Damage: #q2% + #v2% per level, every #w2 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean realized using tools can be fun! Keep tapping the attack key to deal 4 consecutive attacks with lots of tools and move forward.\nIncreases damage for other skills after use. Can be linked to other skills.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec
#c1st hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Final Damage of next skill: +#x%
#c2nd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #s, Final Damage of next skill: +#q% 
#c3rd hit#: Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: #w2, Final Damage of next skill:+ #q2%
#c4th hit#: Required Level: 60, Max Enemies Hit: #speedMax, Damage: #psdJump% + #psdSpeed% per level, Number of Attacks: #dotInterval, Final Damage of next skill: +#dotTime%

#cCommon for all hits#: MP Cost per attack: #mpCon, Skill Damage Increase buff once to skill other than Pink Bean Attack will disappear after use or after #time sec
