string.name: desc
string.value: Nya, nya, gettin' all the goods! Grants you bonus EXP and reduces nearby monster Defense. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Reduces DEF of up to #mobCount enemies by #z%

string.name: desc
string.value: Time to shred! Plays music for party members, increasing ATT and Magic ATT.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time, Party Member ATT and Magic ATT: +#indieMadR%

string.name: desc
string.value: This meat sure is easy on the stomach! Grants more EXP and gradually recovers HP. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Recovers #dotHealHPPerSecondR% of your Max HP per sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Feelin' fresh after that power nap! Grants more EXP and increases ATT. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Increases ATT by #indiePadR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cold and refreshing! Grants more EXP and increases Abnormal Status Resistance. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #indieAsrR.

string.name: desc
string.value: Music is my life! Grants more EXP, increases ATT and Abnormal Status Resistance. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: Won't bump into monsters after use for #y sec\nFor #time sec, EXP increases by #indieExp%, Increases ATT by #indiePadR, Increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #indieAsrR.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean looooooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It doesn't copy some movement skills, and copies summoning and buff skills but they have no effect.\nPink Bean sometimes looks back and sees the shadow acting after some delay. Wait, can a shadow do that?\nThe shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean's Dignity: Mini Bean Attack

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean loooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It won't copy certain movement skills, and while it will act out summoning and buff skills, they'll have no additional effect.\nPink Bean sometimes will sometimes look back, notice the shadow, and wonder whether shadows can do that.\n* The shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Attack enemies with a series of nesting dolls. Inside? None other than Pink Bean! Who knew playtime could be so deadly?!\nPink Bean's Matryoshka cannot be copied by Pink Shadow.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #y% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec
Invincible while casting
Tosses an open Matryoshka doll in the surrounding area to temporarily attack enemies, Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #s% + #u% per level, Number of Attacks: #w
Once thrown, the doll lasts for #z sec after Pink Bean's Matryoshka ends. It performs additional attacks upon disappearing, Max Enemies Hit: #v2, Damage: #s2% + #u2% per level, Number of Attacks: #w2
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A nesting doll thrown by Pink Bean. It attacks enemies nearby, and remains summoned for a set time even the skill has ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nesting doll thrown by Pink Bean. It attacks enemies nearby, and remains summoned for a set time even the skill has ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nesting doll thrown by Pink Bean. It attacks enemies nearby, and remains summoned for a set time even the skill has ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nesting doll thrown by Pink Bean. It attacks enemies nearby, and remains summoned for a set time even the skill has ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean can sort of double-jump now. Use this skill in mid-air to have Pink Bean jump farther.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Allows you to jump a greater distance

string.name: desc
string.value:
Pink Bean has grown interested in Shade's Soul Splitter, and can use it to divide one nearby enemy's soul.
The split soul explodes after 5 sec, and deals damage to nearby enemies.
Cannot be copied by Pink Shadow.
#Souls will not be split for bosses and stationary monsters.
What pink friend should he create this time?

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Split Souls from Pink Splitter explode after 5 sec, deal #x% + #y% per level damage 5 times up to 15 enemies, and award 100% bonus EXP from eliminated enemies during this time.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Pink Bean wants to start his own magic show, so he's 'borrowed' some tools from his fellow monsters. Upon defeating an enemy using a direct attack skill or on attacking a boss, you'll receive 1 Magic Tool per attack. You must gather a certain number of Magic Tools in order to use them, however they cannot be gathered while Magic Show Time is active or on cooldown.\nMagic Show Time is not affected by attack reflection and ends when you change maps.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consume all magic tools.
Usable once #x Magic Tools have been gathered, and last for #s seconds. While in combat, assaults up to #mobCount enemies near Pink Bean with Magic Tools, hitting #attackCount times and dealing #q% damage + #z% per level at regular intervals.
Enhanced at levels #y and level #w respectively to increase your attack speed and range.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Everyone listen to my music! There are three different colored spotlights for Superstar Pink Bean shining bright. Since the spotlights are set up only for Pink Bean, enemies under the spotlight take damage. On the other hand, Pink Bean is protected by the power of the spotlights and stats are enhanced. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Install 3 spotlights that shine on you for #time sec. Each spotlight deals #damage% + #s2% per level damage #attackCount times against up to #mobCount enemies within its area.
While you are within the spotlight, you gain Status Resistance +#w, Critical Rate +#v%, and Final Damage +#s%
You receive a separate bonus for each spotlight, up to 3 buffs. The stacked buffs are calculated cumulatively.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sets up spotlights that only follow Pink Bean. Since the spotlights are set up only for Pink Bean, they empower Pink Bean and damage enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Welcome to the magic show! The audience didn't want to be here, but it's too late for that now.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti lunges violently forward in pursuit of snacks, dealing damage to enemies in his path while moving forward in the direction of the arrow key pressed. Does not collide with enemies while moving forward.\nSnack Dash can be used as an attack and can be eup to 3 times in a row.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost per Use: #mpCon
#c[1st Hit]:# Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage% + #x% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#c[2nd Hit]:# Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #u% + #w% per level, Number of Attacks: #v
#c[3rd Hit]:# Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #q2% + #w2% per level, Number of Attacks: #v2

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti lunges violently forward in pursuit of snacks, dealing damage to enemies in his path while moving forward in the direction of the arrow key pressed. Does not collide with enemies while moving forward.\nSnack Dash can be used as an attack and can be eup to 3 times in a row.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti lunges violently forward in pursuit of snacks, dealing damage to enemies in his path while moving forward in the direction of the arrow key pressed. Does not collide with enemies while moving forward.\nSnack Dash can be used as an attack and can be eup to 3 times in a row.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Pepe gives Yeti a boost, allowing him to double-jump in the desired direction.
When used while holding the up arrow key, Yeti performs a high jump that inflicts damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
Yeti Flight is unaffected by attack reflection.
#cRight-click to lock the command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\n#cWhen used while holding the up arrow key#: performs a high jump that damages enemies upon landing. Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level

string.name: desc
string.value:
Pepe gives Yeti a boost, allowing him to double-jump in the desired direction.
When used while holding the up arrow key, Yeti performs a high jump that inflicts damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
Yeti Flight is unaffected by attack reflection.
#cRight-click to lock the command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\n#cWhen used while holding the up arrow key#:performs a high jump that damages enemies upon landing. Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level

string.name: desc
string.value:
Annoyed from constantly being attacked, Yeti accumulates rage. Upon use, Yeti becomes#c Enraged#.
While Enraged, the skill #cYeti Smash# replaces Snack Dash.
While Enraged, the duration of Hey Pepe!, Yeti Master Chef, and Hero of El Nath will not decrease, but some skills will be unavailable for use.
Yeti Rage is not affected by cooldown resets or buff duration increases.

string.name: h
string.value:
#c[Passive]# Obtain #x rage when defeating enemies with Snack Dash skill, or gain #u2 rage when attacking a boss#.
#c[Active]# Consumes #y rage upon use. Does not collide with enemies while casting. Unusable while hanging.
Transforms into an Enraged state for #time seconds, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Speed: +#indieSpeed
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#
#cYeti Smash# : MP Cost: #w2, Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #z

string.name: desc
string.value: Enraged, Yeti uses his massive fists to demolish enemies in his path.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost per Attack: #mpCon\n#c[1st Hit]:# Max Enemies Hit: #x, Damage: #w% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #y\n#c[2nd Hit]:# Required Level: 155, Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #w2% + #v2% per level, Number of Attacks: #u

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti zooms forward on his Homemade Jetpack.\nIt can be used in 8 directions and will move in the direction of the arrow keys pressed.\nThe Jetpack recharges periodically.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, pushes you forward a set distance.\nOne jetpack is readied every #z seconds, and you can hold up to #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti zooms forward on his Homemade Jetpack.\nIt can be used in 8 directions and will move in the direction of the arrow keys pressed.\nThe Jetpack recharges periodically.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, pushes you forward a set distance.\nOne jetpack is readied every #z seconds, and you can hold up to #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Having been disturbed while reading, Yeti retaliates by throwing his book at monsters in his path.\n#cYeti Smarts# skills grant rage based on the number of enemies hit. Permanently increases Final Damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Grants #x rage for each enemy hit.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#\n#c[Passive Effects: Final Damage +#pdR%]#

string.name: desc
string.value: Hungry, Yeti decides to cook a meal for the whole party. Increases Attack Power and EXP for you and nearby party members. This EXP buff is halved for characters on a different map than the caster.\nYeti Master Chef is unaffected by buff duration increases.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Does not collide with enemies while casting. Cannot be cast while hanging from a rope or ladder.\nDuration: #time sec, EXP for All Party Members: +#indieExp%, Attack Power: +#indiePadR%\n#cCooldown#: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: After a great deal of explosive research, Yeti has created the ultimate jetpack! Once learned, enables Homemade Super Jetpack while Enraged. Permanently increases Speed as a passive effect.

string.name: h
string.value:
#c[Passive]# Speed: +#psdSpeed
The Homemade Jetpack skill is replaced by Homemade Super Jetpack skill while Enraged
#c[Active]# #cHomemade Super Jetpack#: MP Cost: #x, pushes you forward a set distance.
One Super Booster Pack is readied every #z seconds, and you can carry up to #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti moves even faster with Super Jetpack.\n It can be used in 8 directions and will move in the direction of the arrow keys pressed.\nThe Super Jetpack recharges periodically.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, pushes you forward a set distance.\nOne Super Jetpack is readied every #z seconds, and you can hold up to #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti does his very best to defuse a bomb, but it explodes anyway, dealing damage in a wide area.\n#cYeti Smarts# skills grant rage based on the number of enemies hit. Permanently increases Final Damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Grants #x rage for each enemy hit.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#\n#c[Passive Effects: Final Damage +#pdR%]#

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti tries to build a snowman, but what he creates is an abomination whose howls of pain periodically damage nearby enemies at set intervals.\nEnemies hit by this attack will have their Speed reduced, and take increased damage from all sources. Yeti gains additional rage when defeating an afflicted enemy.\nHomemade Snowman is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Snowman Summon Duration: #time
Attacks #mobCount enemies in the area every #v2 seconds, Damage: #v% + #u2% per level
On Hit, enemies receive the following debuff: Speed: -#z, Damage Taken: +#y. Yeti gains an additional #x rage when defeating an afflicted enemy.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti, who dreams of becoming a great knight, rallies his friends, temporarily increasing the stats of him and his party members.\nStacks with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, Rhinne's Protection, and Pink Warrior.\nHero of El Nath is not affected by buff duration increases.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Does not collide with enemies while casting. Not usable while hanging from a rope or ladder.\nIncreases all stats by 1% for every #y level(s) for #time sec.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti's heightened rage enhances Yeti Smash, allowing for a more powerful 2nd Hit attack.

string.name: h
string.value: Yeti Smash's 2nd Hit can be used while enraged\n#cYeti Smash 2nd Hit#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #u% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #z

string.name: desc
string.value: Furious, Yeti demolishes enemies in his path.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[1st Hit]:# Max Enemies Hit: #x, Damage: #w% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #y\n#c[2nd Hit]:# Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #w2% + #v2% per level, Number of Attacks: #u

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti summons his old friend Pepe to aid him in battle.\nWhen used, increases EXP for a set period of time. When attacking enemies, there is a chance of summoning Pepes, who attack the enemy and grant Yeti additional rage.\nHey Pepe! is not affected by buff duration increases or attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Doesn't collide with monsters while casting. Not usable while hanging from a rope or ladder.
Increases EXP by #indieExp% for #time sec. Upon striking an enemy with an attack skill, there is a #prop% chance to summon 4 Pepes which attack #attackCount times inflicting #v% damage + #z% per level.
Grants #x additional rage for each Pepe summoned.
Note that after a Pepe is summoned, it cannot be summoned again for #y sec.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti attempts to develop an upgrade to his jetpack, then boom! A chemical explosion deals damage to enemies in a wide area.\n#cYeti Smarts# skills grant rage based on the number of enemies hit. Permanently increases Final Damage.\nYeti Smarts: Scientific Research is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Grants #x rage for each enemy hit.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#\n#c[Passive Effects: Final Damage +#pdR%]#

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti spots a pot of fiery peppers and tries to eat them. Overwhelmed with spicy capsaicin, Yeti accumulates rage at an accelerated rate for a set period of time.\nSpice Overload is not affected by cooldown resets or buff duration increases.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Doesn't collide with monsters while casting. Not usable while hanging from a rope or ladder.
Grants #y additional rage when using a Yeti Smarts skill for #time sec.
This effect ends when you activate Yeti Rage.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti's heightened rage further enhances Yeti Smash.\nYeti Smash's 2nd hit now fires a shockwave forward, striking enemies in a wide area.\nRage Enhancement: Explosive Fists is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Yeti Smash's 2nd hit now fires a shockwave forward.\nThe Shockwave strikes up to #mobCount enemies dealing #w% damage +#v% per level, #attackCount times.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: The house lights fade, the spotlight is on Yeti. He begins to play, and SCREECH! His violin releases a shockwave that deals damge to enemies in a wide area.\n#cYeti Smarts# skills grant rage based on the number of enemies hit. Permanently increases Final Damage. However, you can only obtain one rage per enemy struck using this skill.\nYeti Smarts: Violin Solo is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #u% + #v% per level. Number of Attacks: #attackCount which each hit #q times. Grants #x rage for each enemy hit.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.\n#c[Passive Effects: Final Damage +#pdR%]#

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti focuses all his rage to devastate his surroundings.\nRage Enhancement: Furious Roar is not affected by attack reflection and can only be used once for the duration of the Enraged state.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Invulnerable while casting.\nMax Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w% + #v% per level, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Number of Roars: #x\nUsable once for the duration of the Enraged state.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti, the most powerful creature in all of Maple World, possesses numerous abilities that make him totally different from normal monsters. At least that's what Yeti thinks.

string.name: h
string.value:
Upon collision with enemies, Yeti deals #x% touch-based damage + #y% per level. Touch-based attacks are not affected by attack reflection and do not take effect while hanging from ropes.
#c[Passive]# Knockback Resistance: +#stanceProp%, 
Jump: +#psdJump, Speed: +#psdSpeed, Max Speed: +#speedMax 
Max HP: +#mhpR%, Max MP: +#mmpR%
Abnormal Status Resistance: +#asrR, Ignore DEF: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, Damage Taken: -#damAbsorbShieldR% 
Item Drop Rate: +#dropR%, Mesos Obtained: +#mesoR%, EXP Obtained: +#expR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: As Yeti starts to recover his lost powers,his stats will continue to increase.

string.name: h
string.value:
Attack Speed: +1, plus an additional 1 for every #x level(s).
Critical Rate: #y + 1% more for every #z level(s)
Damage: +#w% for every level
Attack Power: +#v for every #s level(s)
Knuckle and Hand Cannon Weapon Mastery: +#u%

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the ancient Yeti Guardian that has been protecting the Yetis of the El Nath Mountains for generations. It seems the Yeti Guardian longed for Maple World's Goddess.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants 1 skill level for every 10 levels your highest level character has. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.name: desc

string.value: Surrounds your body with swirling particles that intercept all attacks to decrease the damage taken.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Lift up monsters or objects with the powers of psychokinesis. You cannot lift bosses, stationary monsters, or enemies 11+ levels higher than you. The following actions can be done while holding.
\c#cLevel 20 required to learn Psychic Clutch#
\c
\c#c[Psychic Smash]:# Using [Psychic Grab] while the monster is lifted up will throw the monster at nearby enemies, dealing damage.

string.name: h
string.value: #mobCount enemies lifted up and controlled with the powers of psychokinesis.\n#c[Psychic Smash]#: Enemies Hit Including Grabbed Enemy: #y, Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #z. Recovers 1 Psychic Point.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a whirling area of psychic destruction when using Psychic Force. Can also be used by pressing the up key and [Psychic Force]. Decreases DEF and Speed of monsters within the area, and increases Final Damage of Psychic Force.\n\c#cLevel 10 required to learn 'Mind Quake'#

string.name: h
string.value:
Reduces up to #mobCount enemies' speed by #s2%. Ignores an additional #s% DEF and applies a debuff that increases Final Damage by #w2% to Kinesis's attack.
Duration: #time. For enemies who leave the area of effect, the debuff lingers for a time equal to the time they spent in the area of effect.
#c[Psychic Point recovery during skill use: #ppRecovery]#
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon an entire train (completely empty, honest!) and smash it into your foes. Unaffected by enemy damage reflection skills.\nRequired skill: #cUltimate - Deep Impact Lv. 10#\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Ultimate - B.P.M#

string.name: desc
string.value: Support yourself with psychokinetic waves to walk on air. Your mind creates a path as you move.\n#cThis skill can be cast while using other skills.#

string.value: Move up quickly and in selected directions. Duration increases with skill level.\nCasting this skill while using other skills costs #c#x Psychic Points#.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Lift monsters or objects with the overwhelming powers of psychokinesis. You cannot lift bosses, stationary monsters, or enemies 11+ levels higher than you. Temporarily reduces the defense of enemies hit by the objects. The defense reduction effect doesn't stack with the effects of Ultimate - Metal Press and Ultimate - Psychic Shot.
Skill Requirements: #cPsychic Grab Lv. 20#
#cMust be level 30 or above to master Ultimate - Psychic Shockwave#
\c
\c#c[Psychic Smash]:# Using [Psychic Grab] while lifting a monster will throw that monster at enemies in front of you, dealing damage.
\c
\c#c[Ultimate - Psychic Shot]:# Pressing the up key and [Psychic Grab] while lifting a monster will throw the monster in the direction you are facing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates an aether sword that can be launched in #c8 directions# depending on the directional key pressed.\nThe sword vanishes at the limit of its range, leaving an aether crystal that replaces any existing crystal, regardless of creation cooldown.\nCan chain with Resonance Rush, but will not create an aether crystal if chained.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Aether Cost: #y\nDamage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Attacking with the aether sword sometimes gathers the surrounding energy into crystals. Using Resonance Rush will send you rushing towards the crystal.

string.name: h
string.value:
Duration: #time sec, up to #x can exist on the map.
If the max limit is reached and another one is created, the crystal with the lowest duration vanishes.
The crystal cannot be created near another crystal, or near certain platforms such as those that cannot be reached.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Creates a large aether sword that resonates with a nearby aether crystal, causing you to rush towards the crystal. This can be used in #c8 directions# depending on the directional key pressed.
Can only be used when an aether crystal is in range, or if chained from Impale.
If chained from Impale, the sword conjures faster and it follows in the direction of Impale.
Required Skill: #cImpale Lv. 3 or higher.#
#cLv. 10 required to learn the Hyper Skill Shardbreaker.

string.name: h
string.value: #cAether crystal used with Resonance Rush vanishes.#\nDamage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount\nWhen attack hits, a buff triggers for #time sec that increases final damage by #v% and Enemy DEF Ignored by #u%. Can be stacked up to #u2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses MP to increase the attack speed of your Bladecaster by 2 levels for a short time.\nRequired Skill: #cBladecaster Control Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases attack speed of Bladecaster for #time sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a number of aether swords around your body using all available aether.\nThe created aether swords attack nearby enemies on their own and are unaffected by attack reflection. Can be toggled #cOn/Off.# #cLevel 10 required to learn Hunting Decree.

string.name: h
string.value:
When #cTrigger Skill hits#, deal #w% damage to up to #y enemies every #t sec Reaching your 3rd and 4th job will reduce attack cooldown by #s sec each.
Attack #z times per aether sword.
Each successful attack has a #q% chance to create an aether crystal.
#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Resonate with aether crystals to attack in different directions.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Order aether swords affected by Hunting Decree to return in a straight line, striking enemies along their path, then cluster for a moment. Can only be used when there is at least one #caether sword pursuing an enemy through the Hunting Decree skill#.
Noble Summons will not decrease the aether swords' duration.
Unaffected by attack reflection. Not affected by effects which reset cooldowns.
Required Skill: #cHunting Decree Lv. 5#
#cLevel 20 required to learn Storm#

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

Each successful attack has a #q% chance to create an aether crystal.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Command nearby aether swords created with Aether Forge to pursue the enemy, while Adele is in combat. Can only be used when there are #caether swords present#.
If you and the aether swords are separated, those swords will return to attack.
Unaffected by attack reflection.
When the pursuing aether swords disappear, aether can be obtained proportionate to the remaining duration.
Required Skill: #cAether Forge Lv. 10#
#cLevel 20 required to learn Aether Bloom and Grave Proclamation.

MP Cost: #mpCon, Aether Cost: #s
For each aether sword, Duration: #x sec, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

Immediately canceled if you use it again.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Legacy Restoration.

string.value:
Mark enemies for annihilation with a cursed sword, making them a prime target for your aether swords and Magic Dispatch.
If the skill is used again while on cooldown, or another enemy is marked, the first mark vanishes.
Grave Proclamation prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP within range, and isn't affected by effects which reset cooldowns.

string.value: Shield yourself with spinning aether swords to block enemy attacks, reduce damage, and mitigate debilitating status conditions. string.name: desc
string.value:
Infuse your wings with the magic of the Elder Crystal. While active, Radiant Javelin is #cenhanced to Winged Javelin# to target the boss with the highest HP first, exploding on contact. Its Attack Power is also increased.
While active, #ccasting Crystalline Wings while holding a directional key# will teleport you more quickly in that direction. #cPressing the skill key again# will cancel its usage immediately.
Wings of Glory is not affected by buff duration bonuses. When Wings of Glory ends, Machina and Elder Crystal will be automatically summoned.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Part of your body links to the Abyss and transforms into the Specter.
Specter skills are powerful, but using this too often will activate your Specter state which tears at your soul and depletes your Spectra very quickly.
Consumed Spectra can be slowly recovered while in your Flora state.
Non-cash equipment is not visible even when equipped. Cape is not visible while in Specter-ridden state.

string.name: h
string.value:
Activate Specter State after using Specter skills multiple times.
If you use the last of your Spectra to maintain Specter State, you won't be able to recover it for #z sec, even in Flora State
#cSpecter State#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summon an Abyssal Aura in the form of a devastating blade.
Before using this skill, if you leave an Abyssal Mark where Impending Death hits, the blade will attack everything between the mark and the point where you use the skill.
Can only be used in Specter State. Unaffected by attack reflection, and unaffected by cooldown reset.
Turn on Auto Mode to automatically use Vengeful Hate whenever it is not on cooldown.
#cAuto Mode on/off: Right-click#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use a passage through the abyss to dodge your enemy's attack. Shifts to Specter State when the skill is used. Spectra is not consumed while using this skill, but you can't use it while affected by Spectra Fatigue. Not affected by cooldown reset.
You can move while using the skill by holding down the key. Triggers Boundless Horror to obliterate surrounding enemies when the key is released.
Boundless Horror does damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.
Boundless Horror can chain into any other skill. Skills chained from Boundless Horror will be performed in place, unless you use the arrow keys to direct their attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Charges forward and creates an Abyssal Prison that binds and holds the enemy. The damage inflicted on the imprisoned enemy is applied when Blissful Restraint ends. Activates Specter State upon using the skill. Cannot be used while Spectra Fatigue is in effect. Not affected by cooldown reset.
The enemy with the highest Max HP within range will be attacked first. Unaffected by attack reflection. Does not trigger Impending Death.
Affected enemies cannot be bound again by Blissful Restraint or other skills for 90 sec.
Does not collide with enemies while casting.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Bind Duration: #time sec, Bind duration can increase up to 100% based on the damage inflicted with this skill.
Afterward
Duration: #y sec, Max Enemies Hit: #u, Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #v
When the skill ends:
Damage: #w2%, Max Enemies Hit: #s2, Number of Attacks: #q2
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Open the gate to the abyss, attacking forward for a moment, then summon an Abyssal Guard for the final blow. Shifts to Specter State when the skill is used. This skill does not consume Spectra, but cannot be used while Spectra Fatigue is in effect. Not affected by cooldown reset.\nEndless Agony is unaffected by attack reflection. Abyssal Guard Attack does damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.\nThe final hit can chain into any other skill. Skills chained from the final hit will be performed in place, unless you use the arrow keys to direct their attacks, even if you've chained it with Endless Agony.

An Abyssal Guard is summoned when the key is released or when the skill ends.\n#cAbyssal Guard#: activates Chase Cut #w times, dealing #s% damage #v times to #q enemies, HP Recovery when the attack hits: #u% of Max HP, Final Damage based on duration: Up to #x%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Read the earth's pulse to discover the location of Dragon Veins containing the earth's essence. Dragon Veins are strongly imbued with one of the natural elements, and will hold the power of either the river, wind, or sun. Use #cDragon Vein skills# to harness the power of those Dragon Veins. Dragon Veins cannot be found in towns.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#

string.name: h
string.value: Discover Dragon Veins in Lara's surroundings. A max of #q2 dragon vein(s) can be found on the map. When moving away from the Dragon Veins, they will disappear, starting with those farthest away.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#\nConsumes the surrounding Dragon Veins to cause the power dormant in the Dragon Veins to erupt. Land spirits that match the Dragon Veins' attributes will remain and frolic in the area of eruption. #cIf an Eruption or Absorption skill of the same attribute is activated during an Eruption skill, the previously activated Eruption skill will end.# Eruption skills prioritize unconstrained Dragon Veins. If there are no unconstrained Dragon Veins, the nearest Dragon Vein will be consumed first. You will not take damage even when attacking enemies with attack reflection. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion. The duration of Eruption skills is unaffected by an increase in Summons Duration, but their strength grows proportionately instead.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Activates an Eruption skill that matches the Dragon Vein's attribute.\nIncreases Damage by 1% per #x% increase in Summons Duration.\nCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#, #cEruption Skill#\nSeveral River Spirits combine into a giant form. Periodically causes a surge that attacks the surroundings.\n#cLv. 20+ required to learn Manifestation: Where the River Courses.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#, #cEruption Skill#\nWind Spirits periodically exhale a sweeping gust of breath, creating a whirlwind that continuously attacks nearby enemies.\n#cLv. 20+ required to learn Manifestation: Wind Swing.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#, #cEruption Skill#\nSeveral Sunlight Spirits join together to combine into a frightening giant form, then scatter to cover the surroundings with lava. The lava area periodically creates volcanic bombs that attack enemies within the lava area. Volcanic bombs will first target any boss monsters within the area, starting with the boss with the highest HP.\n#cLv. 20+ required to learn Manifestation: Sunlight-Filled Ground.#

string.value: Giant Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Volcanic Bomb Damage: #v%, Number of Attacks: #v2, Max Volcanic Bombs: #z. If several volcanic bombs hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second volcanic bomb and onwards: -#s2%. Damage Over Time for enemies hit by volcanic bombs: #dot% damage for #dotTime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Several Sunlight Spirits join together to combine into a frightening giant form, then scatter to cover the surroundings with lava. The lava area periodically creates volcanic bombs that pursue and attack nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Several Sunlight Spirits join together to combine into a frightening giant form, then scatter to cover the surroundings with lava. The lava area periodically creates volcanic bombs that pursue and attack nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Several Sunlight Spirits join together to combine into a frightening giant form, then scatter to cover the surroundings with lava. The lava area periodically creates volcanic bombs that pursue and attack nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Plant seeds that grow a Mountain Spirits, who then attack nearby enemies and, if there is an active Eruption skill of any attribute within a certain range, will push enemies towards the Eruption skill. You will not take damage while using Mountain Seeds, even when attacking enemies with attack reflection.\nUse Mountain Seeds while casting Dragon Vein Eruption to plant seeds without the casting motion, or use with the down arrow key to plant all the seeds at once. In Auto Mode, if seeds are prepared, a Mountain Seed will be planted in the location of a Dragon Vein each time an Eruption skill is used.\n#cAuto Mode On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Mountain Spirit Duration: #time sec., Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nMax Mountain Spirits on Map: #q\n1 Mountain Seed is recharged every #z sec., and you can hold up to #w2 at a time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses MP to temporarily increase your Magic Attack Speed by 2 levels.\nRequired Skill: #cWand Mastery Lv. 5+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases Magic Attack Speed for #time sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Wand Mastery and Magic ATT.\n#cLv. 10+ required to learn Advanced Wand Mastery.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDragon Vein Skill#, #cManifestation Skill#
Manifest the power of the wind within a Dragon Vein to create an area with a continuous updraft. Provides a buff that temporarily increases Attack Speed, Speed, and Jump. Press the up arrow key and hold down jump in mid-air within the area to ride a swing, propelled by the wind, and float. Manifestation skills prioritize unconstrained Dragon Veins. If there are no unconstrained Dragon Veins, the nearest Dragon Vein will be consumed first. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion.
Required Skill: #cEruption: Whirlwind Lv. 20+#
#cLv. 20+ required to learn Nature Master.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Cost: MP #mpCon, Wind Swing Duration: #time sec.
Area Buff: Attack Speed: +1 level, Speed: +#indieSpeed, Jump: +#indieJump
Buff Duration for Self: #u2 sec, Buff Duration for Party Members: #x sec.
Press the up arrow key and hold down jump in mid-air within the area of the wind swing to float midair for up to #t sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Passive Effect: Whirlwind Damage: +#damPlus% points]

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase Attack Speed, Speed, and Jump through the power of wind.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDragon Vein Skill#, #cManifestation Skill#
 Manifest the power of the river within a Dragon Vein to allow travel along the river's flow. Reuse the skill within a certain period of time to designate the river's end point. After designating an end point, the river will flow continuously between the start and end point, and Lara can press the up arrow key at the start point or end point to ride along the river. The end point cannot be designated at portal locations and certain other areas, and this skill #ccannot be used in some non-hunting maps.# Manifestation skills prioritize unconstrained Dragon Veins. If there are no unconstrained Dragon Veins, the nearest Dragon Vein will be consumed first. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion. Riding the river allows you to use a skill that consumes Dragon Veins 1 time (excluding Manifestation: Where the River Courses), increases the usable range, and also allows you to use skills that consume dragon veins in proportion to the distance traveled. This skill is unaffected by Buff Freezer.
Required Skill: #cEruption: Heaving River Lv. 20+#
#cLv. 20+ required to learn Nature Master#.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Use the skill to designate an end point within #s sec. River Duration between Start Point and End Point: #s2 sec. Press the up arrow key at the start point to travel along the river.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.\n[Passive Effect: Heaving River Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDragon Vein Skill#, #cManifestation Skill#
Manifest the power of sunlight within a Dragon Vein to create an area bathed in the sun's warm glow. Provides a buff that temporarily increases Damage, and the life-giving power of the sun periodically recovers HP within the area. Manifestation skills prioritize unconstrained Dragon Veins. If there are no unconstrained Dragon Veins, the nearest Dragon Vein will be consumed first. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion.
Required Skill: #cEruption: Sunrise Well Lv. 20+#
#cLv. 20+ required to learn Nature Master.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Sunlight Area Duration: #time sec., Area Buff: Damage +#indieDamR%
Buff Duration on Self: #w sec., Buff Duration on Party Members: #x sec.
HP Recovered in Area: #hp% of Max HP every #z sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Passive Effect: Sunrise Well Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Damage through the warmth of the sun.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#\nAwaken multiple dormant Dragon Veins in the area, all at once. The awakened Dragon Veins emanate intangible forces, which pursue and attack nearby enemies. Wakeup Call prioritizes normal Dragon Veins for consumption over unconstrained Dragon Veins, and is unaffected by attack reflection. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Creates as many intangible forces as there are enemies. Min Intangible Forces: #bulletCount, Max Intangible Forces: #z, Damage: #damage% Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nIf several intangible forces hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second intangible force and onwards: -#v%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Follows the Dragon Veins' traces. Use the Earthly Energy that periodically accumulates in your body to instantly move to a nearby Dragon Vein and attack nearby enemies. You can move in 8 directions, and the arrow keys can be used to discover any Dragon Veins in the corresponding direction first. Any unconstrained Dragon Veins within the area are prioritized. If there are none, you will be moved to the nearest regular Dragon Vein. You will not be moved to a Dragon Vein that is too close to your current location.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Uses 1 Earthly Energy. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n1 Earthly Energy is recharged every #s2 sec., and you can hold up to #v at a time.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Each time a Dragon Vein is consumed, the remaining essence restores HP and MP and temporarily increases Final Damage. Dragon Vein Echo is not affected by Buff Duration increase.

string.name: h
string.value: When Dragon Veins are consumed, HP Recovered: #u% of Max HP, MP Recovered: #w% of Max MP, Final Damage: +#x% for #time sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temper the mind to be pure and spotless.

string.name: h
string.value: Damage: +#damR%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%, Critical Rate: +#cr%\nMax MP: +#mmpR%, Knockback Resistance: +#stanceProp%

string.name: desc
string.value: Increase the power of skills by studying geomancy.\nRequired Skill: #cEssence Sprinkle Lv. 20+#\n#cLv. 9+ required to learn Best Friend.#

Essence Sprinkle Damage: +#damPlus%p
Mountain Kid Damage: +#y%p

Mountain Seed Damage: +#u%p

string.name: desc
string.value: Riding the river allows you to use 1 skill that consumes Dragon Veins (excluding Manifestation: Where the River Courses), increases the skills usable range, and also allows you to use skills that consume Dragon Veins in proportion to the distance traveled.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#\nConsumes the surrounding dragon vein to absorb the dormant powers within. Lara absorbs the power of the dragon vein's attribute, and the land spirits of the absorbed attribute deal attacks when either Essence Sprinkle or Wakeup Call hit. #cIf an Eruption skill of the same attribute is activated during an Absorption skill, the previously activated Absorption skill will end.# Absorption skills prioritize unconstrained Dragon Veins. If there are no unconstrained Dragon Veins, the nearest Dragon Vein will be consumed first. You will not take damage even when attacking enemies with attack reflection. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Activates an Absorption skill that matches the target Dragon Vein's attribute.\nCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Converts the attribute of the target Dragon Vein. The Dragon Vein's current attribute cannot be selected. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Press directional keys within #v2 sec of using the skill to convert the target Dragon Vein's attribute into a different attribute.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec., Increases cooldown by #u2 sec when attribute conversion is successful.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#, #cAbsorption Skill#\nWhen Essence Sprinkle hits, a mischievous River Spirit appears, along with a small body of water, and attacks enemies by dousing them.

string.value: When Essence Sprinkle hits, a River Spirit appears and attacks enemies for #time sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #t sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A River Spirit appears to assist you by absorbing the river's power.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#, #cAbsorption Skill#\nWhen Essence Sprinkle hits, a Wind Spirit appears and causes a fierce wind that deals continuous damage to enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wind Spirit appears to assist you by absorbing the wind's power.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#, #cAbsorption Skill#\nWhen Essence Sprinkle hits, the Sunlight Spirits gather together to emit spheres of condensed sunlight that pursue and attack enemies. Fireballs will first target any boss monsters within the area. If there are multiple boss monsters, the boss with the highest HP will be targeted.

string.name: h
string.value: When Essence Sprinkle hits, sun land spirits appear and create #bulletCount fireball(s) that pursue and attack enemies for #time sec. Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nWhen a single enemy is struck by several fireballs, starting with the second fireball, Final Damage: -#x%\nCooldown: #t sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Sunlight Spirit appears to assist you by absorbing the sunlight's power.

string.name: desc
string.value: Become one with nature to better wield its powers. Using Eruption skills allows you to draw out even greater potential from Dragon Veins, increasing the power of Eruption skills. Does not stack with 3rd job Manifestation skill passive effects.\nRequired Skills: #cManifestation: Where the River Courses Lv. 20+#, #cManifestation: Wind Swing Lv. 20+#, #cManifestation: Sunlight Filled Ground Lv. 20+#

string.name: desc
string.value: Create an unconstrained Dragon Vein that can hold any power. Use with the down arrow key to create all Dragon Veins that are ready at once. However, if there is not enough space to create all the Dragon Veins, it will only create as much as possible.\nUse Eruption, Absorption, or Manifestation skills on the created Dragon Vein to draw out its power in your desired attribute. Unconstrained Dragon Veins can only be used while Dragon Vein Reading is active, and it is unaffected by cooldown reset. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion. Using Dragon Vein Eruption or Dragon Vein Absorption while creating an unconstrained Dragon Vein will cancel the casting of Unconstrained Dragon Vein, and instead apply the attribute of the interrupting skill.

1 unconstrained Dragon Vein is recharged every #w sec., and you can maintain up to #u at a time.

Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the strongest skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Lv. 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cOnly 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level#, while other skills can only be increased to master level. \nExceptions: Some special skills, Beginner Skills, Combat Orders, Decent Combat Orders, Hyper Skills, and 5th Job Skills cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Max HP, and Max MP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120, Attack Power: +20, Magic ATT: +20, DEF: +425, Max HP: +475, Max MP: +475, Duration 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You're confident even in the face of the strongest enemy. Ignore a portion of your enemy's Defense and inflict more damage against enemies that have full HP.

string.name: h
string.value: Enemy DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, Damage +#x% against enemies with 100% HP

string.name: desc
string.value: Successful hits with your #cHeaven, Earth, and Humanity skills# charge your #cTalisman Energy#, up to a maximum of 100. You can use Talisman Energy to use Talisman skills.\n#cRight-click to toggle the visual effect for Talisman Energy's full charge.#

string.name: h
string.value: - Successful hits with your Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills charge your #cTalisman Energy#.\n- With every successful hit, #cgrants a combo stage for that attribute and Talisman Energy charge# (stage 1: #u, stage 2: #v, and stage 3: #w).\n- #cThe combo stage resets# after reaching stage 3.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Humanity Skill]# Swings a massive fan. Enemies hit directly by the fan take greater damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount times, Against Enemies Struck by Fan: Final Damage +#x%

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Talisman Skill]# Summons a gourd that sucks up enemies. Press the skill key a second time to launch any enemies captured by the gourd.\nCannot swallow boss monsters, stationary monsters, or enemies 11+ levels higher than you. If you wait too long after sucking up enemies, you will be unable to launch them from the gourd.

string.name: h
string.value: Talisman Energy Cost: #atGauge1Con, Max Enemies Swallowed: #mobCount. Launch swallowed enemies by pressing the skill key again.\nAttacks up to #u2 enemies that are absorbed or within range of the launch attack for #v2% damage #w2 times.\nBoss Damage: +#bdR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Leap with such grace that you could balance on a single blade of grass. Use while midair to jump. Can be used twice before touching the ground again.\nThe jump distance and height increase with the skill level.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, allows you to jump a greater distance

string.name: desc
string.value: You faced a great trial and gained the power to summon the Nimbus Cloud.\nHold down the skill key while airborne to summon the Nimbus Cloud. You can also hold the jump and up arrow key together. While on the Nimbus Cloud, use the arrow keys to fly.\n#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Temporarily gain the power to fly.

string.name: desc
string.value: Harnesses mind-over-matter to make your body light and swift.

string.name: desc
string.value: Protects you from enemy attacks as though you were enshrouded in mist.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Earth Skill]# Kicks the ground to unleash a shockwave along the surface. Can only be used while on the ground.\n\n#cAfter casting, press the forward arrow key and the skill key again to link into Ground-Shattering Wave (True), charging forward. If you do not do this, it will link into Ground-Shattering Wave (Clone) instead.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill shares its skill level with #cEarth: Ground-Shattering Wave.#. Ride a shockwave to charge forward.\n\n#cGround-Shattering Wave (Clone) is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value: After using Earth: Ground-Shattering Wave, you can link into #cGround-Shattering Wave (Clone)# or #cGround-Shattering Wave (True)#, Attacks up to #u2 enemies with #v2% damage #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#[Talisman Skill]# Conjures a clone to trick enemies with sly attacks. For the duration of this skill, when you attack enemies, a clone will appear and attack nearby enemies.
Attacks from installation skills or summoned minions will not create a clone.

#cTalisman: Clone is unaffected by attack reflection, and targets the boss with the highest HP first.#

string.name: h
string.value: Talisman Energy Cost: #atGauge1Con, For #time sec, create #v2 clone(s) when attacking, Each clone attacks for #w2% damage #q2 times, Damage against Normal Monsters: +#nbdR%\nClone creation has a #t sec cooldown

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses MP to increase the attack speed of your Ritual Fan for a short time.\nRequired Skill: #cRitual Fan Mastery Lv. 5#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Ritual Fan Attack Speed: +2

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Ritual Fan Mastery and Attack Power. \n#cLevel 10 required to learn Advanced Ritual Fan Mastery.#

string.name: desc
string.value: After a clone attack, hide yourself in darkness. While hidden, you cannot be hit by enemies. Using an attack skill will reveal you. Using attack skills will not reveal you (excludes class-wide skills).

string.name: h
string.value: Using #cGround-Shattering Wave (Clone), Stone Tremor (Clone), Iron Fan Gale (Clone), or Consuming Flames (Clone)# will hide you for #time sec. Using an attack skill while hidden will reveal you.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP, your remaining time to hide will be reduced by #z% of the maximum.\n[Passive Effects: Avoidability +#er%]

string.name: desc
string.value: After a clone attack, hide yourself in darkness. While hidden, you cannot be hit by enemies. Using an attack skill will reveal you.

string.name: desc
string.value: Opens your mind's eye, allowing you to see through the enemies' weaknesses.

string.name: desc
string.value: Attunes your bodies to the heavens, granting greater control over Nimbus Cloud.

string.name: h
string.value: Jump: +#psdJump\nIncreases the duration and flight speed for the Nimbus Cloud skill

string.name: desc
string.value:
Your master's spell book has taught you to use Scroll Skills.
Successful hits with your #cHeaven, Earth, and Humanity skills,# or use of #cTalisman Skills,# will earn you #Scroll Energy,# which powers your Scroll Skills.

#You can hold a maximum of 900 Scroll Energy.#

string.name: h
string.value: - Gain #c15 Scroll Energy# upon successful hits with your Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills.\n- Gain #c200 Scroll Energy# every time you use a Talisman Skill.#\n- When an attribute skill is used, if it is different from the previously used attribute, the final damage of that magic is increased by #x%.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Heaven Skill]# Summons a giant fan to blow a gale downward.\n#cPress the forward key and the skill key again to use Iron Fan Gale (True), leaping forward. Otherwise, this skill will link into Iron Fan Gale (Clone), sending a clone to attack. This skill's attack speed cannot be increased beyond a set value.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount

string.name: desc
string.value:
This skill shares its skill level with #cHeaven: Iron Fan Gale.#. After using Heaven: Iron Fan Gale, leaps forward to stomp on enemies.
A successful Iron Fan Gale (True) attack will cause you to rebound off the enemy back into the air.

#cIron Fan Gale (Clone) is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value: After using Heaven: Iron Fan Gale, you can link into #cIron Fan Gale (Clone)# or #cIron Fan Gale (True),# After touching an enemy, attacks up to #u2 enemies with #v2% damage #w2 times

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Earth Skill]# Slams the ground hard, causing massive stones to jut out from the earth. Can only be used while on ground.\n\n#cPress the left or right arrow key along with the skill key again to link into Stone Tremor (True), teleporting in that direction. If you do not link into Stone Tremor (True), it will link into Stone Tremor (Clone) and send a clone to attack, instead.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Stun Duration for Normal Monsters: #time sec\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: This skill shares its skill level with #Earth: Stone Tremor.# After using Earth: Stone Tremor, teleports to one end of the rock outcropping and shatters it.\nWhen using Stone Tremor (True), you can use the arrow keys to select whether you move left or right. When using Stone Tremor (Clone), you will only move forward.\n#cStone Tremor (Clone) is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value: After using Earth: Stone Tremor, you can link into #Stone Tremor (Clone)# or #Stone Tremor (True),# Teleports to the edge of the rock outcropping and attacks up to #u2 enemies for #v2% damage #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Talisman Skill]# Conjures a living flame to chase and attack enemies. The flame attacks a target, pauses in place, and then finds a new target to attack.\n\n#Seeking Ghost Flame is unaffected by attack reflection, and targets the boss with the highest HP first.#

string.name: h
string.value: Talisman Energy Cost: #atGauge1Con, Flame Summon Duration: #time sec, Enemy Targeting Interval: #t sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# A mysterious light shines from your scroll, transforming enemies into frogs, bugs, and other vermin. When the light touches an enemy, it is reflected onto other nearby enemies, transforming a multitude of enemies. Boss monsters cannot be transformed.

string.value: Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Boss Damage: +#bdR%\nTransformation Duration (Normal Enemies Only): #time sec, Enemy DEF: -#v2%.

string.value: Cultivates a deep understanding to increase the damage of your skills.\n#cLevel 19 required to learn Enlightenment.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes your body unbreakable like diamond.

string.name: desc
string.value: Achieves balance between Heaven, Earth, and Humanity through your breathing. Restores HP and MP whenever you get your attribute combo to stage 3.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Heaven Skill]# Fans the flames of destruction. Can only be used while airborne.\n#cPress the up arrow key and skill key again to link into Consuming Flames (True), launching yourself further into the air. If you do not link into Consuming Flames (True), it will link into Consuming Flames (Clone), sending a clone instead.#\nNot affected by cooldown reset. This skill's attack speed cannot be increased beyond a set value.

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Humanity Skill]# Summons the weapon of an ancient sage, delivering a series of quick blows to your enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Transforms into a thousand-ton stone and drops down from the sky to crush enemies on the ground. Can only be used while airborne. Can be used by pressing the skill key or by tapping the down arrow key twice.
Can only damage enemies that are in range at the time of casting.
Can be linked while you are using Heaven: Iron Fan Gale, Iron Fan Gale (True), Heaven: Consuming Flames, or Consuming Flames (True).
#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Drops straight down when used in the air, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nAttacked enemies Bleed for #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Talisman Skill]# Summons a warp gate. Press the skill key again while the gate is active to mark your location and teleport to the gate.\nUse the skill again while near the gate to teleport back to your marked location.\nPressing up and the skill key while the gate is open consumes Talisman Energy, opening a new gate while the existing warp gate and marked location vanish.

string.name: h
string.value: Talisman Energy Cost: #atGauge1Con, Warp Gate Duration: #time sec\nUsing the skill again teleports you to the gate, Using the skill near the gate teleports you to your previous location. Teleport and Opening a New Gate Cooldown: #cooltime sec\n[Passive Effect: Avoidability Chance: +#prop%]

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# Summons a powerful vortex that absorbs the enemies' energy. Use the skill again to make the vortex disappear. Restores HP and MP to party members based on how many enemies are hit.\n\n#Scroll: Star Vortex is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value: Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Creates a vortex that deals #damage% damage #attackCount times for #time sec\nYou can absorb 1 energy for every #z successful hits up to #x, Attacking boss monsters absorbs #w times the energy\nUsing the skill again will make the vortex disappear and restore #y% of the Max HP and Max MP of party member for each energy absorbed.

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# Summons a swarm of colorful but deadly flowers. While this skill is active, your attacks summon butterflies to attack your enemies.\n\n#Scroll: Butterfly Dream is unaffected by attack reflection, and targets the boss with the highest HP first.#

string.value: Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Duration: #time sec, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%, Summons #u2 butterflies that deal #v2% damage when you attack.\nButterfly Summon Cooldown: #x sec\n[Passive Effect: Scroll: Degeneration Damage: +#damPlus%p]

string.value: Takes a sip of medicine stolen from your master's stash. Restores Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy over time.\nNot affected by cooldown reset.

string.value: Transports you into a scroll featuring a beautiful vista, giving you a moment of respite in battle.\nIf you don't use the full skill duration, then this skill's cooldown will be reduced. Not affected by effects which which reset or reduce cooldown.\nCan be used while airborne or while using 1st to 4th job skills, but can only be activated during the finishing hit of Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel.

string.value: Collect Erda from within yourself and from the surrounding area, then detonate it around your enemies. The Erda of attacked enemies will become disrupted, which will bind their movements. Can deal damage to enemies even when they are under Attack Ignore. Also ignores Attack Reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hoists high the banner of the brave pirate, bolstering party morale and driving fear into the hearts of your enemies. You cannot be knocked back by enemy attacks while planting your flag.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons brave Spearmen of the Cygnus Knights to charge enemies in a phalanx formation. The spearmen slow down upon touching an enemy. Press the skill key again to change their direction of movement. Unaffected by attack reflection and can be resisted by some monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a squad of Resistance infantry to blast the enemy with long-ranged attacks. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount \nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily gain extra EXP and items when hunting monsters. Does not stack with Holy Symbol.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, EXP: +#x%, Drop Rate: +#v%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon magic memorized with Mind Delve. Results may vary.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Uses a memorized skill.
Ignores MP cost and cooldown of selected skill, and reduces cooldown of Unreliable Memory by a fixed amount according to set probability rates.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Passive Effect: INT +#intX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Your stealth abilities have been heightened to their limit, allowing you to attack and use skills for a short period without breaking stealth. Shadow Walker's stealth effect is not broken by attacks or skills. Attack is increased while stealthed.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Initiates a form of stealth that is not canceled by skills or attacks.\nFinal Damage increased by #y% added on top of Advanced Dark Sight's Final Damage bonus.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Even in the darkest times, Freud could be relied upon for his wisdom. Call upon Freud's wisdom to steel your resolve and enhance your combat prowess.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #s sec., Max Stacks: #x, Each stack provides an additional buff.
#cStack 1# - Skill Cooldown: -#w% ( excludes skills unaffected by cooldown reduction)
#cStack 2# - Status Resistance: +#z
#cStack 3# - All Stats: +#q
#Stack 4# - Attack Power & Magic ATT: +#u
#Stack 5# - Boss Damage: +#v%
#Stack 6#: Invincible for duration of skill
Cooldown: #cooltime sec. Cooldown increased to #y sec. when buff expires (including character death), or max stack count is reached.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even in the darkest times, Freud could be relied upon for his wisdom. Call upon Freud's wisdom to steel your resolve and enhance your combat prowess.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a blast of compressed Erdas at nearby enemies.\nUsing the skill with the down arrow key summons #cErda Fountain#, which is an object filled with pure Erda.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon
#cErdas Shower#
Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Cooldown reduced by #x sec per attacked enemy
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
#cErda Fountain#
Object Summon Duration: #time sec. Every time enemies in a map with the summoned object are defeated, the Erda released from the enemies condenses around the object.
Defeating #u or more will release the gathered Erda, Max Enemies Hit: #s, Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #w
Cooldown: #y sec
Cooldown shared with Erdas Shower and Erda Fountain.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activates and amplifies the power of magic wings to max out Magic Conversion. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpRCon% of Max MP, Duration: #time sec, Damage increases up to #y% depending on current MP proportions, Damage increase reset when Spell Storm occurs.\nWhen using attack skill, activates a Spell Storm. Spell Storm MP Cost: additional #w per #x sec, Spell Storm Max Enemies Hit: #z, Spell Storm Damage: #q%, Spell Storm Number of Attacks: #s\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The collapsing space between the Mirror World and reality become linked with Will's Erda, causing the spider within the mirror to temporarily materialize in reality. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP
#cSpatial Collapse# - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Once complete, summons True Arachnid Reflection.
#cTrue Arachnid Reflection# - Duration: #s sec, Goes into attack mode at set intervals. During attack mode, uses spider legs #w times to deal #x% damage #y times. If the spider legs attack one target #z consecutive times, attack mode will end immediately. #q sec cooldown after attack mode ends.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The collapsing space between the Mirror World and reality become linked with Will's Erda, causing the spider within the mirror to temporarily materialize in reality.

string.name: desc
string.value: The collapsing space between the Mirror World and reality become linked with Will's Erda, causing the spider within the mirror to temporarily materialize in reality.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Maple World Goddess's Blessing increases all stats and damage. Can only be used when you have 1 of the following skills applied: Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, Sengoku Warrior, Maple Guardian, or Rhinne's Protection. Not affected by effects which reduce cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases stat bonuses for class-wide buff skills like Maple Warrior by #x% for #time sec, Damage: +#indieDamR%\nMaple World Goddess's Blessing is ready every #s2 sec, and can bless up to #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: The blessing of Cygnus increases damage and restores HP over time. This skill can be enhanced after Lv. 245. Not affected by effects which reduce cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage +#q%
Periodically restores #y% HP and increases your damage by #damage%.
This damage bonus is additive and maxes out at #w%
Cygnus's Blessing is ready every #s2 sec, and can bless up to #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cygnus's transcendent blessing increases damage and restores HP over time. Not affected by effects that reduce cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Damage +#q%, Damage Taken: -#z% (Includes damage proportional to Max HP).
Periodically restores #y% HP and increases your damage by #damage%.
This damage bonus is additive, and maxes out at #w%
Cygnus's Blessing is ready every #s2 sec, and can bless up to #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: The prayers of Rhinne, the Transcendent of Time, grant a new ability. Not affected by the effects which reduce cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon. Reset cooldowns for all skills except the skills that are not affected by cooldown reset.
Duration: #time sec., Attack Power: +#indiePad. When Doubletime stacks, gives a buff that creates additional attacks, with #x% damage and #y additional attacks to enemies you attack with your skills.
Additional hit buff disappears when additional attacks occur, or if Transcendent Rhinne's Prayer ends.
Doubletime and Immune Barrier last for their maximum duration.
Rhinne's Prayer is ready every #s2 sec, and can bless up to #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis has a different appearance for each of her child races, and she grants a different blessing to each race. Not affected by effects which reduce cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec.
#cNova#: Skills have a #x% chance to bypass cooldown as many as #y time(s).
Damage: +#v%
Kaiser receives an additional #q% Damage increase for each Morph Gauge stage.
#cFlora#: Excluding your weapon, #w% of your equipment's Attack Power & Magic ATT, whichever you do not use, is converted to the one you do use. Any set effects do not apply. The converted bonus cannot exceed #z% of the weapon's base Attack Power or Magic ATT, whichever one you use.
Attack Power and Magic ATT: +#s
#cAnima#: Damage: +#q2%
Hoyoung: Talisman and Scroll Energy Charge: + #v2%, Lara: Increases Final Damage Increase to #u2% upon activating Dragon Vein Echo.
Grandis Goddess's Blessing is ready every #s2 sec, and can bless up to #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis grants a blessing appropriate to the Nova.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis grants a blessing appropriate to the Flora.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of Grandis grants a blessing appropriate to the Anima.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld does whatever she wants and periodically gives a blessing of a different type. Not affected by effects which reduce cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, increases Final Damage by #indiePMdR% for #time sec. Periodically casts various blessings or attacks. Previous blessings disappear when a new blessing is cast.
#cBlessing of Recovery# : Restores #y% of the your character's max DF/PP/HP. Heals through status effects that prevent health recovery, aside from the ones in Ghost Park.
#cAegis Blessing#: Damage Taken: -#z% (Triggers once, includes damage proportional to Max HP.)
#cBlessing of Fortitude#: Ignores one debilitating status effect.
#cOtherwordly Void#: Max Enemies Hit: #u, Damage: #v%, Number of Attacks: #s
Otherworld Goddess's Blessing is ready every #s2 sec, and can bless up to #w2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld grants you an Blessing of Recovery.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld grants you an Aegis Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld grants you a Blessing of Fortitude.

string.name: desc
string.value: The goddess of the otherworld casts an Otherworldly Void.

string.name: desc
string.value: Additional attacks occur through the manipulation of time itself.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mitra's power manifests the searing heat of the sun as a blazing inferno. The flame emblem is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP
#cMitra's Fire#: summons a Flame Emblem after dealing #damage% damage up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times.
#cFlame Emblem#: deals #w% damage to up to #q enemies #z times every #t sec for #s sec. Deals #y% damage if striking a single enemy.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Mitra's rage has physically manifested as a blazing inferno.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon a lotus flower with an auspicious power. When you are hit by a fatal attack within a certain range around the lotus, the blessing of the lotus allows you to be revived inside the lotus instead of dying. Cannot be used while the Heaven's Door buff is active. If you receive a Heaven's Door buff while the lotus is summoned, the lotus will disappear.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpRCon% of Max MP, Lotus Summon Duration: #time sec.\nInvincible for #t sec. upon revival.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec. Skill Cooldown upon successful revival: -#w sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon a lotus flower with an auspicious power. When you are hit by a fatal attack within a certain range around the lotus, the blessing of the lotus allows you to be revived inside the lotus instead of dying.

string.name: desc
string.value: Search your memories for a spell to cast. After casting, choose from one of the selected 3rd - 4th Job Skill using the number keys. The selected spell will be cast upon using the Unreliable Memory skill. Only learned skills can be selected.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Use the number keys to select a spell that can be activated with Unreliable Memory. This skill is canceled if you fail to select a spell within #s sec, or if you press any other keys.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an object filled with Erda. The object will attract the Erda released from defeated enemies. The object will discharge the Erda to attack enemies once a set amount has been accumulated.
