string.name: desc
string.value: Swing your Polearm and call forth a mythical wolf to deliver a devastating blow. After using Beyond Blade 3rd Hit, you will not be pushed back by any enemy attacks when using Beyond Blade.\nAlchemic Adrenaline Boost Additional Effect: Creates an iceberg in front of you\nRequired Skill: Beyond Blade Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Bonus Critical Rate: #cr%, Additional Ignore Defense: #ignoreMobpdpR%
While Adrenaline Rush is active, Max Enemies Hit: #z, Number of Attacks: #y, Iceberg Damage: #w%
#cCan be used after using Beyond Blade 3rd hit

string.name: desc
string.value: Infuses your weapon with a portion of your health, granting it a visible aura and temporarily empowering it. The aura wave is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, Ignores #indieIgnoreMobpdpR% Enemy DEF for #time sec, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%.\n#cAura Wave (usable every #q sec) -# Using certain offensive skills will generate waves, inflicting #x% damage on up to #mobCount enemies, #w times.\nCooldown: #cooltime Sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a burning soul blade to fight at your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cRaging Blow Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Fully charges combo to the max upon casting. Summon Duration: #time sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay put (press it again for it to respawn).
When you use your offensive skill, attacks up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times every #w sec., with #cr% bonus Critical Rate.
#cNormal# - Damage: #damage% (While#c Enraged#: #z%) 
#cStationary# - Damage: #s2% (While#c Enraged#: #w2%)
Cooldown: #x sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjures a burning soul blade to fight at your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cRaging Blow Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay in place (it will respawn when the skill is used again while it stays in place). Boosts Raging Blow while near the blade.
When you use your offensive skill, it attacks up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times every #w sec, with #cr% bonus Critical Rate.
#cNormal# - Damage: #s2% (While#c enraged#: #w2%) 
#cStationary# - Damage: #damage% (While#c enraged#: #z%)
Cooldown: #x sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grant an echo of your battle prowess to a nearby party member, such that they will mirror some of your attack skills and buff skills. If the last party member that received the echo is within range, that party member will receive the echo first. If a party member approaches you while your echo is inactive, that party member receives your echo. When the party member moves beyond a certain distance from you, or when Divine Echo is deactivated, the echo is lost. At that time, any Paladin's buffs applied to that party member will also be removed. This skill cannot be used on a party member who is already echoing the skills of another Paladin. If you use the skill again while skill is active, you can select which party member will receive your echo by pressing the corresponding number key (with regard to the party UI). You cannot select yourself, a party member who is already echoing someone, or a party member who cannot receive an echo.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: MP #mpCon, Duration: #time sec., Final Damage: +#u%\n#cEchoing Party Member# - Upon using an offensive skill, the affected party member mimics you for #x% of Final Damage. Buff Duration on Party Member: #y% + 1% for every #w Strength (up to 100%)\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurls a spear of utter darkness at the enemy. Direct the spear with the up and down arrow keys. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. A summoned spear deals #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies. For attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the target's Max HP, Damage -#w% (while you're preparing to throw the spear).\nCritical Rate +#cr%. Ignores #ignoreMobpdpR% Enemy DEF.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Simultaneously unleashes the power of the sun and moon.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill. Afterimage Damage: #x% of Final Damage 
Upon attacking, the sun and moon inflict an additional attack every #s2 sec on up to #mobCount enemies with bonus #cr% Critical Rate. 
#cRising Sun# - Damage: #damage%, Attacks: #attackCount 
#cFalling Moon# - Damage: #q%, Attacks: #u
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Awaken your true power. The Cerberus Chomp portion is unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cDemon Thrash Lv. 1# and #cCerberus Chomp Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value:
Fury Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, Critical Rate: +#indieCr%
Automatically triggers Cerberus every #x sec when you use a direct offensive skill, enhances Demon Lash and allows you to use Chaos Lock while Demon Lash #cis active# 
Enhanced Demon Lash - hits up to #z enemies #y times, Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%, 1st/2nd Hit Damage: #w%, 3rd Hit Damage: #q%, 4th Hit Damage: #q2%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice your body to the flame to fuel your vengeance. The vengeance flows through your demonic blood, then emerges to attack the enemy. Your burning demonic blood is unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP. Consumes #y HP per sec. Healing Restriction: Items and skills can only heal #w% of Max HP. Hit Damage -#s% (including the damage proportional to Max HP)
Final Damage: +#x% and can be increased up to #q% per #u% HP consumed. Your demonic blood, burning with vengeance, lingers in the area, periodically dealing #damage% damage against up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times.
When your Max HP falls below #q2%, the HP loss will cease, and Demonic Frenzy will no longer restrict your healing.
Reusing this skill during its effect will deactivate that effect.
Cooldown: #z sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Become a shield for your fellow party members. Temporarily blocks the damage and debilitating status conditions on party members inside the area, and increases your Final Damage.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #q2 sec, Final Damage: +#u%
Damage Reduction (to you and party members inside shield): #x% (including Percentage HP attacks) for #time sec, blocks debilitating status conditions
Upon successful blocking of the attack and status conditions, the shield has 3 layers, which can defend against #y, #w, and #z attacks, respectively. Number of blocks decreases only once when both status condition and attack are applied at the same time.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Kaisers of old to fight by your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Summon 3 Kaisers with limited movement range. After Kaisers are summoned, use the skill again to bring them to your location. Can be used once every #z seconds.
#cKaiser VI#: attacks up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times
#cKaiser XV#: attacks up to #z enemies for #x% damage #y times
#cKaiser XXVII#: attacks up to #q enemies for #w% damage #q2 times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Kaisers of old to fight by your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Kaisers of old to fight by your side. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Freeze time, breaking through its limits! When the skill is active, enemies hit are bound, but they cannot be bound again by Chrono Break and other bind skills for 90 sec. To end this skill's effect early, use it again. However, the effects of Chrono Break will not end. The shock dealt at the end of the skill is unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Bind Duration: #w sec
Bind Duration: Increases up to 100%, based on initial damage done
For #time sec - Skill Cooldowns: -#q% (Excludes skills not affected by cooldown reduction), Attack Speed: +2, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%, slows nearby enemies.
Additional shock dealt #q2 times, dealing #u% damage #s2 times to up to #s enemies when the skill ends. Shock prioritizes enemies hit by the attack and boss monsters with the highest max HP.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maha's power flows into you, granting you enormous strength.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, instantly increases combo to #z, Maha empowers you for #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePadR% \nBlizzard Damage: #damage% every #x sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Load up your Arm Cannon with armor-piercing ammo and deliver an earth-shattering punch. Rocket Punch is not affected by Revolving Cannon's Boost Node.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Using your arm cannon while active triggers Revolving Cannon Boost, which uses special ammunition. Does not apply to 5th Job Advancement skills. \nMax Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants an echo of your battle prowess to a party member. It cannot be used on a party member who is already echoing the skills of another Paladin.

string.name: desc
string.value: Simultaneously unleashes the power of the sun and moon.

string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill, Afterimage Damage: #x% of Final Damage\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Simultaneously unleashes the power of the sun and moon.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates an afterimage when you use an offensive skill, Afterimage Damage: #x% of Final Damage\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Invulnerable while casting.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws a rapid barrage of punches out in front of you. Grants Enhanced Guard. Prevents Knockback and critical Abnormal Statuses

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #z. Deals #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively for up to #time sec while the key is held.\nGrants the Enhanced Guard effects of Charge Mastery and Combo Training with max stacks.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Swing Maha around in a circle, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake. Adrenaline Rush does not apply. Afterimage from Swing Studies is only activated once.
[Command: #cDown, Down + Attack Key#]
Command Effect: Prevents Knockback. Unaffected by attack reduction and attack reflection.

#cRight-click to lock command.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Chase Cut Activation Count: #w, Boss Damage: +#bdR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec, reduced by #x% when Maha's Fury is activated.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Radiant Soul Skill]#\nFocuses the power of your Soul Shield into the form of the legendary Sword of Light to strike down your foes.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Damage increases based on #cRoyal Guard's Attack Power buff's stack.#
[3 Stacks or Lower] - Damage: #z%
[4 Stacks] - Damage: #w%
[5 Stacks] - Damage: #v%
100% chance to Blind enemies for #time sec, reducing their Accuracy by 30%
After use, Royal Guard's Attack Power Buff Duration: +#q sec, cannot exceed max stacks
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice your own health to release an explosion of demonic energy. #cCan be used while other skills are active#. If you defeat an enemy or strike a boss with this ability, you will recover HP, even under Demonic Frenzy's recovery reduction or certain other statuses that prevent you from recovering health (not including the ones in Ghost Park).

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. For attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the target's Max HP, Damage -#w%.\nHP Recovery: #x% of Max HP, Additional Critical Rate: #cr%, Additional Ignore Defense: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alpha and Beta attack together to demolish the enemy. Hold the skill key to perform a series of linked attacks. Immediately performs a final #cJoint Attack# when Alpha and Beta's skills end, or when the skill key is released.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Invulnerable while casting skill
#c[Beta Link]# 1st Hit: Deals #q% damage #q2 times, 2nd Hit: Deals #v% damage #v2 times, 3rd Hit: Deals #w% damage #w2 times
#c[Alpha Link]# 1st Hit: Deals #x% damage #y times, 2nd Hit: Deals #z% damage #dotInterval times, 3rd Hit: Deals #u% damage #u2 times
#c[Joint Attack]#: Triggers an explosion #dot time(s), which deals #s% damage #s2 times. Triggers additional explosion for every #subTime remaining linked attacks. Max Explosions: 5. Ignores an additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Monster DEF
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a whirling bulwark of righteous hammers to strike down nearby enemies. Use the skill again to stop the attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #c[Passive Effects]# Creates 1 spiraling hammer around you whenever you generate a Light Charge. Up to #x hammers can be active at once, and their duration is shared with Vessel of Light.\n#c[Active Effects]# MP Cost: #mpCon. Hammers automatically attack up to #s enemies #z times dealing #q% damage over #v sec. Attack speed increases with the number of hammers.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a whirling bulwark of righteous hammers to strike down nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Evil Eye reveals itself and blasts nearby enemies. Only usable while Evil Eye of Domination is active. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. An Evil Eye appears in front of you, attacking up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times, dealing #damage% damage for #x sec, and ignoring #ignoreMobpdpR% additional enemy Defense.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates a rift between the world of the living and the Underworld when used with Styx Crossing. You can use Styx Crossing with a #cregular attack# while Rift of Damnation is active. Using Action Customization allows you to use Styx Crossing with a regular attack or #Solar Slash/Luna Divide#. Styx Crossing and the attack from the rift is unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cAction Customization On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, creates max cosmic orbs upon use, Styx Crossing can be used for #time sec
#cStyx Crossing# - Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #v2, Number of Chase Cuts: #u2. Additional Ignore Enemy Defense: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, creates max cosmic orbs, changes stance with Equinox Cycle
Attacking with Styx Crossing cuts space to leave a rift for #y sec
#cRift# - Gradually grows when it's attacked by Styx Crossing and in the end, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Number of Explosions: #q
More than 2 rifts cannot be created at the same. Rift can be created again in #z sec after exploding. Rift disappears and explodes immediately when duration ends but damage is decreased.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes a brutal slash that decimates all in sight.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice all your Fury to conjure a malevolent serpent of pure rage. Attacks again before vanishing. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Consumes #forceCon Fury and #hpRCon% of Max HP
Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#c[On Disappearance]# Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #selfDestruction%, Number of Attacks: #w
All hits receive Critical Rate: +#cr% and additional Ignore Def: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Tempest Blades rain down upon the enemy, oozing deadly magma where they land. When all your Tempest Blades land, you can use the skill once more to bring forth the magma. If the magma hits enemies, it immediately resets Draco Surge's cooldown, and does not apply the cooldown for a certain number of times. This enhancement lasts during the cooldown of Bladefall. Only usable with Tempest Blades summoned. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Each blade strikes for #damage% damage #attackCount times and creates a pool of magma where it lands after #u sec.
The magma hits up to #y enemies, dealing #w% damage #z times, and increases up to #q% in proportion to the time the blade remained in the ground after landing.
Ignores Draco Surge's cooldown #q2 time(s).
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
Final Form: Tempest Blades and magma's attack counts increase by 1.

string.name: desc
string.value: Makes your flesh as strong as steel so you're not pushed back by enemy attacks.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, Duration: #time sec, Knockdown Immunity and Status Resistance: +#indieAsrR
Damage increases +#x% when hit, Max Stack: #y times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
[Passive Effects - STR: +#strX, Max HP: +#mhpX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Swings a spear so fast it creates a dark storm and devastate the area in front of you. The final attack is unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Deals #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively, on up to #mobCount enemies, for up to #t sec. Recover #w% of max HP for every attack that lands.
When key is released, activates a shockwave #z times that deals #q final attack(s) with #s% damage to a max of #y enemies. Recover #w2% of max HP for every final attack that lands.
All Calamitous Cyclone hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, and Additional Monster Def Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glorious cross-section of light blazes, symbolizing noble sacrifice. You can continuously attack while moving at a slow pace, and can gain more strength the longer the sacrifice continues. You will not be pushed back by any enemy attacks while casting, and the Stun Abnormal Status will be ignored.

string.name: h
string.value:
Consumes #u2% of max HP per sec. Deals #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively on up to #mobCount enemies while holding the key down.
#cAfter some time passes, the cross gets bigger#, which increases attack speed and deals #s% damage.
Max Key-down Time: #v2 sec, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Damage Reduction During Key-down: #x% (including Percentage HP attacks)
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tap into your subconscious abilities and use your power to its fullest potential. Increases the ability gained from the Combo Orb and allows you to leave a tear in space when #cRaging Blow is used#. The tear in space is unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cRaging Blow Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
Can be used if you have at least 1 Combo Orb. MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec
The Combo Orb increases Final Damage, damage to bosses, and Attack Power by #t%.
Decreases the chance of charging Combo Orbs by #x%
#cTear in Space#: Periodically activates a rift #s time(s). Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cannot charge the Combo Orb with the Tear in Space.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sacrifice all your Fury to summon malevolent twin gods of pure rage. The twin gods' attacks are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Fury Cost: #forceCon
Summon Duration: #time sec.
#cNemea#: Attacks every #x sec., Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Max Hits: #attackCount, Additional Fury Absorption: #s
#cGeryon#: Attacks every #z sec., Damage: #w%, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Hits: #y, Additional Fury Absorption: #s2
All Orthrus hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +#cr% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhance Gigas Wave with the strength of an ancient dragon. The Dragon Warrant launches forward to deal additional attacks to the enemy. Requires recharging time after skill is used.
All enemies, including bosses, will be Slowed when hit by Draco Surge. The Dragon Warrant is unaffected by attack reflection.
#cDragon Link: During Attack + Gigas Wave#
Required Skill: #cGigas Wave Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. After that, launches the Dragon Warrant, Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #y, Max Enemies Hit: #u. Additional Critical rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Final Form: Increases Draco Wave's attack count by #w
#cActivates upon using Gigas Wave#
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Draw on your soul power and imbue your sword with a radiant light. You can use Radiant Soul Slash with a #cregular attack# while equipping Radiant Soul. Using Action Customization allows you to use Radiant Soul Slash with a regular attack or #Radiant Cross#. By reusing the #cskill#, you can use Light Force Rei, which emits intense light, one time. The afterimage of the sword is unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cAction Customization Lock: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon
Equip a Sword of Light for #time sec., empowering your attacks. Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Critical Rate: +#indieCr%, and Ignore Defense: +#indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Increases the duration of Royal Guard to a total of #t sec.
While active, the afterimage of the sword periodically falls upon up to #z enemies, attacking #q times for #w% damage.
#cRadiant Soul Slash#: #c[Radiant Soul Skill]# MP Cost: #x, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cLight Force Rei#: #c[Radiant Soul Skill]# Max Enemies Hit: #w2, Damage: #q2%, Number of Light Attacks: #s, Number of Light Attack Occurrences: #s2.
When Radiant Soul Slash and Light Force Rei hits, #dot% chance to Blind for #dotTime sec and decrease Accuracy by #dotInterval%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Focus your wisdom and the strength of your soul to call forth a stunning eclipse. When the sun and the moon completely overlap, #cuse the skill one more time# to use Equinox Divide. Equinox Divide can be used while attacking with Solar Slash, Luna Divide, and Styx Crossing. The eclipse is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, creates an eclipse, attacking up to#mobCount enemies #attackCount time(s), dealing #damage% damage #time times consecutively. Invincible during casting.\n#cEquinox Divide#: The eclipse dissipates, triggering explosions #s2 time(s) at a certain interval. Max Enemies Hit: #s, Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #dot. Invincible while casting. If you use in the air, you can use it while using an attack skill in mid-air. \nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cuts through the sun and the moon with the power of soul.

string.name: desc
string.value: Amplify the Desperado's power and call forth a brilliant sword of destruction. When the sword spins, the attack deals damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP. Summon a magical sword for #time sec every #x sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
The skill duration becomes 1/#q if #cthe skill is used again# while summoning, but the magical sword will spin quickly and deal #z% damage to #y enemies #w times.
All Dimensional Sword hits receive Defense Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the Revolver Gauntlet to unleash the combined power of all of your bullets in one concussive blast. The Charge and explosion deal damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection. The Charge action cannot be canceled by the Charge Skill, but pressing the skill again will immediately explode. If you press the down arrow key when you release the skill key, it will attack in place instead of charging forward.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Ammo Cost: 1 after reloading bullets upon casting
Can prepare for up to #y sec, adds up to #w bullets by using Revolving Cannon
Launches an explosion in proportion to the number of bullets used after Charge when the key is released. Skill can be used again during Charge to launch an immediate explosion.
Invincible during preparation and Charge. Invincible for 1 sec upon immediate explosion. Combo Training remains at the max level while casting skill.
#cCharge#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cExplosion#: Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #s
All hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +#cr% and Additional Ignore Defense: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Drive swords into the earth to create a personal sanctuary, use the skill again, then inflict a devastating attack after you teleport back in time.\nCooldown for Alpha and Beta will be applied.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, creates a sanctuary that lasts during cooldown. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
#cAlpha#: Deals Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. #cBeta#: Deals Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #w
#cSkill Cooldown#: Consumes #z Time Force to destroy the sanctuary, move to the location, and attack up to #v enemies. #cAlpha#: Activates a sword attack #dot time(s), Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #y. #cBeta#: Activates a sword attack #s time(s). Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #w2
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Drive swords into the earth to create a personal sanctuary, use the skill again, then inflict a devastating attack after you teleport back in time.\nCooldown for Alpha and Beta will be applied.

string.name: h
string.value:
Time Force Cost: #forceCon, creates a sanctuary that lasts during cooldown. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
#cAlpha#: Deals Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. #cBeta#: Deals Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #w
#cSkill Cooldown#: Consumes #z Time Force to destroy the sanctuary, move to the location, and attack up to #v enemies. #cAlpha#: Activates a sword attack #dot time(s), Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #y. #cBeta#: Activates a sword attack #s time(s), Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #w2
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the ancient sword of destruction to cause a massive collapse.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
An attack that deals #damage% damage #attackCount times when summoned and activates #x times.
After it's summoned, an additional sword pierce deals #w% damage #z times and activates #y times.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Creates a space filled with countless aether swords. The command only works on nearby swords, and if you are separated the swords will return to attack.
Aether swords created from Infinity Blade are only affected by the effects of Grave Proclamation and not Noble Summons or Aether Bloom.
Unaffected by attack reflection. Pursues enemies only when Adele is in combat.
Required Skill: #cGrave Proclamation Lv. 20+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: #y sec, creates #bulletCount aether swords that attack #attackCount times with #damage% damage
On successful hits, #prop% chance to create an aether crystal.
#cCooldown #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily restores the lost magical conduit and the enchanted wings of the past.\nLegacy Restoration is unaffected by attack reflection, and using the skill again will immediately end the skill.\nRequired Skill: #cTrue Nobility Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value:
#mpRCon% max MP will be consumed every sec while casting and after casting
Duration: #time sec, Damage: #y%, Aether obtained: #x%, +#z aether swords that can be commanded with Hunting Decree
Periodically spreads enchanted wings to attack #mobCount mobs with #damage% damage #attackCount times and restores #t% of max HP for you and your party members.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Slice forward faster than the eye can see using a combo orb. Sword Illusion is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount, Chase Cut Activation Count: #x. Afterwards, activates #z explosion(s), which attack #y time(s) for #w% damage.\nWhile Combo Attack is active, upon use, increases Final Damage for #time sec by the Final Damage bonus of the #u Combo Orbs. Final Damage increase from Combo Orb is additive.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the hammer of an ancient god, then hurl it straight toward your enemies.\nUsing the directional keys, you can throw up to 4 copies of the hammer at once. Each successful hit creates a powerful shockwave.\nThe hammer tracks down the enemy with the highest HP, aside from the one it had just attacked. All of the hammers' attacks are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, sets 1 enemy as the target and deals #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Additional Critical Rate: #cr%. Tracks down a total of #mobCount enemies as targets, including the first attack.
A shockwave occurs after attacking the tracked target, dealing additional attacks to #dot enemies, with #range% damage, #prop time(s).
1 Hammer will be prepared every #x sec, and you can hold up to #y.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: By the power of the enhanced contract with darkness, unleash a dark aura to both siphon enemies' life force and add a special ability.\nDarkness Aura is unaffected by Attack Reflection. Reusing this skill during its effect will deactivate that effect. After offering the absorbed life force to darkness, you can make a deadly attack. During the final attack of Gungnir's Descent, Nightshade Explosion, and Calamitous Cyclone, it is possible to cancel the final detonation.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Periodically attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times over #time sec. Recover #x% Max HP per attack and obtain 1 Life Force. If HP Recovery exceeds Max HP, gain an HP shield amounting to #v% of the recovery amount. Max Life Force: #s, Max Shield: #y% of Max HP. Periodically generates a maximum-strength shield. Damage Taken -#w% (includes damage proportional to Max HP).\n#cReusing this skill while it is active will cancel its effect and trigger a dark slash# that strikes #s2 enemies for #q2% damage #u2 times, plus an additional #w2 slashes for each #v2 Life Force possessed.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Inspire your allies and scorch your enemies with the light of unfailing courage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #y sec., Damage: +#z%.\n#cParty Effect#: Forms a protective shield that corresponds to #x% of your party's cumulative max HP. Protective Shield Duration: #time sec., #w% of maximum reduced every sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Damage is increased by the light of unfailing courage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash an explosive eruption of forged Spiritual Resin. Activates when your attack skill hits while in Falling Moon or Rising Sun stances. Cooldown is reduced when #cstance is changed# with Equinox Cycle or #cStyx Crossing hits.# Flare Slash is unaffected by attack reflection and cooldown reduction.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount , Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec, reduced by #t sec when changing stance with Equinox Cycle and reduced by 1.5x when Styx Crossing hits.

string.name: desc
string.value: Create a blizzard that stuns enemies and calls down the Dire Wolf's Curse. Enemies hit by the blizzard will resist stuns for 90 seconds and won't be stunned by other skills, such as Blizzard Tempest, either. If Aran's direct attack skills, aside from Finisher - Storm of Fear, successfully hit enemies who are under the Dire Wolf's Curse, the curse grows stronger, dealing additional damage to any enemies under the curse. Blizzard Tempest attacks do not count toward combos, and the ice chunks ignore attack reflection.\n#cRight-click to toggle the ice chunk effect ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Stun Duration: #time sec. Stun Duration can increase up to 100% depending on the damage dealt with this attack. For #q sec afterwards, activates an aura that periodically casts the Dire Wolf's curse on up to #range enemies. Using the skill again, while its effect is active, will cancel that effect.\n#cDire Wolf's Curse#: Duration: #x sec, Upon a successful hit, attacks up to #u enemies under the curse with ice chunks, dealing #w% damage #s time(s). The curse can stack up to #y time(s), and ice chunks increase by #v in proportion to it.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Cast the Dire Wolf's Curse on nearby enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Erupt with overwhelming destructive force and become invincible. When used while Demon Awakening is active, the awakened force is unleashed and increases its power.\nWhen you stop holding the skill key, the force will surround you, allowing you to deal a more powerful attack. To cancel the final attack, use the skill again while holding the down arrow key.

string.name: h
string.value:
Fury Cost: #forceCon, HP Cost: #hpCon, Invincibility Duration: #t sec.
When used while Demon Awakening is active, Demon Bane Final Damage: +#s%
Attacks up to #mobCount enemies with #damage% damage #attackCount times during key-down. Max Key-Down Time: #z sec.
#cWhen you stop holding the key#, consecutively attack #w enemies with #x% damage #y time(s), increases attack time by #qx in proportion to key-down duration.
Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Ignore Defense: +#ignoreMobpdpR% for all attacks
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Surround oneself in a force field and destroy enemies while in an invincible state.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your unceasing rage warps you into a specter, wavering between life and death.\nWhile active, HP cannot drop below 1 due to damage taken, you don't suffer debilitating status conditions, and the damage you take is saved as fury. Your fury then attacks the surrounding in the form of thorns, though it will also keep you in pain, even after the skill ends.\nUsing the skill again, while its effect is active, will cancel that effect. The thorns of fury deal damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection. While Revenant is active, receiving continuous damage due to the fury effect will maintain your combat state.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, Duration: #time sec
When using the Exceed skill, activates Thorn of Fury, which damages #y enemies with #z% damage #w time(s). Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%, Cooldown: #v sec
Saves #cDamage Taken#, up to #q% of Max HP, as Fury, and reduces cooldown in proportion to the amount saved. Your current Fury amount decreases by #q2% periodically.
#cAfter the skill ends,# any saved Fury, plus #v2% of max HP will come back to you as damage #u time(s). This damage cannot kill you by itself.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Draw on the power of rage, which damages you even as it strengthens you.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful attack creates afterimage-like shockwaves, which sweep through enemies. The afterimages' attacks are unaffected by attack reflection. Using the skill again, while its effect is active, will cancel that effect.

string.name: h
string.value: #cActive Effect#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Upon successful hits with Arm Cannon's direct attacks and Bunker Buster Explosion, this skill creates afterimages that deal #z additional attack(s) with #w% damage for #time sec. Afterimages can be created up to #y time(s). Reoccurrence Cooldown: #t sec\n#cPassive Effect#: While the active effect of Afterimage Shock's isn't active, upon successful hits with the Arm Cannon, this skill creates afterimages, which attack up to #v enemies that have not been hit with #s% damage up to #u time(s). Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously. Reoccurrence Cooldown: #x sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Call forth an ancient dragon god, and with it flame incarnate. Envelop yourself in flames to burn nearby enemies, and leave Fire Energy in your wake.
If your attack skill successfully hits, the trail of Fire Energy you leave behind will explode to deal AoE damage. Using the skill again, while its effect is active, will cancel that effect.

If your attack skill successfully hits during cooldown, during which Dragonflare isn't active, a flame orb will form to deal additional attacks. All Dragonflare attacks are unaffected by attack reflection.
#cRight-click to toggle the Flame Orb Creation on/off#.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Deals automatic attacks to up to #mobCount surrounding enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times periodically for #time sec.
#cFire Energy#: Maintained for #x sec. Upon detonation, the Fire Energy and surroundings near Kaiser will attack up to #q enemies for #z% damage #s time(s). Explosion Cooldown: #t sec
#cFire Orb#: #u Forms Fire Orb(s) that attack for #v% damage #s2 time(s). Re-creation Cooldown: #v2 sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Send your weapon to attack enemies with a will of its own. Activated upon successful hits of the Zero character's direct attack skills. A separate cooldown is applied between Alpha and Beta. Targets and attacks the enemy with the highest max HP. Ego Weapon is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #cAlpha#: Lazuli forms #mobCount blade(s), attacking #attackCount time(s) for #damage% damage.\n#cBeta#: Lapis forms #y Heavy Swords, unleashing #u shocks(s) for #v% damage to #z enemies\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Send your weapon to attack enemies with a will of its own. Activated upon successful hits of the Zero character's attack skills. A separate cooldown is applied between Alpha and Beta. Ego Weapon is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: All aether swords commanded by Hunting Decree sweep around you in a wild current. With Hunting Decree, gather illusions around your person in proportion to the number of swords hunting for the enemy. Storm is unaffected by attack reflection, and the skill can be used again to immediately end it.\nRequired Skill: #cNoble Summons Lv. 20+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Automatically attacks up to #mobCount nearby enemies periodically, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s).\nUpon casting, once more than 2 aether swords have been commanded, the skill's attack count is increased by #x for each pair of aether swords beyond those first two.\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Become a shield for your fellow party members. Temporarily blocks the damage and debilitating status conditions on party members inside the area, and increases your Final Damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Cosmic]#\nUnleash a swirl of a complete galaxy around you. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cSoul Element Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, consumes all cosmic orbs to unleash the galaxy
#cGalaxy Unleash#: periodically deals #damage% damage #attackCount times up to #mobCount enemies for #u sec
Attack interval decreases per cosmic orb consumed
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Final Damage increases by detonating the combo orb's power.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Evan infuses Mir with his magic during #cDragon Slam#, causing Mir to briefly grow and release a blast of elemental energy. This skill advances alongside Dragon Slam. Unaffected by attack reflection.\n\c Activates when Evan uses #cElemental Barrage# while Mir is using #cDragon Slam#.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Fusion Skill]# Mir immediately stops attacking and teleports to Evan, creating a vortex that deals damage to nearby enemies.\nThis skill advances alongside Dragon Slam.\n\c Activates when Evan uses #c[Return]# while Mir is using #cDragon Slam or Wyrmking's Breath.#

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases your attack skills by overloading the mana flowing through you.

string.name: h
string.value:
Consumes #x% Max MP to increase the Final Damage of all your skills (excluding some skills) by #z%. 
Consumes #t% Max HP for jobs without MP. 
Can be toggled#c on/off#. 
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons flame orbs from another dimension to pursue enemies. The flame orbs target the boss with the highest HP first. The number of orbs you summon depends on how many damage-over-time stacks you have on enemies.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Flame Orbs Created: #x, Damage Per Orb: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec
Flame Orb Damage: #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.
This skill summons 1 additional orb for every #y of your damage over time stack(s) on enemies in range. Up to #z Flame Orbs can be summoned in total.
When multiple orbs hit a single target, their Final Damage is reduced by #w%, starting with the second orb.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Covers the world in the ice of an ancient glacier. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%. Freezes enemies in range.\nArea stays icy for #y sec, periodically dealing #q% damage #z time(s). Damage and freezing effects stack on enemies in range.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon your holy power to create a consecrated space that empowers and revitalizes your allies. Benedictions do not stack. After using Benediction, use it again within a certain window to reduce its duration and cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec., Final Damage (all party members in range including yourself) +#q%
Party members other than yourself periodically recover #x% of max HP/MP, clear certain statuses, and have their Attack Speed increased.
Final Damage: +1% per #q2 INT (up to +#w% max)
HP/MP Recovery: +1% per #y INT (up to #z% max)
Attack Speed: +1 per #u INT (up to +3 max)
Using the skill again within #s2 sec after use reduces duration by #u2 sec and cooldown by #w2 sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurls a giant ball of flame that shoots forward before returning to you. It disappears if you move too far. It's a fire-attribute attack.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost:#mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Ignore Enemy DEF: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a gate to a realm of pure light whose blinding glow incinerates nearby. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec\n#cCan be used once while Equilibrium is active#\n#cIt can be used while Equilibrium is in a delay state, but the Equilibrium state and available uses are shared.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Combine all of your auras and become a grim specter of death. While using Aura Scythe, aura type skills cannot be used. While a Battle Mage in your party is using Aura Scythe, you cannot use aura type skills, except for Weakening Aura or Aura Scythe. When Aura Scythe ends, the aura skill that was active before Aura Scythe was used reactivates automatically.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon per sec, Duration: #time sec, grants the effect of all your auras. Additional Magic ATT increase by #indieMad for the self.
The Aura Scythe enhances your Blow skills. MP Cost: #q, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%.
Can be toggled On/Off.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleashes your psychic powers to create a tornado that gathers in nearby objects. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon#, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec.
The tornado grows and grows until the skill ends or is used again, causing the objects inside to be thrown forward.
Thrown Object - Deals #u% damage to up to #q enemies #w2 times and explodes #dot times, dealing #q2% damage to up to #s enemies #s2 times. Final Damage increases up to 3 times in proportion to the object's size.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilizes powerful elemental magic for rapid attacks. You'll get new powers for a short time after each attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, uses magic 4 times in a row, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Critical Rate: +#cr%
Each element increases Final Damage by #y% for #x sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
Casting Elemental Barrage after a Mir skill will instead trigger a#c fusion skill#. Casting Elemental Barrage while lying down will not prevent the fusion skill from triggering. However, MP cost will be multiplied by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilizes powerful elemental magic for rapid attacks. You'll get new powers for a short time after each attack.

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases a poisonous cloud that spreads in all directions, striking nearby enemies. You can detonate the cloud to inflict additional damage. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Creates a number of poisonous clouds that deal #damage% damage #attackCount times and inflict an additional #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.
Enemies can only be struck by one poisonous cloud.
#w sec or more after poisonous clouds are created, you can use Mist Eruption to detonate them which hits up to #x enemies and deals #z% damage #y times. Explosion damage from poisonous clouds may stack, but if more than #u are applied to a single enemy, the Final Damage for the additional explosions is decreased by #s%.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a wall of lightning that pulses forward, electrocuting enemies in its path. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, conjures #w lightning bolts that attack up to #q enemies, dealing #v% damage #s times.
The lightning moves forward as it strikes, but will continue to strike the same place if its path is blocked.
Final Damage of lightning bolt decreases by #q2% every time the enemy is attacked repeatedly.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an angel of compassion and vengeance. Not usable while Bahamut is active. Avenging Angel is unaffected by attack reflection. Targets the boss with the highest HP first (within attack range). After using Angel of Balance, use it again within a certain window to reduce its duration and cooldown.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec
After use, use the skill again within #s2 sec to reduce duration by #u2 sec and cooldown by #w2 sec.
#cAngel of Benevolence#: Grants a buff that recovers #y% of party members' Max HP every #x sec., and increases their damage by #w%, for #subTime sec. and by 1% per #attackCount INT. Damage can increase by up to #damage%.
#cAvenging Angel#: Attacks up to #s enemies dealing #z% damage #v times. Attacked enemies are marked for #q sec. Holy damage dealt to marked enemies by you and party members consumes the mark and grants the attack Final Damage +#q2%.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an angel of compassion and vengeance. Not usable while Bahamut is active. Avenging Angel is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a magic symbol that oscillates between light and darkness. The magic symbol changes depending on your light/dark state, but does not receive bonuses from Sunfire, Eclipse, or Equilibrium. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount
#cSunfire# - Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cEclipse# - Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #z
#cEquilibrium# - Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #v
Critical Rate: +#cr% to all attacks
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash the true might of the Essence of Fire. Only usable while Fires of Creation is active. Attack varies based on the Fire Essence summoned. Using it while pressing the down arrow key will activate an attack that matches a Fire Essence that isn't summoned. \nThis skill consumes all the flames, boosting its attack power in proportion to the number of flames consumed. It's a fire-attribute attack.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPassive Effects#: Gain 1 Flame Charge when normal enemy is hit #v times, boss is hit #z times or boss is defeated #s times with Blaze Wizard's direct skill attack, up to #y flames.
#cActive Effect# - MP Cost: #mpCon, Flame Cost: #x+ charges, Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Blazing Lion]: Activates explosion #w2 times, hitting up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #w times. Increases Final Damage by #v2% for every Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
[Flame Fox]: Maintained up to #dot sec. Creates #q foxfires that target the boss with the highest HP first and strike #q2 enemies within range. Each foxfire deals #dotInterval% damage and can regenerate up to #u2 times. Regenerates #s2 more time for each #u Flame Charge over the minimum cost.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Mir Skill]# Mir slams down and savagely attacks the enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.\n#cMir's skills and fusion skills are not affected by effects that increase attack speed.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Duration: 2.5 sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summon an altar of destructive magic. Once two or more have been placed, the first altar fires an orb of deadly void energy, which travels between the altars, decimating all in its path.
Each orb can only strike a given enemy once until recharged by the next altar. The orbs' travel time is the same regardless of the distance between altars.
Additional altars must be placed within range of the previous altar. Enemies hit are marked with a Dark Brand.
If you use the skill with the Down key while there are no altars placed, you can place 2 altars at once, one at the character's current location and the other in front of the character.
Altar of Annihilation is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Altar Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
The orb takes 0.8 sec to move to the next altar. After 2 altars, the number of attacks increases by #u for every additional altar.
A new altar can be summoned every #v sec, up to #y altars.
Enemies hit gain Dark Brand.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Conjure ultra-dense matter out of pure psychic energy, then push it toward the enemy. Using the skill again redirects the matter toward yourself, at a reduced speed.\nIf you use Psychic Force downward, the direction changes, but the speed does not increase. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon#, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
While traveling towards you, the object moves at #w% speed.
Inflicts an additional #u% damage on up to #s enemies, #v times, when the object disappears.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an angel of compassion and vengeance. Not usable while Bahamut is active. Avenging Angel is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Moves you to a different dimension to reduce the damage you take. Use the skill again to return. While in Ethereal Form, you cannot use other skills.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec. Grants Knockback Immunity. Situations that would normally cause you to take damage instead reduce your MP by #x. If this would reduce your MP below 0, you will instead take normal HP damage. If your job does not utilize MP, you will instead lose #y HP.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires an intense beam of energy that scorches everything in its path.\nCan move while holding#c the skill key#. Upon hitting an enemy, Lucent Brand is refreshed.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost per Attack: #mpCon, Max Key-Down Duration: #time sec, DoT: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Damage increased by #bdR% when attacking a boss.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: When Crystal Ignition comes in contact with your crystal, its strength is enhanced, and it fires 3 powerful beams of light in the direction Crystal Ignition is traveling. While using Wings of Glory, it activates automatically even if you don't have a crystal. Levels up alongside Crystal Ignition.

string.name: h
string.value: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Boss Damage: +#bdR%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\n#cCooldown: 1 sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a mechanical warrior wielding a weapon forged from light.
The Templar prepares to attack in the direction of the boss with the highest HP first within attack range. If there is no boss within attack range, it prepares to attack in the direction with many enemies to attack.
If both left and right have the same priority, it prepares to attack in Illium's direction, and will not change direction until the attack is made.
With sufficient Crystal Charges, it fires a more powerful attack.
Ignores Attack Reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, DoT: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nIf Crystal Charges reach #y while preparing, or while Wings of Glory is active, Final Damage is multiplied by 2.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash the fury of flame in the form of an enraged spirit. Can be only used when Ifrit is summoned. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cIfrit Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Attack Duration: #y sec\nDuration increases #t sec per 1 active Fervent Drain\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the devastating frosts of the El Nath Mountains. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, stacks Freeze, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Duration: #time sec\nWhen attacking 1 enemy, Freeze Stacks: #z\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use the power of mytocrystals to form a crystalline spirit and drive your enemies away. Can activate the Reaction skill with the crystalline spirit.
Use with the down arrow key to consume all the crystal shards to install the crystalline spirit at once.
Does not reduce the number of enemies that can be attacked when the Radiant Javelin comes into contact.
Cannot use while Wings of Glory is active.
Required Skill: #cReaction - Destruction II Lv. 1 and above# and #cReaction - Domination II Lv. 1 and above#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, uses 1 crystal shard
A crystalline spirit forms near the mytocrystal for #time sec. Only #z% of Final Damage for the Reaction skill the spirit activates is applied, but if it's the 5th skill, #w% is applied. Not affected by cooldown reset.
Using #cWings of Glory# will disperse the crystalline spirit. Each spirit dispersed in the remaining time increases damage by #u%.
Prepares 1 crystal shard every #q sec up to #y shards.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +#madX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Master the art of black magic and summon death itself to deal with your enemies. The summon duration gets longer as there are more souls to be sacrificed. The god of death's attack deals damage to enemies even when they are under attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Summon the Grim Harvest, which attacks for #time sec every #w sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Use the skill again to re-summon near you. Can be used once every 10 sec.
If the Grim Harvest defeats an enemy, its duration increases by #t sec per enemy. If it hits a boss, its duration increases by #z sec. Duration increased to up to #s sec for each attack.
Attack interval becomes 50% with the #cMaster of Death applied,# but attacks do not increase the skill's duration in that case.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hurl the embodiment of divine power directly at your enemies. Upon contact with the enemies, the power both damages them and restores #cparty member HP#.\nAs it disappears, the object transforms into Holy Light, attacking enemies nearby and granting a buff to party members. It disappears immediately if #cthe skill is used again#.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Deals #damage% damage, to up to #mobCount enemies, #attackCount time(s) at every interval, or restores #hp% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object.
Max Contact Count: #w. Both attacks and recovery consume the contact count.
#cHoly Light:# Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #dot%, Number of Attacks: #z. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by #q2% for #time sec, while also increasing damage by #w2% for each remaining contact.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the ultimate combination of light and dark to eviscerate your enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cEnder Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, activates the Baptism of Light and Darkness #s times consecutively. Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Bonus Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Ignore Defense: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
If an #cEquilibrium skill# hits while #cEquilibrium# is active, Baptism of Light and Darkness Cooldown: -#w sec
#cWhen Equilibrium is activated, the cooldown of Baptism of Light and Darkness is reset once.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Blaze through your enemies with the phoenix's symbol of infinite life and death. It's a fire-attribute attack.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon per sec., consumes 1 Phoenix Feather
Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
1 Phoenix Feather will be prepared every #z sec. You can have up to #x feathers.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cast a magical circle to channel the power of the constellations. Magic ATT starts to charge the magic circle when Evan's magic (excluding Spiral of Mana) hits a target, culminating when Magic ATT is full. Unaffected by attack reflection. Only the first attack of Elemental Barrage will have the element applied.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, sets up a magic circle for #z sec. Liberation starts when Magic ATT reaches #x, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount times consecutively, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%\n#y Magic ATT will be charged if a skill with an attribute hits a target, but it will #conly be charged once per skill#. Charges 1 Magic ATT when a skill with no attribute hits a target, and there is no charge limit\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Fuse monsters and objects into one and launch them like bullets. A Micro Black Hole forms for a short duration at the end of the attack range and deals additional attacks to nearby enemies. But, two Micro Black Holes cannot exist at the same time.
The Micro Black Hole is unaffected by attack reflection.
You can also use it by pressing the down key+[Psychic Grab] while the monster is lifted up.
Required Skill: #cPsychic Grab 2 Lv. 30#

string.name: h
string.value: #Psychic Point Cost: #ppCon. Attacks the enemies you're lifting and up to #mobCount enemies in front of you to deal #damage% damage #attackCount time(s). Charges #ppRecovery Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a boss monster.\n#cMicro Black Hole#: Activates a black hole #s times. Damage: #x%, Max Enemies Hit: #z, Number of Attacks: #y. Charges #u Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a target.

string.name: desc
string.value: You received a damage increase buff from the Holy Light.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash a fatal poison on a chain of enemies. Poisoned enemies periodically release clouds of additional poison, damaging both themselves and other nearby enemies. Even if they survive the initial explosion, the poison effect stacks, raising the power of further explosions. If an enemy dies or disappears before an explosion, the poison spreads to nearby enemies immediately. If there are no enemies, the effect remains as a crystal for a certain amount of time, ready to spread to nearby enemies and then disappear. Once a certain number of explosions has occurred, the poison will wear off from every enemy simultaneously. Doesn't activate Elemental Drain, and poison is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Poison Duration: #y sec. Explosions from poisoned enemies attack #v times with #q% damage periodically, and spread to #x enemies nearby that aren't poisoned.
If there are no enemies nearby, this skill creates a poison crystal for #s2 sec. The poison crystal either spreads to 1 enemy nearby and disappears or naturally disappears, without spreading, when the duration ends.
Poison accumulates up to #z times. Explosion damage increases #s%p each in proportion to the accumulated poison.
Explosions can occur up to #w times on 1 enemy and up to #u times on all enemies in total.
If the skill ended because the available explosions were used up, all poison is removed, followed by an additional explosion.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Launch orbs full of the thunder god's power directly at your enemies.\nThe orb goes inside the enemy it touched to deal continuous shock damage. An electric current flows periodically around that enemy to attack others. If the enemy touched by the orb dies or disappears, another one appears in the location of the enemy and moves.\nThe orb disappears if it consumes all of the max number of shocks or moves beyond a certain distance. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Enemies touched by the orb are stunned #attackCount times, for #damage% damage, at fixed intervals. Max Number of Shocks: #x. Reduces Freeze stacks for every #v stuns.
Shocked enemies receive #v2% increased Final Damage from lightning attribute attacks except Jupiter Thunder.
Electric current flows around shocked enemy, periodically attacking #prop enemies #dot times for #s% damage.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec., Cooldown reduced by #t sec. for every shock that didn't activate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Punish the wicked in the name of all that is holy. Punished enemies receive the same Final Damage Increase debuff as Angel Ray.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost per Attack: #mpCon, consumes 1 holy light per sec.
Attacks up to #mobCount enemies to the front, for #damage% damage, #attackCount times.
1 holy light is prepared every #t sec., and you can hold up to #y at a time.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summon the fire of a playful salamander spirit.
Salamander tracks a nearby enemy to attack when a direct skill attack by Blaze Wizard hits. In a single action, it either consumes all of the number of attacks or returns to the summoner's location when it strays too far.
Obtain Ember every time Salamander's attack hits, and Salamander's attack becomes stronger in proportion. You can get a Magic ATT increase buff in return for the Ember when Salamander disappears. This buff is not affected by Buff Freezer effects.
Unaffected by attack reflection, and prioritizes boss with highest Max HP. It's a fire-attribute attack.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Salamander Summon Duration: #time sec, Damage: #damage%, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. In a single action, consumes #v MP and attacks by bouncing up to #u times.
Obtain Ember every time Salamander's attack hits. Final Damage of Salamander's attack increases by #w% for every #y Ember. Up to #z Ember can be obtained.
When Salamander disappears, Magic ATT increases by #dot for #u2 sec, and Magic ATT additionally increases by #w2 for every #subTime Ember.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Manifest orbs of both light and darkness. If a #cskill corresponding to light or darkness# hits, an attack corresponding to that attribute will activate from the orb, and magic power of the relevant attribute will gather within the orb. If at least 1 magic power gathers, the orb can be freed to attack, targeting the enemy with the highest Max HP. When the magic power of light and darkness balances, or when more magic power accumulates, the damage increases.\nLight and darkness attacks are activated together while Equilibrium is active. Attacks from the orb are not affected by the effects of Sunfire, Eclipse, or Equilibrium. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#c[Passive Effect]#: Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #q, Cooldown: #x sec., obtain up to #u magic power per attribute.
#cLight#: creates up to #q2 light zone(s) that attacks up to #y enemies.
#cDarkness#: fires magic bullets that move back and forth across up to #mobCount enemies.
#c[Active Effect]#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
Duration: #time sec. Direct skill attacks create #prop magic orbs, each of which attack 1 enemy. The attack activates up to #v2 times. Additional Critical Rate: #cr%. Damage increases by #range%p for each unit of accumulated magic power beyond the first. Cooldown: #t sec.
#cImbalance#: creates a magic orb that deals #dot% damage.
#cBalance#: creates a magic orb that deals #subTime% damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Manifest orbs of both light and darkness.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Utilize Mana Burst's pentacle to allow clusters of mana to swirl with the speed of a tornado on their own. Can be activated by using the skill while Mana Burst IV is in use.
There can be only 1 Spiral of Mana. When active, using Mana Burst IV temporarily reduces the number of attacks of Spiral of Mana. Unaffected by attack reflection.
With Action Customization enabled, you can activate by pressing the down key and using Mana Burst again after 1 hit while Mana Burst IV is in use.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF#
Required Skill: #cMana Burst IV Lv. 30#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Number of Attacks: #x
Upon using Mana Burst IV, reduces Spiral of Mana number of attacks by #y for #w sec
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +#madX]

string.name: desc
string.value:
Immerse your surroundings in dark magic and call upon netherworld lightning. When Dark Shock is activated, or an attack caused by Dark Brand is activated, netherworld lightning attacks the area.
Creates a netherworld passage around the Battle Mage periodically. Pressing a directional button will teleport you to the nearest passage in that direction, then close that passage. During your teleportation, Dark Shock manifests and attacks.
During Abyssal Lightning, the Dark Brand will last through a greater number of attacks.
Required Skill: #cDark Shock Lv. 20 and above

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Invincible during casting and disarmament.
Duration: #time sec., Normal Monster Damage: +#indieNBDR%. Periodically creates #s netherworld passages. The passages remain for #v sec., and up to #u can exist in the map. Dark Brand attacks must be activated #w2 times to consume the brand.
#cNetherworld Lightning#: Max Enemies Hit: #w, Damage: #q%, Number of Attacks: #u2, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%, Ignores additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Enemy DEF, Cooldown: #t sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Bring down enemies with immense gravitational forces.
This skill attacks the enemy with the highest Max HP and inflicts a debuff. The debuffed enemy then attacks on your behalf by pulling in surrounding enemies or objects. As it pulls in enemies or objects, its gravitational force increases in power, but decreases in range.
(Does not work against flying enemies, but does work on movable platforms.)
#cIf the debuffed enemy disappears#, a gravity orb appears to pull enemies and objects in its place. All attacks, except for the first attack of Law of Gravity, are unaffected by attack reflection. Using this skill again, while the effect is active, will cancel the effect.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cPsychic Point Cost: #ppCon#, Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Debuff Duration: #time sec
Periodically attacks up to #z enemies with #x% damage #y times and pulls them in. Reduces the activation interval up to #prop times in proportion to the number of enemies pulled in so far, and Final Damage of the attack increases by #range%. If there is #cno enemy to pull in#, objects will get pulled in instead. It will be regarded as pulling in the same number of enemies as the max number of enemies that can be attacked.
Upon ending, it explodes to attack up to #v enemies with #w% damage #u times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Using advanced crystal technology, create passages you can move through freely. When you press the up key from the Crystal Gate that you activated, you can move to the #cnext Crystal Gate that is set up from this Crystal Gate#. If you #cuse the last Crystal Gate that is set up, you will move back to the first Crystal Gate#.\nThe gates must be recharged after each use, and the gates that you actually used will take longer to recharge. You can receive enhancement and attack support buffs around the Crystal Gate, and it can also be set up in the air.\nMoving through the passage is included as a necessary distance to activate the flow of combat.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Crystal Gates: #prop, activates after setting up at least #y. #cThe setup time and the Crystal Gate duration are the same.# After using it once, all Crystal Gates cannot be used for #v sec and Crystal Gates you actually used cannot be used for #u sec.
Periodically obtain Magic ATT +#s buff for #u2 sec around the Crystal Gate.
Direct skill attacks that hit during the buff will bombard #v2 times through the Crystal Gate up to #s2 enemies with #q2% damage. Cooldown: #t sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec. Cooldown is reduced as much as #w2% of the remaining cooldown if it ends before the Crystal Gate's duration.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can receive buff and attack support while near the Crystal Gate.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDragon Vein Skill#\nAwaken multiple dormant Dragon Veins in the area, all at once. The awakened Dragon Veins emanate intangible forces, which pursue and attack nearby enemies. The intangible forces will first target any boss monsters within the area, targeting the boss with the highest HP first. If there are no boss monsters, the forces will target the monsters near each Dragon Vein instead. Big Stretch prioritizes normal Dragon Veins for consumption over unconstrained Dragon Veins, and is unaffected by attack reflection. Applies 100% Knockback Resistance during casting motion.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Awaken #u Dragon Vein(s) within a certain range around another Dragon Vein.
Each awakened Dragon Vein creates #bulletCount intangible force(s). Intangible Force Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
If several intangible forces hit a single enemy, Final Damage for the second force and onwards: -#v%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec. Cooldown if awakened Dragon Vein count is less than the max number that can be awakened: -#w sec for each Dragon Vein that could be awakened

string.name: desc
string.value: Call every type of land spirit in Mother Nature's existence to frolic together. Land's Connection is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Land spirits appear in the order of Mountain, River, Wind, and Sunlight, shocking enemies with #damage% Damage #x time(s). Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Afterwards, activates explosion with #u% Damage #v time(s), Number of Attacks: #v2, Max Enemies Hit: #u2.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill the earth's flowing essence with magic and make it bloom, causing a mountain land spirit to surge forth. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Shock enemies with #damage% Damage #x time(s), Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls forth quirky Mountain Spirits who love to run. They'll then run amok throughout the area, attacking everything they bump into. If there are any boss monsters nearby, the Mountain Spirits will go after them first. The Mountain Spirits are unaffected by attack reflection. If there is no platform in the area for them to spring forth from, they can't be summoned in that area.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Summons #u group(s) of Mountain Spirits within a certain range. Once summoned, they periodically run at enemies to attack. Group Summon Duration: #time sec. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Running into enemies decreases running speed. Max Number of Attacks: #w2 per group\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates spirit arrows that pursue and attack nearby enemies. Unaffected by Attack reflection.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Arrow Damage: #damage% to 1 nearby enemy. Damage Against Normal Enemies: +#nbdR%

string.name: desc
string.value: Creates spirit arrows that pursue and attack nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Arrow Damage: #damage% damage #z times to 1 nearby enemy when in combat\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Arrows shot into the sky fall like rain. Unaffected by attack reflection. Has no effect in towns.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: +#indieDamR%, Duration: #time sec. Arrows rain down on a zone every #x sec for #t sec when you attack with your own skills. Up to #y of these zones can be created, but they cannot overlap.
The falling arrows deal #q% damage to up to #z enemies, #w times. If currently attacking more than one enemy, the number of attacks increases by #v for each additional enemy, for up to #s additional attacks.
Has 2x more of a chance than Quiver Cartridge does to activate Magic Arrow on attacks in this area.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a ferocious gust to punish your enemies.
Consumes 1 wind energy upon summoning. #cUsing the skill with the down arrow key# consumes 2 of your wind energy to summon a stronger gust. #cUsing it with the up arrow key# consumes 3 of your wind energy to summon 2 strong gusts.
The gust moves by continuously targeting the boss with the highest HP within the area, and reduces speed when attacking the enemy. There can only be 1 gust at a time, and it is unaffected by attack reflection.
#cRight-click to toggle speed reduction mode ON/OFF#.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, consumes wind energy to summon a gust for #s sec
The power of the summoned gust varies based on the amount of wind energy
1 - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Gust Summoned: 1
2 - Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #w2, Gust Summoned: 1
3 - Max Enemies Hit: #q, Gust Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #w2, Gust Summoned: 1. Max Enemies Hit: #q, Gust Damage: #s2%, Number of Attacks: #w2, Gust Summoned: 1
Wind energy increases by 1 every #x sec and you can hold up to #y.

string.name: desc
string.value: Your jaguars heed your call to battle. If you use the skill with the down arrow key, fewer Jaguars will appear, but those that do will be stronger.

string.name: h
string.value:
