MP Cost: #mpCon, summons #y jaguars from among the ones you've tamed (excluding your current jaguar) for #time sec. Applies #x% Final Damage to the skills of summoned jaguars. While this skill is active, using the jaguar skill to attack will cause a #u% damage increase in Damage Against Normal Monsters and #s% increase in the debuff chance for Another Bite.
If the skill is #cactivated with the down arrow key#, only #q jaguars will be summoned, but their Final Damage will increase to #w%.
#cIf you activate this skill again while it is active, your jaguars will be re-summoned to your location.# Jaguars can be re-summoned once every #z secs.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Passive Effect - ATT Power: +#padX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Catch your enemies square in your sights. Use the left mouse button to attack, or the right mouse button to cancel the skill. Obtain the Marked Target buff every time the enemy is hit. Unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Shooting once, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Multiple Critical Shot Count: #q
Damage Range: #z% - #w% depending on enemy's proximity to the center of your sights. Ignore Defense: #ignoreMobpdpR%
Duration: #time sec. Invincible for #u2 sec. after skill ends.
Successful hits grant Marked Target for #s2 sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon forth the spirits of Elluel to devastate your foes. The spirits' energy and Elluel's form are unaffected by attack reflection. The energy does not activate while using Sylvidia's Flight, but the skill's Final Damage increases in proportion to the activation rate.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, your afterimages may mimic the skills you use up to 3 times each
Afterimage Final Damage: #x%
Afterimage Skill Mimic Chance: #z% (-20% per successful mimic)
Ishtar's Ring and Irkalla's Wrath Activation Chance: 50%
Elluel's Form - Deal #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies every #s2 sec, cooldown decreases by 1 sec after using a linked skill
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon forth the spirits of Elluel to devastate your foes. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, your afterimages may mimic the skills you use (except Ishtar's Ring) up to 3 times each
Afterimage Final Damage: #x%
Afterimage Skill Mimic Chance: #z% (-20% per successful mimic)
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Your Jaguar unleashes the full fury of the wild to savagely hunt your enemies.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Grants invincibility for #s sec. #c[Primary Attack]# Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Primary attack occurs #y times. #c[Final Attack]# Activates a shock #w times that unleashes #v attacks for #u% damage. Shock has Critical Rate +#cr% and Ignores #ignoreMobpdpR% additional Defense.
Final Attack can be triggered immediately by using the skill before the Primary Attacks are complete, with a #prop% chance for Another Bite debuff to be at max stack.
If not mounted, causes you to mount your Jaguar. Invincible while mounting.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Magically enchants your arrows to explode as they approach the enemy, releasing countless more arrows. Arrow Fragments activated by Piercing Arrow don't split.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Landing a hit with Snipe, Empowered Piercing Arrow, Empowered Snipe, Piercing Arrow, or -- after using Repeating Crossbow Cartridge -- Full Burst Shot causes your arrow to split and attack up to #mobCount enemies, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times.\nIgnore Enemy Defense: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ride into battle on Sylvidia, the majestic queen of unicorns. Activate once to mount, then again to perform a dash attack. Activate the skill while pressing Up to attack upward. While riding Sylvidia, you can only use some attack skills, but the attack speed for certain skills is increased, and you receive Ignis Roar at max stacks. Sylvidia doesn't expire while you are using Irkalla's Wrath.\nDismount: Use the down key and basic attack at the same time.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Mount Duration: #time sec. Attack Power: +#indiePadR%, Damage Taken: -#indieDamReduceR% (Includes HP% Based Attacks)\nDash attack deals #w% damage to up to #v enemies #z times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Active Effect]# Causes you to attack so quickly you produce afterimages. Unaffected by attack reflection. #c[Passive Effect]# After performing a certain number of attacks while the skill is on cooldown, an afterimage is created that attacks for a short time.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Duration: #time sec. Fire arrows at set intervals, dealing #damage% #attackCount times to enemies within range of your afterimages, for #s sec., during the buff.
When the attack hits, Afterimage Attack Duration: +#x sec every #q2 sec.
When the attack duration ends, afterimages stop attacking.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Passive Effect: For every #u attacks performed while this skill is on cooldown, an afterimage is created that lasts #q sec. and periodically attacks enemies within its range for #w% damage #z times.]
Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon the Spirit of Wind to conjure deadly homing projectiles that track down your foes. The Spirit of Wind targets the boss with the highest HP first.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Creates #x enemy-seeking Spirit Arrows that deal #damage% damage #attackCount times.
If more than one Spirit Arrow strikes the same enemy, the Final Damage of each additional arrow is reduced by #w%.
Enemies hit by Spirit Arrows take #dot% damage time every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: When inflicting a critical wound, your strike hits the enemy where they are most vulnerable, dealing greater damage.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Allows Critical Rate to exceed 100% and Critical Damage to increase by #x% of Critical Rate.\nThe attack's additional Critical Rate is not applied.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Deal deadly consecutive attacks against your enemies, so they can experience the full wrath of the spirits.\nRequired Skill: #cIshtar's Ring Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, can press the key down for up to #s sec., attacks up to #mobCount enemies in front of you to deal #damage% damage #attackCount times consecutively.
When the attack hits, Ignis Roar Duration: +#t sec.
You can use it while walking backward and can change direction by #cpressing the direction key twice#.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Concentrate and deploy a powerful spirit arrow.
Concentrate by pressing the key down. Activates an enhanced Surge Bolt when used after concentration is complete. Using a different skill while you concentrate will not cancel this skill.
You can #cactivate the Surge Bolt# while using Full Burst Shot after using Snipe, Piercing, High Speed Shot, and Repeating Crossbow Cartridge, if you've concentrated for just a short time. However, you need to use up all of your arrows to use Full Burst Shot.
Also, if this skill hits the enemy, obtain the Marked Target buff.
The Final Attack will not be applied to the Surge Bolt.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #u%, Number of Attacks: #y. Deals #u2 damage after focus is complete
Additional Monster DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%
Max Focus Duration: #s sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire every type of arrowhead at once, including a special flaming arrowhead that explodes when it hits an enemy. The Flaming Arrow targets the boss with the highest HP first and is unaffected by attack reflection. The Flaming Arrow is prepared in limited quantities and will no longer attack once used up.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Duration: #time sec. Attack Power: + #indiePadR%. Fire every type of arrowhead at once, including a flaming arrowhead.\n#cFlaming Arrow#: Launches #y flaming arrows consecutively. Duration: #u sec., Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, fires #y flaming arrows up to #u2 times. The attack won't activate if the buff remains when all the prepared flaming arrows are consumed. Cooldown: #z sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Activate a wind barrier around yourself that will defend you and decimate your enemies. Creates a whirlwind when you attack to deal additional damage.\n#cElemental is consumed upon defending against an attack# and the wind barrier will disappear when it's completely consumed. The whirlwind is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, creates a wind barrier with the #w Elemental
Damage is nullified when the #z #cElemental# is used for damage equal to 1% of max HP when hit. Also applies to attacks that deal damage proportional to the max HP.
Launches #q2 whirlwind(s) that deal(s) #dot% damage every #w2 sec upon attack. Decreases the Final Damage of the whirlwind by #s% if multiple whirlwinds attack 1 enemy.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use new Resistance technology to equip a grenade launcher that can be used in addition to a crossbow. The grenade will bounce on the ground and delay detonation if it doesn't hit an enemy. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #x, upon explosion deals Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.
#cCannot cast while Wild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type X are active.#
1 grenade is prepared every #t sec. Can have up to #z grenades.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Ancient Force]#\nConsume your entire Relic Gauge to fire a bolt of obliterating energy that pierces all. The more Relic Gauge consumed, the stronger the attack will be.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon or more required to use the skill. Consumes all energy built up in the Relic Gauge to activate an explosion #z times that deals #v% damage #w times to up to #u enemies. Invulnerable while casting.\nIf the consumed Relic Gauge exceeds certain thresholds (25%/50%/75%/100%), Final Damage will be increased by 25%/50%/75%/100%, respectively. Ignore Def +#ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Ancient Force]#
Uses the power of the relic to call forth the true form of the Shadow Raven to wreak havoc. Using Raven Tempest with the down arrow key while Fury of the Wild is summoned activates Fury of the Wild Tempest which swirls even faster.
The summoned Shadow Raven/Fury of the Wild moves in search of enemies, and you can also press the skill key to manually change its direction.
Using Action Customization allows you to switch the Command of Raven Tempest and Fury of the Wild Tempest while Fury of the Wild is summoned.
Can only be used when Shadow Raven/Fury of the Wild is summoned. Raven Tempest and Fury of the Wild Tempest are unaffected by attack reflection.
#cCustom Command On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value:
Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon
#cRaven Tempest#: Duration: #u sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
#cFury of the Wild Tempest#: Duration: #z sec, Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #u2%, Number of Attacks: #v2
Charges the Relic Gauge by #v when attacking
Direction Change Cooldown: #x sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Ancient Force]#
Uses the power of the relic to call forth the true form of the Shadow Raven to wreak havoc. Using Raven Tempest with the down arrow key while Fury of the Wild is summoned activates Fury of the Wild Tempest which swirls even faster.
The summoned Shadow Raven/Fury of the Wild moves in search of enemies, and you can also press the skill key to manually change its direction.
Using Action Customization allows you to switch the Command of Raven Tempest and Fury of the Wild Tempest while Fury of the Wild is summoned.
Can only be used when Shadow Raven/Fury of the Wild is summoned. Raven Tempest and Fury of the Wild Tempest are unaffected by attack reflection.
#cCustom Command On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value:
Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon
Raven Tempest#: Duration: #z sec, Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #u2%, Number of Attacks: #v2
#cFury of the Wild Tempest#: Duration: #u sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Charges the Relic Gauge by #v when attacking
Direction Change Cooldown: #x sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Project the relic's power as a shield to defend yourself and your party members.
Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.
Obsidian Barrier's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Grants each party member a personal protective shield.
#cBurst Enhancement#
Increases the size of the shield.
#cTorrent Enhancement#
Allows the shield to be moved.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, decreases damage taken from attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage by -#y%.\nThe shield will deal #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies within its radius.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nProjects the relic's power as a shield to defend yourself and your party members.\nParty members who receive the protection of this skill will receive reduced damage and will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, Hit damage -#x% (including attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage)\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage. 
Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.
Enhanced by the Burst emblem to defend a wider area than normal.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, decreases damage taken from attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage by -#y%.\nThe shield will deal #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies within its radius.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage.
 Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff. 
Enhanced by the Torrent emblem to allow the shield to be moved to another location.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, decreases damage taken from attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage by -#y%.\nThe shield will deal #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies within its radius.\nRedeployment Cooldown: #u sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nProjects the relic's power as a shield to defend yourself and your party members.\nParty members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage.
Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff.
Enhanced by the Burst emblem to defend a wider area than normal.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Projects the relic's power as a protective shield. While within the shield, you will receive no damage from enemies' normal attacks, and reduced damage for attacks that deal a fixed percent of damage.
 Party members who receive the protection of this skill will deal increased Critical Damage when attacking any enemy affected by the Ancient Curse debuff. 
Enhanced by the Torrent emblem to allow the shield to be moved to another location.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the honorable Royal Knights, who protect the Ruler of the Elves. Unaffected by attack reflection. Reusing the skill will end it immediately.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, invincible during casting and disarmament\nDuration: #time sec, up to #s knights appear when attack by Mercedes hits, each dealing #u% damage #v times, Cooldown: #t sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use a prototype crossbow, which uses Resistance technology to maximize its firepower. Can be used while in motion.\nRequired Skill: #cWild Arrow Blast Lv. 30 and above

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Key Down Duration: #t sec, Frontal Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: #attackCount, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Enchant Force]#
Sets up an attacking Relic by completely liberating the power of Relic. When Pathfinder's attack hits, Relic that was set up resonantes and attacks according to the emblem. Cannot be used if there is no Relic emblem.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Sets up Relic that rapidly shoots arrows at the enemy in front.
#cBurst Enhancement#
Sets up Relic that projects arrows that explode when hit.
#cTorrent Enhancement#
Sets up several Relics that simulatenously attack the enemy in a certain range.

string.name: h
string.value:
Relic Gauge Cost: #x
#cDeluge Enhancement#: rapidly shoot arrows that periodically deal #w% damage for #y sec
#cBurst Enhancement#: shoot arrows that explode #range times periodically dealing #v% damage up to #q enemies #s times for #u sec, can shoot up to #prop arrows
#cTorrent Enhancement#: sets up to #u2 Relics that periodically attacks up to #v2 enemies with #q2% damage #s2 times for #w2 sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nLiberates the power of the Relic, setting it up to attack enemies to the front with rapid-fire arrows. When Pathfinder's attack hits, this Relic resonates and starts to attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec. Periodically shoots bursts of arrows for #q% damage each.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nSets up an attacking Relic that projects arrows that explode when enemies are hit by completely liberating the power of Relic. When Pathfinder's attack hits, Relic that was set up resonates and starts to attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, periodically shoots arrows, Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #q, Explosions: #y, Max Arrows Shot: #x\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Enchant Force]#\nSets up several attacking Relics that periodically attack nearby enemies by completely liberating the power of Relic. When Pathfinder's attack hits, Relic that was set up resonates and starts to attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Relics: #u\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Evade enemy attacks by moving fast enough to create illusory doubles of yourself.\nIllusory doubles disperse the enemy's attention to either reduce damage taken by Bow Master or inflict damage on the enemy. Affected by Buff Freezer effects, but the time to create the illusory doubles isn't deducted when you are incapacitated. Illusory doubles are unaffected by attack reflection.\nCan be turned #cOn/Off.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Creates up to #x illusory doubles every #u sec.
When you either receive damage that is at least #y% of your Max HP or you receive damage that leads to death, 1 illusory double disappears, reducing that damage by #q%
If you have even 1 illusory double, and there is an enemy to attack nearby, when using an attack skill, #bulletCount illusory bullets will deal #damage% damage #attackCount times. MP Cost: #v, Cooldown: #t sec
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use a special cartridge that allows you to fire multiple arrows at once. Use the skill again to activate a Full Burst Shot with the same cartridge. Full Burst Shot is attracted to the targeted enemy within range and attacks the boss with the highest HP first. Successful hits with Full Burst Shot grannts the Marked Target buff.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Usable Cartridges: #x\n#cFull Burst Shot#: MP Cost: #y, Cartridge Used: 1, Damage: #w%, Number of Arrow Attacks: #u, Arrows Fired: #v, DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%, Critical Rate: #cr%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Condense powerful winds into a sphere, then launch it in a slow, straight line. A gust occurs periodically with the Vortex Sphere at the center, pulling in surrounding enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Creates a Vortex Sphere, which moves on a collision course with the enemy. The sphere periodically attacks up to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount times.
Decreases Vortex Sphere's speed by #y% for #time sec if a Boss Monster is attacked.
Collision occurs up to #w times for each enemy.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Possess Skill]#\nChannel your intrinsic power through the Whispershot, then blast it forward. Can be used when not in a Possessed state, and doesn't cancel the Possessed state. Every attack of Dragon Burst can grant the Death's Blessing effect.\nRequired Skill: #cAdvanced Death's Blessing Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Key-down Duration: #q sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: #attackCount, Max Attack Activation: #y. Immediately ends when all of the attack activation is consumed. Can change direction, but need to wait #t sec. to change direction again. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Malice and death descend to the ground as you unite in spirit with Satiras the Devil Dragon.\n#cUse the skill again# to launch a huge burst of Malice that floods your surroundings with unavoidable death. Among the enemies hit, the Arrow of Death will prioritize the enemy with the highest max HP. Death Domain can be used while using other skills. All attacks activated by Thanatos Descent are unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cIncarnation Lv. 1#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec., Damage: +#indieDamR%
Malice created periodically increases by #y. Malice created when Whispershot skill hits increases by #x.
If your attack skill hits, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Number of Arrows of Death: #mobCount, Damage Against Normal Monsters: +#v%, Cooldown: #subTime sec.
Using the skill again ends the effect immediately, while also activating Death Domain, which attacks #z consecutive times, dealing #w2% damage up to #q enemies. While casting Death Domain, you are invincible.
While Death Domain is active, the damage increase buff is maintained as much as Thanatos Descent's remaining duration.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Flood your surroundings with unavoidable death.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Execute Skill]#\nMove rapidly, dealing fatal consecutive blows to the front. If you defeat an enemy with [Execute] Fatal Blitz, it will #creset the cooldown of Shadow Step#.\nRequired Skill: #cTearing Knife Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #q sec., Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: #attackCount, Max Attack Activation: #x. When all of the attack activation is consumed, the effect ends immediately. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the enemy's death throes as an offering to summon Satiras the Devil Dragon's Hand of Agony, which ignores attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cDragon Fang Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: #cPassive Effect#: Upon either defeating #q enemies or attacking a boss #q2 times, you can harvest up to #u Death Throes.\n#cActive Effect#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Required Min Death Throes: #v\nConsume all harvested Death Throes to summon Hand of Agony for #s2 sec, attacking up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount consecutive times. Duration increases by #s sec. for each additional Death Throe consumed. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Damage increases due to the afterimage of Death Domain.

string.name: desc
string.value: Causes the poison inflicting nearby enemies to burst and spread.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Consumes all active Damage-Over-Time stacks on up to #mobCount poisoned enemies in range, and instantly inflicts #w% of their remaining damage, plus an additional #damage% damage #attackCount times.
Additional damage is +#x% per remaining second of consumed DoT stacks, up to #z 
Afterwards, spreads the original DoT damage across up to #y nearby enemies
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
[Passive Effects - Bonus DoT Chance: #prop% to deal #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec. for #dotTime sec.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily grants your throwing skills extra spread. Does not apply to Shadow Partner.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Throwing skills gain extra spread.
Triple Throw attacks in 4 extra directions, with extra projectiles dealing #u% damage
Quad Star attacks in 3 extra directions, with extra projectiles dealing #damage% damage
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Rush Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Critical Rate: +#cr%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR%\nAttacks up to 4 times in the direction of your choice\nCan be used 2-4 times, with a #cooltime sec cooldown beginning after the first hit

string.name: desc
string.value: Storm forward, slashing enemies with techniques honed at the Secret Garden. You can move while attacking.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon per attack. Attack up to #z enemies, with #y%, #w times, then deals #damage% damage, #attackCount times, on up to #mobCount enemies in front of you for #time sec., ignoring #ignoreMobpdpR% additional Enemy DEF.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fires a powerful beam of energy. Can use buff skills that increases some stats after firing.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Duration: #time sec. Invincible while attacking.
Hold down skill key to charge for up to #w sec. Duration increases by 1 sec for every #y sec charged (up to #z sec max). If you exceed the max charge time, the charge will be canceled.
Press the skill key again while attacking to cancel immediately.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec., starting after the attack begins.

string.name: desc
string.value: The shadows on the ground coalesce to form a spear that pierces enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection. Has no effect in towns. It's a dark-attribute attack.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time, shadows form on the ground every time you use a dark attribute skill (except Shadow Spear and summons).
The shadows slowly gather into a spear, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies
If there are enough shadows, they'll form into a giant spear, with a #t sec. cooldown, that deals #q% damage #y times against up to #z enemies
All the Shadow Spear's attacks increase Damage Against Normal Monsters by #nbdR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throw a flurry of cards until you're down to your last one. Will luck be on your side as you unveil it? You can move slowly while attacking, and the cards will attack the boss monster in the area with highest max HP first. Ignores stun while casting. Invincible while you draw the card after the attack stops.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Can hold the key down for up to #time sec. Attack by periodically throwing multiple cards forward. Damage: #damage%. Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Damage Taken during skill: -#y%.
When finished, draws a card to buff all party members for #dotInterval sec.
#cPriest -# Recovers #u% Max HP/MP over time. 
#cTree of Life -# All Damage Taken: -#v%. Abnormal Status Resistance: +#s2
#cHourglass -# Active Cooldowns shortened by #u2% (except skills that ignore cooldown resets).
#cThree Swords -# Final Damage +#v2%.
#cLuck of the Draw -# Gain all card buffs simultaneously.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Priest: recover Max HP/MP over time.

string.name: h
string.value: #cPriest#: recover #y% of Max HP/MP over time.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tree of Life: reduces damage taken, including proportional HP damage and increases Abnormal Status Resistance.

string.name: h
string.value: #cTree of Life#: reduces damage (including proportional HP damage) by #z%, increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #indieAsrR

string.name: desc
string.value: Hourglass: reduces skill cooldowns (except ones not affected by cooldown resets).

string.name: h
string.value: #cHourglass#: reduces skill cooldowns by #x%, excluding skills not affected by cooldown reset

string.name: desc
string.value: Sharp Sword: increases your Final Damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throw a flurry of cards until you're down to your last one. Will luck be on your side as you unveil it? You can move slowly while attacking.

string.name: h
string.value: #cLuck of the Draw#: Grant all cards buffs simultaneously.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws a massive shuriken said to be used by the thieves of old. Unaffected by attack reflection. Reduced chance of activating Assassin's Mark.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Throwing Stars Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Damage: #damage%. Number of Attacks: #attackCount
A huge shuriken flies forward striking foes, then spins in place, dealing additional damage for #z sec before disappearing. Using the skill again while the shuriken is flying will stop it immediately at its current location.
#w% of normal chance to trigger Assassin's Mark.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Decide the fate of your opponents with a blinding flurry of blades. Additional hit from Blade Clone is applied only once.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Chase Cut Activation Count: #w, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Enemy DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Throw a razor-sharp card, infused with incredible power, that ricochets dangerously. The card will ricochet against nearby enemies several times, starting with the highest-Max-HP enemy among them. If there are no nearby enemies, the card's magic will trigger instantly. If the skill is used again when all of the throwable cards are present, the cards will gather around the enemy with the highest Max HP, from amongst enemies in front of Phantom, to release all their power at once. The released cards' attack activation count increases proportionally to the remaining attack count. If you use the skill with the down arrow key, you can release the power immediately after throwing a card. Ace in the Hole is not affected by attack reflection skills.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, #bulletCount of cards ricochet #z times, dealing #damage% damage, before releasing the energy stored inside to strike up to #q enemies for #w% damage #v times.\nLiberated Card: activates its offensive power #dot time(s). Max Enemies Hit: #s, Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #u. Attacks are activated up to #q2 time(s) in proportion to the number the ricocheted cards' remaining attacks.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Move behind the enemy damaged by Assassinate and Sonic Blow to deal a fatal attack. Assassinate and Sonic Blow leave a wound debuff on the highest Max HP enemy that was hit. Attacks linked with Assassinate and Sonic Blow are unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #cPassive Effect#: The enemy hit with Assassinate's last attack and Sonic Blow receives a wound debuff, for #time sec., that can stack up to 3 times. Only 1 enemy can receive the wound debuff. If the debuff is given to a new enemy, the previous debuff disappears.\n#Active Effect# - MP Cost: #mpCon. Summons your hidden friends to deal #y% damage up to #v enemies #q times. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.\nIf one of the enemies has the wound debuff at max stack, you can use it by linking from Assassinate and Sonic Blow to move behind that enemy, then activate Chase Cut #q2 times, dealing #w% damage #z times with Critical Rate +#cr% and ignoring #ignoreMobpdpR% additional Defense. Invincible for #t sec. after the attack, which also applies #u2 sec. of cooldown.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an immovable shadow. The shadow faces in the direction of the boss with the highest Max HP, or in the direction of the enemy with the highest Max HP if there is no boss, and mimics throwing-star attacks. It cannot be injured, and vanishes when its duration ends.\nYou may activate the skill again to swap places with the shadow or use it with the down arrow key to re-summon the shadow to your current location. However, you cannot do this while in the air. A separate cooldown is applied when the shadow is called back.\nAll attacks of the shadows are dark-attribute and unaffected by attack reflection. Capable of triggering Mark of Darkness, Shadow Bat, and Ravenous Bat.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Shadow attacks from a fixed location, dealing additional #x% of the Final Damage of your throwing star skills.
Activate to swap places up to #w times
Shadow Re-summon Cooldown: #t sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Overloads your energy core, producing power in excess of your maximum storage capacity. You cannot recover MP while your core is overloaded, but your skills will not cost any energy. Overloaded attacks produce plasma currents that strike nearby enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection. The increased capacity from overloading cannot be recharged by Amaranth Generator.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes #q% Max MP + #y per sec. Allows you to charge #w additional Surplus Energy. Energy charging time reduced to #z sec.
Final Damage increases by #x% per Surplus Energy charged.
Using skill again to deactivate it. Extra Surplus Energy disappears immediately on skill deactivation.
Generates plasma currents at random intervals that activate electricity #s times striking up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: You vow to destroy your enemies at any cost. You can renew your vow to empower its effects by using the skill again while it's active. Using the skill with the down arrow key will immediately renew your vow. With Action Customization enabled, you can renew your vow by pressing its key again, without use of the arrow keys.\n#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP, reduces Avoidability (including Bonus Evasion) and increases Final Damage for #time sec, Hit Damage increased if attacked within a certain percentage of your max HP.
Enters 2nd Stage with remaining duration being reduced to #u% when skill is used again during 1st Stage, skill ends when used again during 2nd Stage.
1st Stage - Avoidability: -#x%, Hit Damage: +#z%, Final Damage: +#y%
2nd Stage - Avoidability: -#w%, Hit Damage: +#s%, Final Damage: +#q%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec 
[Passive Effect - ATT Power: +#padX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an ancient Nova weapon reforged by the Shadowdealers. The cannon draws in energy, and eventually fires. Does not trigger Attack Reflection. The cannon's amassed attack and fired projectile doesn't deactivate Dark Sight.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. The cannon gathers energy for #s2 sec., periodically inflicting #damage% damage #w times to up to #x enemies at set intervals.
Amasses up to #u2 times, and increases the cannon's duration if it's not fully amassed.
After amassing enough energy, it creates a supernova that deals #q% damage #u times to up to #s enemies.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throws your chains with such intensity that they tear through the fabric of space and time, wreaking havoc on your foes. Can inflict damage even on enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.\n#cRight-click to toggle the gray background ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Creates giant chains that travel along an arbitrary path inflicting #y% damage #w times to up to #x enemies.\n#cChain Cooldown: 0.6 sec#\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Make your enemies' shadows attack them and strip them of their power, temporarily increasing Final Damage. If Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat can be summoned, the bats are created in the location of the enemies and immediately attack. The bats created by Shadow Bat aren't enhanced. It's a dark-attribute attack.\nRequired Skill: #cBat Affinity III Lv. 30#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, deals #x% damage to bosses, creates a Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat where an enemy received an attack #cif a bat can be summoned#.\n#cIf an enemy has been defeated by Shadow Bite#, the Final Damage increases by #y% per 1 enemy for #time sec. #cIf you attacked a boss monster#, the Final Damage increases by #w%. The Final Damage increased by Shadow Bite is applied up to #q%.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Unleash the power of the Dark Lord's insight. You can detonate the scroll immediately by using the skill again. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, shoot #bulletCount Throwing Star(s) per 1 enemy for #time sec., dealing #damage% damage to max #mobCount enemies
#x additional Throwing Stars are launched regardless of the number of enemies.
Boss Damage: +#bdR%
The scroll explodes when the skill duration ends, dealing #selfDestruction% damage with #w additional attacks. Max Enemies Hit: #z
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Move faster than the speed of sound, dealing consecutive attacks along the way. Every attack of Sonic Blow leaves a wound debuff on the highest Max HP enemy that was hit. Sonic Blow can be canceled immediately, by either using Shadow Assault or Trickblade, while an enemy with max wound stacks is within range. Cooldown is reduced in proportion to the remaining number of attacks. You will not be pushed back by any enemy attacks when casting Sonic Blow.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: 2.5 sec, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Ignore Defense: #ignoreMobpdpR%
Every attack of Sonic Blow stacks #y wound debuffs on the highest Max HP enemy that was hit.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
Attack can be canceled by using Trickblade if there is an enemy with max wound stacks. Reduces cooldown by #t sec. for every remaining number of attacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Teleport to a target and brand it with the Phantom Thief's Mark.\nGain 1 Master Thief Mark for enemies hit with a Cane skill or Tempest. Can be used #cif there is an enemy marked as the Phantom's target, or if all of the Master Thief Marks are collected.#\nTargets only 1 enemy, prioritizing the enemy with highest max HP in range. Targets marked enemies, boss monsters by highest HP, and furthest enemies in range, in that order.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Requires #x Master Thief Marks, if there is no enemy already marked as a target. #cUses all Master Thief Marks# upon skill activation.
Invincible for #subTime sec. after moving.
Activates #q trajectories, dealing #damage% damage #attackCount time(s), and completes the Master Thief Mark, activating #u times and dealing #s% damage #z time(s). For all attacks, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Additional Critical Rate: +#cr%
Enemies hit with a Cane skill or Tempest get a debuff for #time sec. Targets the enemy with #s2 stacks.
Mille Aiguilles, Tempest, and Rift Break must hit targets #y times more than other skills to mark an enemy or earn Master Thief Marks.
Attack skills that utilize Impeccable Memory must hit #w times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Whip chains at high speed to create a maelstrom that will strike fear into the hearts of all your enemies. There can only be 1 maelstrom, and it is unaffected by attack reflection.\nChain Arts: Can only use as a combo after using 2 Thrash hits. You can also use it by pressing the down key+[Attack Key].\nRequired Skill: #cChain Arts: Thrash IV Lv. 10+#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Deals damage for #time sec at a certain interval. Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Upon attack, #prop% chance to Slow enemies for #s sec\nAttack speed gradually decreases based on time

string.name: desc
string.value: Spin as fast as a tornado and create a black typhoon that shoots forward to damage your enemies. The typhoon is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
At intervals, Typhoon activates whirlwind dealing Damage: #x%, Max Enemies Hit: #u, Number of Attacks: #y. Activates whirlwind up to #w times on 1 enemy.
For Spinning Attack and Typhoon, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +#ignoreMobpdpR% 
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Deploys the latest Hypogram Field that combines every Hypogram feature. If the area overlaps with the previously placed Hypogram Field, it's deployed after removing that Hypogram Field. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cHypogram Field Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP cost: #mpCon, Hologram Field generated for #time sec.
Whenever the orb makes contact with the Hologram Field, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. The same amount of damage is inflicted when the orb touches monsters.
Damage inflicted by party members within the field is increased by #s%, 1 surplus energy recharged whenever a party member within the field evades an attack.
Missiles fired by the Aegis System increased by #x when Xenon is inside the field.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Party members's damage is increased within the Hypogram Field: Fusion field.

string.name: desc
string.value: Draws out the full power of Talisman: Clone, raining a barrage of clones on enemies. Greatly increases the Attack Power and number of clones created with Talisman: Clone. While Sage: Clone Rampage is active, the clones target the boss with the highest HP first.\nCan only be used while Talisman: Clone is active. While this skill is active, Talisman: Clone's duration will not decrease.\nRequired Skill: #cTalisman: Clone Lv. 20#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, For #time sec, create #v2 clone(s) when attacking, Each clone attacks for #w2%p more damage than Talisman: Clone #q2 times\nClone creation has a #t sec cooldown\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: #[Scroll Skill]# Summons the guardian of Mt. Songyu, a giant tiger spirit. Whenever you achieve an attribute combo stage 3, the tiger gives out a mighty roar to shake heaven, earth, and your enemies.\n\n#Scroll: Tiger of Songyu is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: h
string.value:
Scroll Energy Cost: #atGauge2Con, Duration: #time sec., Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.
When you reach attribute combo stage 3, its next attack will replace the normal attack with a roar that periodically deals #y% damage #z times.
Tiger's attacks have a cooldown of #s sec.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Call upon the gods of an unknown place and time. Temporarily increases your damage, with the gods joining in after every few attacks.
#cUse the skill a second time# to summon the gods' full power in a massive attack.

#Sage: Wrath of Gods is unaffected by attack reflection, and targets the boss with the highest HP first.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Duration: #time sec. Damage: +#indieDamR%
The gods strike once per #x successful attacks, hitting up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times. Cooldown: #t sec.
Using the skill again will immediately end its effects and summon the gods again at once, creating #v2 shockwave(s) and hitting up to #u enemies for #v% damage #u2 times.
You are invincible while summoning the gods. This skill negates attack ignore and attack reflection effects.
Upon summoning the gods, damage for Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills, as well as Clone/True skills, increases by #s% for #q sec.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Call upon the gods of an unknown place and time. Temporarily increases your damage, with the gods joining in after every few attacks.
#cUse the skill a second time# to summon the gods' full power in a massive attack.

#Sage: Wrath of Gods is unaffected by attack reflection.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Receive the power of gods to increase the damage of Humanity: As-You-Will Fan, Ground-Shattering Wave skills, Iron Fan Gale skills, Stone Tremor skills, Consuming Flames skills, and Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel.

string.name: desc
string.value: Throw shurikens with explosive charms attached. The charms explode after the shurikens hit, dealing additional attack to nearby enemies. Explosions are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #cExplosive Charm#: Throws explosive-rigged shurikens at up to #v enemies, dealing #z% damage #q times.\n#cPassive Effect#: 1 explosive charm is prepared every #u sec and activates. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.\n#cActive Effect#: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Usable Explosive Charms: #x, uses min #s and max #w charms per attack skill, consumes throwing stars up to the number of charms used. Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Team up with dark allies in a special formation to perform a joint attack. Can be used without a casting motion when used while Assassinate or Cruel Stab is in effect. Unaffected by attack reflection. Also unaffected by the effects of Shadow Partner. Use the skill again during activation to immediately call the leader.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Allies appear #x times, then the leader appears. Additional DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\n#cLeader#: Chase Cut Activation: #y, Max Enemies Hit: #u, Damage: #v%, Number of Attacks: #w\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
The malevolent spirit imbued in the blade attacks the enemy on its own. Activates automatically upon using Blade Fury or Phantom Blow.
Using Blade Fury in conjunction with this effect will activate Haunted Edge-Asura, which creates a sharp stabbing wind. Using Phantom Blow in conjunction with this effect will activate Haunted Edge-Yaksa, which deals countless consecutive attacks in anger.
Unaffected by attack reflection. The sharp wind created by Haunted Edge-Asura is unaffected by Mirror Image.
Required Skill: #cBlade Fury Lv. 30#, #cPhantom Blow Lv. 30#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldown: #cooltime sec, all attacks of Haunted Edge ignores #ignoreMobpdpR% enemy defense\n#cHaunted Edge-Asura#: Max Enemies Hit: #y, Damage: #z%, Number of Attacks: #u, Max Sword Winds: #q, Sword Wind Damage: #w%, Number of Sword Wind Attacks: #v, Final Damage of sword wind reduces by #s% when one enemy is hit by several sword winds\n#cHaunted Edge-Yaksa#: Chase Cut Activation: #q2, Max Enemies Hit: #u2, Damage: #v2%, Number of Attacks: #s2

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Throw]#\nToss countless throwing stars at blinding speed. If you use this skill in the air, you'll hover while you toss them. Using Rapid Throw while Dark Sight is active does not deactivate Dark Sight. Rapid Throw is unaffected by Shadow Momentum's inertia effect. Each throwing star is applied at most once to the throwing star skill count of Shadow Bat and Ravenous Bat. It's a dark-attribute attack, but consecutive throw attacks have higher damage even though the shadow from Shadow Spear isn't formed.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, consecutively throw shadow throwing stars with #damage% damage #attackCount times up to #mobCount enemies for #t sec then finish with a huge shadow throwing star that attacks up to #z enemies with #u% damage #v times
Dark Sight for #v2 sec while skill is in use. Tap repeatedly to increase the consecutive throwing duration up to #w sec
While Shadow Spear is active, Consecutive Throw Attack Damage: +#u2% points
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Instantly cleave through the enemy's weak points and destroy them. Using it pours every attack on the spot, and #cusing it with the down key# will teleport you several times to the farthest enemy within range to attack.\nIf you press the directional key when you attack as you teleport, you will move to the enemy in the relevant direction first. If you use the skill again after moving, you will either stop in that place and the cooldown is reduced as much as the remaining teleports or you need to attack at least once to stop. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Max Chase Cut or Teleport: #x\nCooldown: #cooltime sec, cooldown is reduced by #t sec per remaining teleports

string.name: desc
string.value:
Lock onto enemies and destroy them with photonic cannon blasts.
Upon using the skill, #ctemporarily enter aim mode# and ready a chain of attacks, aiming several shots in sequence. Using the skill again will fire the photonic cannon at the most recenty targeted enemy.
The initial fixed number of shots ends quickly. Additional shots, with a slow-moving cursor, produce one blast each. The additional shots prioritize Boss Monsters, with the highest Max HP, within range of the aim. #cAttacking an enemy that is being aimed at# ends the aiming process quickly.
The aiming process is canceled if you either move away while aiming or move away from the last targeted enemy. If the aiming process ends before firing, every shot is canceled.
Unaffected by attack reflection. Manifest Projector does not apply to this skill. Can be fired without a firing motion while using Mecha Purge, Orbital Cataclysm, or Omega Blaster.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Aim mode activates for #time sec. Additional #u MP consumed upon firing.
Initial shots are #v blast each. Can take up to #y additional shots after #x shots.
Photonic cannon attacks #v times with #u2% damage per shot.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Push the limits of weapon mastery to inflict additional hits with even greater power. Unaffected by attack reflection and doesn't deactivate Dark Sight. Preparation time is reduced when a specific attack skill hits.\nRequired Skill: #cMuscle Memory III Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, activates in location of nearby enemy upon hitting Muscle Memory additional hit #w times
Additional Hit Activation: #s, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Muscle Memory Finale is prepared 1 each per #x sec up to #y
Preparation time reduces by #subTime sec when Chain Arts: Reign of Chains/Chain Arts: Beatdown/Chain Arts: Crush hits, reduces by #z sec when Chain Arts: Void Strike hits

string.name: desc
string.value: Through enlightenment, create a special clone capable of attribute combos. Excluding Clone/True skills, when Hoyoung's skills that attack directly hit, a clone appears and does an attribute attack for a combo that hasn't been currently done to finish the attribute combo.\nResets cooldown of one attribute skill among Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills upon #creaching stage 3 attribute combo# while active effect is active. Prioritizes attribute with skill on cooldown upon selecting attribute.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: #cPassive Effect#: clones appears to attack up to #w enemies with #u% damage #v times, cooldown: #q sec\n#cActive Effect#: MP Cost: #mpCon, passive effect can activate #y times without cooldown for #time sec, then cooldown of #v2 sec applied afterwards, #cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Waiting to create a special clone that will realize parts of the inner workings of your techniques.

string.name: desc
string.value: The next time you use Roll of the Dice, you get to throw an extra die and choose your desired number (via the number keys). Jobs without Roll of the Dice will be allowed to use the Roll of the Dice skill and choose their desired number.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpCon, select your desired die roll.
If a job that has Double Down gets the same number on 2 dice, the chance for the last die to have the same number is decreased by #x%.
Cooldown: #cooltime Sec.
[Passive Effect: Attack Power: +#padX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Test your luck! Roll dice to get a random Buff. Roll a 1 and you get nothing, but Roll of the Dice's cooldown will be reduced by 50%.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Buff Duration: #time sec\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Receive the power of the seas, and soar to new heights of power. Double-tap an arrow key to teleport in that direction. Use the skill again to attack nearby enemies with a huge orb of energy. The orb of energy is unaffected by attack reflection. Your are invincible while creating the orb.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec., Final Damage: +#indiePMdR%.
Can use up to #w energy orbs
Energy orbs will periodically deal #damage% damage #attackCount times on up to #mobCount enemies, 1 orb can attack a single enemy up to #s times
Critical Rate: +#cr%, Ignore Defense: +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wildly fire your gun in all directions. While using Bullet Barrage, you cannot glide with Wings or use Wings in the air.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Duration: #time sec. Periodically deal #damage% damage, #attackCount times, on up to #mobCount enemies.\nCan move and jump while using the skill. This skill will be immediately canceled if you use it again.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon the full power of the storm to annihilate your enemies with a chain of lightning. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Grants Final Damage +#indiePMdR% for #time sec. Initial Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Send forth a lightning bolt. 
The damage it deals decreases with each enemy it attacks, and it can hit up to #x nearby enemies in a row.
When only one bolt triggers, it becomes a more powerful version, dealing #s% damage #q times.
Lightning Spawn Cooldown: #y sec.
#cPassive Effect#: when you attack during the Lightning Cascade cooldown, 1 lightning bolt activates if there are normal monsters nearby. Cooldown:#z sec. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.
Skill Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire a gigantic rocket from your cannon. Unaffected by attack reflection. Use with the down arrow key to fire all the rockets at once.\nIn speed reduction mode, the flying speed is halved when the rocket collides with the enemy.\n#cRight-click to toggle speed reduction mode ON/OFF.#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Periodically fire a giant rocket. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Damage: #damage%. Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Only up to #w hits can occur against a single enemy.
You can prepare a rocket once every #q seconds, and can hold up to #y at a time.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons an diabolical death machine to annihilate your opponents. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, summoned machine lasts #time sec and arsenal includes Gatling Guns and missiles
#cGatling Gun# - Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Cooldown: #t sec
#cMissiles# - Fires 2 missiles to hit up to #q enemies, Damage: #w%, Number of Attacks: #v, Cooldown: #s2 sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The spirits that guide you flow as one within you, empowering you. Attacks that are automatically triggered are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Resets cooldowns, Final Damage: +#indiePMdR% for #time sec
Causes your attack skills to periodically trigger the spirits guiding you to attack using your own attack skills (excluding 5th Job Skills). Continuous Channeled Skills triggered this way have a duration of #w sec.
Spirit Attack Cooldown: #x sec
Spirit Guardian infuses once during Spirit Flow, Shade's Spirit Frenzy Final Damage: +#y%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon a sparkly orb bursting with power.

string.name: h
string.value: Summons an orb that grants #z sec of invincibility, the orb can last up to #time sec and explodes when used again, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nAll attack skills except Soul Buster further enhance orb invincibility duration and powers, up to 2 stages, with each stage increasing the Final Damage by #q%, and the invincibility duration by #s sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon the full power of the storm to annihilate your enemies with a chain of lightning. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, send forth a traveling lightning bolt that lasts for #time sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nThe damage it deals decreases with each enemy it attacks, and you can trigger up to #x bolts per #y sec depending on the number of enemies nearby\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Call upon the spirit of the dreaded sea serpent that slumbers beneath the savage tides to wrap yourself in a deadly barrier that maims all foes who venture near. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nCan attack a certain number of times when activated. Both the number of attacks and cooldown are automatically refreshed when cooldown ends while active. Using the skill again ends it immediately and reduces cooldown in proportion to the remaining number of hits.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. When activated, can attack #v times. When attacking boss monsters, counts 1 time while attacking #q times.
Automatically attacks up to #mobCount nearby enemies periodically, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s).
Reduces cooldown by #y sec. for every #w2 normal enemies defeated. When skill ends, reduces cooldown by #x sec. for every #u remaining number of attacks.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Link Mastery Skill]#\nSummons a deadly shark spirit that flies forward, attacking your foes. Can be linked with all skills except for Thunder and itself. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes #x Lightning Charges.
Fires a deadly spirit-shark that deals #damage% damage #attackCount times to up to #mobCount enemies.
When Lightning Charge is at max stacks, Damage: +#u% points
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Launches a missile battery that fires a barrage of micro-missiles. The micro-missiles target the boss with the highest HP first.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Launches a battery that fires #bulletCount micro missiles at up to #mobCount enemies.\nMicro missiles deal #damage% damage #attackCount times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A real superstar takes their spotlights wherever they go. Enemies, being unworthy of the spotlight, take damage under its rays, while your own abilities are boosted. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Install 3 spotlights that shine on you for #time sec. Each spotlight deals #damage% damage #attackCount times against up to #mobCount enemies within its area.
While you are within the spotlight, you gain Status Resistance +#w, Critical Rate +#v%, and Final Damage +#s%.
You receive a separate bonus for each spotlight, up to 3 buffs. The Final Damage bonus is calculated cumulatively for each spotlight.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Locks onto your targets, then draws your gun and fires upon them in rapid succession. Aims at the boss with the highest Max HP within a certain range. If you're already aimed at the max number of enemies that can be attacked, and a high priority enemy appears within range, the aim on the farthest enemy is released and the high priority enemy is aimed onto. Invincible while casting.

string.name: h
string.value:
#c[Passive Effect]# Focuses aim on up to #mobCount enemies within range whenever skill is not in cooldown.
#[Active Effect]# MP Cost: #mpCon, Targeted enemies take #damage% damage #attackCount times, at +#cr% Critical Rate.
Deals extra damage for Target Locks. Bonus stacks up to 3x.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Opens a portal to the spirit world. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Creates a portal that summons #x spirits, lasting #w sec. Up to #y spirits can exist simultaneously.
Spirits seek out nearby enemies to inflict #v% damage #s times each. Spirits then collide with the enemy, disappearing and leaving the enemy a debuff for #s2 sec.
Attacks against an afflicted enemy gain Critical Rate +#q% and Critical Damage +#v2%.
These debuffs can stack up to #q2 times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire a ballistic missile along a curved trajectory to obliterate enemies in a wide range. While holding the skill key, press the Up or Down arrows to control the angle of fire. Release the key to fire. The missile does not strike enemies directly but deals sustained damage when it hits the ground and explodes. Grants resistance to Knockback while aiming, and invincibility both while prepping the skill and right after it ends. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, gives up to #dotTime sec to aim your shot. The skill is canceled if you fail to fire within this time. When the missile touches the platform, an explosion that periodically inflicts #q% damage #q2 times to up to #u enemies for #range sec occurs.\nCreates a patch of Polluted Area lasting #u2 sec on the lowest platform within attack range which inflicts #z% damage to up to #v2 enemies.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Sets up a series of mobile spotlights that empower superstars and damage enemies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Puts your weapon into overdrive to unleash more attack power. Afterwards, your weapon will be less effective for a short while and cannot be unequipped until it's back to normal.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon, Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#x% of base weapon attack power, Attack Power during cooldown: -#y% of base weapon attack power\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Connects you directly to the source of Abyssal power to temporarily prevent consuming Spectra in your Specter State.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exchange your HP for unlimited magical power. The additional Abyssal Aura created with Infinity Spell targets the boss with the highest HP first among the targets that were attacked.

string.name: h
string.value:
HP Cost: #hpRCon% of Max HP
Duration: #time sec
#cFlora State#: When spell is charged, Basic Cast is charged as much as the remaining max spell charge limit.
#cSpecter State#: When Impending Death activates, an additional #x Abyssal Auras are created
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon the special Champion Monkey Platoon that will help you in battle. The platoon is comprised of 3 members, Basic Roy, Speedy Maxi, and Explosive Khakee, and is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon the Champion Monkey Platoon that fires Monkey Bombs and Monkey Cannons for #time sec.
Monkey Cannon: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount
Monkey Bomb: Max Enemies Hit: #s, Damage: #y%, Attack Count: #w, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%
#cBasic Roy#: Uses Monkey Cannon every 1 sec, and Monkey Bomb every #x sec.
#cSpeedy Maxi#: Uses Monkey Cannon every 0.7 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 30 sec.
#cExplosive Khakkee#: Uses Monkey Cannon every 2.5 sec, and Monkey Bomb every 3 sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: The Battleship Nautilus charges forward at its enemies. Strike enemies with the ship to create a weak spot, then fire all cannons to annihilate them. Unaffected by attack reflection.\nCannot be used when #cNautilus Strike# is being used.\nRequired Skill: #cNautilus Strike Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Invincible while casting
#cShip Attack#: The ship attacks at set intervals. Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Ship Attack Activation Count: #q
#cVolley#: Fires a volley at set intervals. Damage: #y%, Number of Attacks: #x, Volley Activation Count: #s
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
When either #cNautilus Strike# or #cNautilus Assault# is used, a cooldown of #w sec is applied, but it won't be applied if another cooldown longer than that time is already applied.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use all available Mech weapons to fire every single one of your bullets at once. Invincible while casting, but cannot move or change direction.
Can use Homing Beacon while casting, can use multi-target, and there is no Final Damage reduction.
Homing Beacons require reload time after using this skill.
Required Skill: #cHeavy Salvo Plus Lv. 30 or higher#, #cGiant Robot SG-88 Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Can hold key down for up to #w sec, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.
When Homing Beacon is used during casting, #x additional Beacons are fired, can be stacked with Full Spread.
Cannot use Homing Beacon for #time sec after skill ends.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Erupt with the force of the ocean as you charge forward.\nUse an arrow key with the skill to charge in up to 6 different directions except for upwards and downwards.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Uses 1 Ocean Force
Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, damage increased by #bdR% when attacking a boss
1 Ocean Force is recharged every #w sec, and you can hold up to #y at a time.
Cooldown: #cooltimeMS sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Deepens your bond with the spirits twofold, allowing you to attack with a more powerful Spirit Claw. Requires recharge time after skill is used.\nRequired Skill: #cSpirit Claw Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost:#mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: #ignoreMobpdpR%\n#cActivates when Spirit Claw is used#\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Link Mastery Skill]#
The spear of the Thunder God appears and attacks nearby enemies. Can be linked with all skills except for itself, and is unaffected by attack reflection.
Turn on Auto Mode to automatically activate Lightning God Spear Strike whenever it is not on cooldown.
#cAuto Mode On/Off: Right-click#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon
A divine trident is obtained after #x #clinked attacks# land successfully.
Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount
Afterwards, activates Lightning at set intervals #q times, which hits up to #z enemies for #y% damage #w times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Transform Eskalade into a character so cute that he might as well be a magical girl mascot. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Duration: #time sec. When successfully recharged, uses Twinkle Star or Magical Balloon. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #x%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Cannot be used in the middle of another action.
Use Twinkle Star or Magical Bubble, or acquire 1 Magical Bubble every #u sec. Up to #s can be held at a time.
#cUse the skill once more# to cast Shiny Bubble Breath. Duration: #u2 sec., Max Enemies Hit: #v, Damage: #w2%, Number of Attacks: #z. #cAll Magical Bubbles will be consumed upon use of Shiny Bubble Breath.# Duration is increased by #t sec. for every bubble. #cCan be used once while summoned.# Skill ends only after all Bubbles are used up, even if the summon duration ends beforehand.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: A specter's energy that slips out during battle and attacks enemies. It is strengthened by the ominous dreams that leak out during Specter State.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.\nRequired Skill: #cEndless Nightmare Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: h
string.value: Activates a spectral energy when Endless Nightmare is used. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\nWhen Charge Drive skills (with the exception of Basic Charge Drive) land successfully, the cooldown is reduced by #x sec, an effect that is #capplied only once per skill#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A specter's energy that slips out during battle and attacks enemies. Changed to Nightmare's Escape during Flora State.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Activates a spectral energy when Endless Dream is used. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nCooldown: #cooltime sec\nWhen Grievous Wound/Tenacious Instinct/Insatiable Hunger/Boundless Horror/Unbridled Chaos land successfully, the cooldown is reduced by #x sec, an effect that is #capplied only once per skill#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Homing Beacons are reloading, since they were used during the Full Metal Barrage skill. Homing Beacons temporarily cannot be used.

string.name: desc
string.value: You recall the moment your consciousness accessed the Abyssal source of power.\nUsing this skill shifts you into Specter State, and prevents consuming Spectra for skills. However, this can't be used if your Spectra has already been depleted.\nUse the skill again while the skill is cast to cancel the attack immediately. You can deal damage to enemies with Attack Ignore or Attack Reflection, but Impending Death will not activate.

string.name: h
string.value:
You link with the Abyssal Source the moment the skill is activated. You don't consume Spectra for #time sec while in Specter State.
While the gate to the Abyssal is open, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Invincible while attacking
When attack ends, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #s, Number of Explosions: #w
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Strike with all the force of a raging leviathan. Invincible while striking after collecting force. Can strike immediately by using the skill again while collecting force.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon
By collecting power, periodically attack up to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s)
The strike will activate a series of additional shocks, attacking #w enemies, for #x% damage, #y time(s) per shock. #s shock(s) will occur in total.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Strike with all the force of a raging leviathan. Invincible while striking after collecting force. Can strike immediately by using the skill again while collecting force.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fire a volley of penetrating, pinpoint-accurate shots. If there are still enemies in range after the initial volley, your shots will ricochet toward them.\nIf there is only one enemy to attack, then after attacking that enemy, the shots will ricochet and attack again. \nIf there's an enemy with Parrotargetting applied, the whole volley will target that enemy first, then attack them again during the ricochet. Ricocheting shots are unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Fires up to #bulletCount shots, which attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount time(s).\nCooldown: #cooltime sec. Cooldown decreases by #t sec. for each remaining ricochet.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bombard the earth with meteoric strikes. After a short delay, those strikes fall on enemies near the Cannoneer, prioritizing boss monsters, enemies with the highest HP, and enemies that have survived previous strikes, in that order. Supplies will fall for you and your party members during the first and last bombardments.\nIf there are no platforms for the strikes to fall on, or if you're hanging on a rope or ladder, supplies will not drop. If you move between maps while there are still strikes in reserve, or if the cooldown is reset, the skill will end.\nStrikes are unaffected by attack reflection. To pick up the supplies, go near them and press the Up arrow key.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Strikes that attack up to #z enemies for #u% damage, #v time(s), occur #y time(s) each.\n#cSupply#: Duration: #q sec. When used, you'll gain a +#v2% damage increase buff, with a duration of #u2, sec after recovering #q2% of max HP. Only up to #s supplies can exist on the map at a time.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Damage increases in proportion to the number of supplies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Strike with a cascade of lightning that deals linked attacks. Can activate a linked attack by continuing to use the skill. Can link with all skills except for Thunder during Lightning Spear Multistrike. The casting action can be canceled by linking with Tidal Crash in the air. Lightning is unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec, Max Combo Attacks: #x
#cCombo Attack#: Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount. When hit, Max Lightning Bolts: #y, Max Enemies Hit: #z, Damage: #s%, Number of Attacks: #w. Multiple lightning bolts flash.
#cFinal Combo# attacks up to #u enemies, for #q% damage, #v times. When hit, activates large lightning bolts #s2 times, attacking up to #u2 enemies for #q2% damage #v2 times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: Infuse a land spirit with the destructive power of the Fox God.\nRequired Skill: #cFire Fox Spirit Mastery Lv. 20+#

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Consecutively attacks up to #mobCount enemies with #damage% damage #attackCount time(s) during key-down. Max Key-down Time: #t sec
Upon end of key-down, a final shock attack that attacks #u enemies with #y% damage #s time(s) is activated #v time(s). Upon successful hits of the final attack, #v2 additional Fox Spirits are summoned.
During Smashing Multipunch, any attacks that inflict damage proportional to Max HP will suffer a -#w% penalty to damage. Fox Spirits have a #prop% chance to appear upon each successful hit.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon an aerial carrier, the pinnacle of Resistance technology. Carrier-based aircraft strafe nearby enemies, then return. As this attack repeats, more aircraft will appear. The aircraft target the boss with the highest HP first.\nIf the aircraft stray too far from the Mechanic, they will move closer immediately, and they will not be counted towards the number of robots summoned with Robot Mastery. These aircraft ignore attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon. Summons a Mecha Carrier for #time sec.
#x carrier-based aircraft(s) attack, then return. With each charge after that, #y additional carrier-based aircraft(s) will join the sortie. Up to #z carrier-based aircraft(s) can attack in total.
#cCarrier-Based Aircraft#: Attacks the target #v time(s) with #u% damage, then returns.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summon spotlights and dazzle your enemies with your stage presence. This skill can be activated while Trinity is in use as well.
Cannot be pushed back when casting, and any damage taken will be reduced. Trinity Fusion is unaffected by attack reflection, and upon a successful hit, will apply any stacked damage increase and/or Ignore Enemy DEF.
Use Trinity with the Down key to activate when using Action Customization.
#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF#
Required Skill: #cTrinity Lv. 30+#

string.name: h
string.value:
A dragon's energy attacks #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time. #y attack(s) will occur in total.
While casting this skill, any attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of Max HP will suffer a -#w% damage penalty.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec
[Passive Effect: DEX +#dexX]

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon a ravenous beast from the Abyssal depths and command it to devour everything in its path.
