From the moment the depths open, there's a certain delay until the beast arrives, but successful use of Specter's Force skills can hasten its arrival. The Endlessly Starving Beast is unaffected by attack ignore and attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: HP Cost: #hpCon. Initiates a countdown to the Beast's rampage, each strike in which hits up to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s). The Beast strikes #s time(s) in all.\nIf an attack skill that utilizes Specter's Force hits successfully, the Beast's rampage will begin #t sec sooner. Only #v% applied for consecutive-type skills, or for certain other skills.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Use all available Mech weapons to fire every single one of your bullets at once. Invincible while casting, but cannot move or change direction.
Can use Homing Beacon while casting, can use multi-target, and there is no Final Damage reduction.
Homing Beacons require reload time after using this skill.
Required Skill: #cHeavy Salvo Plus Lv. 30 or higher#, #cGiant Robot SG-88 Lv. 30 or higher#

string.name: desc
string.value: The power of a certain curse can be inscribed on Enchant Force with the completed power of Relic.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Select a curse to inscribe on Enchant Force\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Hungry Yeti smells delicious food and comes running, devouring all enemies on the map. Every time you defeat #cenemies near your level#, the #chunger gauge# fills up. It activates once the gauge is full.
It ends when the #ccharacter daily activations# reach 20.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h1
string.value:
Hungry Yeti devours everything in the surrounding area.
Once the hunger gauge is full, #cYeti! Hungry!# activates.
#c[Yeti! Hungry!]# Yeti appears and deals 1500% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies
in a wide range. The attack repeats 3 times every 4 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Yeti appears and deals 1500% damage 5 times to up to 15 enemies in a wide range. The attack repeats 3 times every 4 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Void]#\nMove quickly in one direction to leave only an afterimage. You can move left or right by also pressing the relevant arrow key. Not affected by cooldown reset.\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Insanity I.#

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Move quickly in the direction pressed\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: A blade is added to the afterimage to enhance Void Rush. Void Rush is enhanced to be used in 8 directions and deal damage to enemies along the movement path. You enter Dark Sight temporarily and remain aloft for a short period when you stop moving. It can be used while using Arts or Hex-type skills, and you can stop immediately by pressing jump. Void Rush is unaffected by attack reflection and cooldown resets.\nRequired Skill: #cVoid Rush Lv. 10#\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Insanity II and Deceiving Blade.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Manifests chakri summoned by a strong magic power to be moved freely. Using Hex-type skills manifest chakri within a certain range with Resonate, and the manifested Resonate targets and attacks enemy around the manifestation point. Targets the boss with the highest HP first, and unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Using Hex-type skills manifest chakri summoned within a certain range with Resonate.\nManifested Resonate deal #damage% damage #attackCount times then disappears after bouncing to up to #v times.\nRepeatedly hitting a single target reduces Final Damage by #w2%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Further enhances Void Rush with a more powerful afterimage. Increases the attack range of Void Rush when used consecutively, and can be linked with Hex-type skills. However, it can be used up to 2 times in mid-air in a direction, including up, regardless of cooldown reset. When using skills other than Spark or Hex-type skills, the consecutive usage state is canceled. Void Rush can be used again during Void Rush movement to instantly start the next movement. Void Rush is unaffected by attack reflection and cooldown reset. Overwrites the effect of Insanity I.\nRequired Skill: #cInsanity I Lv. 20#\n#cLevel 10 required to learn Insanity III.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Hex]#\nThrow multiple large chakrams that attack enemies in front several times. When the thrown chakram reaches the max distance, it attacks by spinning for a short period then returns to the character's location while attacking enemies on its path. However, the returning chakram disappears after moving a certain distance. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Hex]#\nSpreads a domain of suffering that tears the surrounding enemy into pieces. You remain aloft when in use.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Void]#\nAmplify the power of the afterimage to pour out several afterimages in front. Each afterimage is considered a separate attack and the effect of Summon Chakri applies to each one. While active, temporarily enter the Dark Sight state. Not affected by cooldown reset. With Action Customization enabled, you can activate Void Blitz by using Void Rush without the arrow keys.\n#cRight-click to toggle Action Customization ON/OFF#

string.name: desc
string.value: Hide your presence under the veil of the sands and become temporarily invincible. While active, skills other than Spark and Void Rush cannot be used. The skill can be canceled by using it again. Not affected by cooldown reset.

Additional summoned chakri are created if the total target attacked is lower than the max. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Void]#\nDescends as the Wind of Vengeance and annihilates all enemies that are grazed, even afterimages. Temporarily gain invincibility. Using the skill again will pursue one target within range to deal consecutive attacks several times. When either the consecutive attack or the duration ends, a powerful finishing attack will be dealt. The consecutive attacks and finishing attack of Void Burst manifest Chakri. Consecutive attacks target the boss with the highest HP first. If there is no target, it will trigger with the caster as the target.

string.value: You have been transformed into an Ice Knight. Defeat the challengers and survive until time runs out.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Master Level: 1]\nSummon the White Angel sealed inside the White Angelic Blessing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to manage your Link Skills, either by sharing with other characters on your account, or by choosing which skills to use on this character.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants the blessings and skills of Fort, your mighty bear companion!

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants the blessings and skills of Lai, your stout snow leopard companion!

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Grants the blessings and skills of Arby... whatever those might be.

string.value: [Potential Skill]\nTemporarily increases your Movement Speed and Jump.

string.value: MP Cost: 5, Movement Speed: +20, Jump: +10, Duration: 200 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nCreates a portal that leads to the nearest town. You (and only you) can use it multiple times until it disappears. Press Up to use it.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 5, Uses 2 Magic Rocks, Portal Duration: 120 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nAllows you to locate an enemy's weak spot to deal fatal damage to that enemy.

string.value: MP Cost: 5, Crit Rate: +10%, Crit Damage: +8%, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nIncreases Max HP and Max MP.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 5, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Item Potential Skill]\nTemporarily increases all of your skill levels. All Beast Tamer skills will increase up to their maximum master level.

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, and Max HP. Can be stacked with other buff skills, except Bless and Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 5, Weapon ATT: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF: +425, Magic DEF: +425, Accuracy: +260, Avoidability: +260, Max HP: +475, Duration: 240 sec

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP to increase your attack speed by 1 level for a fixed period of time. Can be stacked with buffs other than Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

While channeling this skill, damage taken from enemy attacks (including attacks that deal damage based on a fixed percentage of Max HP) are reduced by #indieDamReduceR%.

Consumes 5 MP when activated.

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses the polearm to fire a burst of energy at enemies in front of you. Can only be used when your #cCombo Count is 30 or higher#.\n[Command: #cDown Arrow Key and Right Arrow Key + Attack Key#]\nRequired Skill: #cCombo Ability Lv. 1#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to soar through the air on mounts that can fly. While riding a mount with the ability to fly, press the Up Arrow and Jump keys to soar through the air.\nCosts 5 MP to activate.

string.name: desc
string.value:
[Master Level: 1]
Allows you to travel by riding a mount. 
If you have the #cSoaring (Mount)# skill, press the Up Arrow and the Jump keys to ascend. 
Consumes 5 MP when activated. 
Max Flight Time: #0 seconds#

string.name: desc
string.value: Imbued with the power of the morning moon, quickly charges toward and slash various enemies. Can attack a group of enemies repeatedly and recover Hayato's sword energy after use. Battoujutsu Zankou is not affected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Number of Rush Attacks: #attackCount, Enemies Hit: #mobCount. Able to do 2 or more rush attacks on the same enemy.\nHayato's sword energy recovers by #x upon use. Invincible during casting.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the Yuki-musume, a specter who wields intense cold. The Yuki-musume helps Kanna attack enemies. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: Mana Cost: #epCon, Yuki-musume Duration: #time sec. Yuki-musume assists Kanna, dealing #v% damage to #z enemies 6-8 times. When Yuki-musume is summoned, Kanna's mana consumption is reduced by #x% and #y% HP is recovered on every attack.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Beast Tamer's animal friends fully draw out their power to attack the enemy. The attack is determined by the animal friend that is currently selected upon casting the skill. After casting an attack, a special buff is applied to each animal.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon
Bear - picks up a big drum to attack #x enemies #y times, dealing #z% damage.
Snow Leopard - uses powerful claws to attack #w enemies #s times, dealing #v% damage. Thunder Trail effect applies.
Hawk - shoots feathers in a wide arc to attack #q enemies #s2 times, dealing #u% damage.
Cat - periodically attacks #u2 enemies #w2 times, dealing #v2% damage. Creates a tree for #time sec., which decreases damage taken by allies within range by #q2%.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Beast Tamer's animal friends fully draw out their power to attack the enemy. The attack is determined by the animal friend that is currently selected upon casting the skill. After casting an attack, a special buff is applied to each animal.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful singularity draws in enemies. Detonating the singularity inflicts significant damage across a wide area. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Draw in up to #mobCount enemies within range, stun them, and create a singularity which periodically deals #damage% damage. Number of Attacks: #x. Singularity Duration: #time sec. When the skill duration ends or the skill is used again, the singularity explodes, dealing #selfDestruction% AoE damage across a wide area #z time(s).\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Unleashes back-to-back Battoujutsu attacks as quick as the wind. Uses all 8 stages of attack during the time limit. 
1st Attack: Surging Blade
2nd Attack: Shouryuusen
3rd Attack: Rising Slash
4th Attack: Falcon Dive
5th Attack: Dankuusen
6th Attack: Sweeping Sword
7th Attack: Tornado Blade 
Final Attack: Sudden Strike
#cOnly learned skills will activate.# 
Damage and sword energy increased when using skills related to Battoujutsu. 
Required Skill: #cSurging Blade Lv. 1+ and Shouryuusen Lv. 1+#

string.name: desc
string.value: Gain understanding of the natural order of the spirit world to bolster the strength of mind and body.

string.name: desc
string.value: Haku the loveable fox demon joins you on your journey. Haku loves Kanna more than anything...except for cash mesos, that is.

string.name: h
string.value: Haku follows you around everywhere. EVERYWHERE.

string.name: desc
string.value: Traveling with the mystical creature Haku brings swiftness and good fortune.

string.name: h
string.value: Permanently increases #cSpeed by #psdSpeed# and #cLuck by #lukX#\nDepending on the amount of Potential and Bonus Potential INT, STR, DEX, and LUK of the Fan that Haku has equipped, Kanna's stats will also increase.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to attack enemies in front of you. Attacks can be linked up to the 3rd hit, and do not consume Mana.\n\c#cLv. 20+ required to learn the 2nd Job Advancement skill Shikigami Haunting 2#

string.name: h
string.value: [1st Hit]: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Attack Count: #attackCount\n[2nd Hit]: Damage: #u%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Attack Count: 2\n[3rd Hit]: Damage: #w%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Attack Count: 2

string.name: desc
string.value: Use your power as a Spirit Walker to teleport to a location of your choice via the currents of Mana.\nIf used while standing still, you will immediately teleport to a nearby Mana Vein that you've discovered. If used in a town, where the flow of Mana is murkier, you will be teleported to a random location.\nThis skill consumes Mana only when used in town.

string.name: h
string.value: [Normal Teleport] Press a directional key and the skill key together to teleport a horizontal distance of #x or a vertical distance of #y.\n[Mana Vein Teleport] Press the skill key #cwhen a Mana Vein is discovered# and you'll immediately jump to one of the discovered Mana Veins\n[Random Teleport] Press the skill key #cin town# to teleport to a random location. Mana Cost: 20

string.name: desc
string.value: When your target is defeated, its soul explodes, dealing additional damage to nearby enemies.

string.name: h
string.value: Hits enemies within a 150-pixel range of the defeated enemy. Max Enemies Hit: #c#mobCount#, #cDamage: #damage%#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Spirit Walker Skill]#
In-depth study has enhanced your Shikigami Haunting. Increases the attack power of Shikigami Haunting and the number of enemies hit. Has a chance of tossing a devil-destroying talisman to burn enemies and slow them down.
Required Skill: #Shikigami Haunting Lv. 20#
\c#cLv. 20 required to learn the 3rd Job Advancement skill 'Shikigami Haunting 3'#

string.name: h
string.value:
[1st Hit]: Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Attack Count: #attackCount
[2nd Hit]: Damage: #u%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 2
[3rd Hit]: Damage: #w%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Attack Count: 2
[Spirit Warding Charm]: Activation Chance: #prop%. Duration: #dotTime sec, Speed Reduced by 60%, Damage: #dot% per sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nHaku takes human form to fight by Kanna's side using Spirit Walker skills.\n\c#cLv. 10 required to learn the 4th Job Advancement skill 'Haku Perfected'#

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, Transformation Duration: #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
#c[Haku's Gift]#: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores #hp% of max HP. (Cooldown: #u sec)
#c[Foxfire]#: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for #w sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire absorbs the damage instead, then attacks back by exploding for #y% damage. (Cooldown: #z sec)
#c[Breath of the Unseen]#: Kanna's final damage increased by 3% for each party member (Always Applied).
#c[Haku's Blessing]#: Increases Magic ATT for you and your party members by #x% of the Magic ATT of the Fan Haku has equipped in Equip tab (Always Applied. To check the effect, mouse over the Fan being equipped)

string.name: desc
string.value: Brandish your fan in such a way that it resembles a peacock with its tailfeathers spread wide, increasing the attack speed of the fan by 2 levels.

string.name: h
string.value: Increases the #cAttack Speed by 2 levels# for #c#time sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to draw a large protective charm, attacking enemies and purging the area by calling forth a dark cloud that sears evil beings.

string.name: h
string.value: #cMP Cost: #epCon#. Summons a dark cloud. #cMax Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Count: #attackCount#, Duration: #c#time sec#. When enemies come in contact with the cloud, they receive #dot% damage every #dotInterval sec for #dotTime sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Haku Skill]#\nA flaming barrier of foxfire absorbs the damage that would otherwise hit Kanna, and counterattacks the attacker for #c#x% damage#.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Haku Skill]#\nHaku's Mana-saturated breath strengthens Kanna, granting more power for each party member it touches.\n#cFinal Damage: +#q%#

string.name: desc
string.value: Gain knowledge of a secret art that allows one to steal vitality from unclean souls while strengthening the body.

string.name: h
string.value: Restores #x% of Max HP for each enemy defeated. When attacking a boss enemy, restores 1% of Max HP every 4 sec.\nPermanently increases Status Resistance by #asrR%.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hone your skills as a Spirit Walker, enhancing your power to subdue unclean beings.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Spirit Walker Skill]#
Channels Kagutsuchi, the god of fire, to enhance Shikigami Haunting. Shikigami Haunting will have increased Attack Power, hit more times, and cover a wider range.
Required Skill: #cShikigami Haunting 2 Lv. 20#
#cLv. 20 required to learn the 4th Job Advancement skill 'Shikigami Haunting 4'#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nCalls forth the demons Hana and Yuki, who attack any enemies trapped between them. Permanently gain 10% more EXP.\n\c#cLv. 20 required to learn the 4th Job Advancement skill 'Nightghost Guide'#

string.name: h
string.value: Mana Cost: #epCon, Duration: #c#time sec#. Summons the demons Hana and Yuki.\nWhile summoned, the two demons ricochet an orb of energy between them to attack enemies caught in the crossfire. Max Enemies Hit: #c#mobCount#, Damage: #c#damage%#, Attack Count: #c#attackCount.#\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Barrier]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to create a Blossom Barrier, protecting yourself and members of your party. The barrier reduces damage from enemies' attacks by #x%, while also increasing Status Resistance by #y.\nWhen used on a Mana Vein, the barrier will absorb the vein's energy to enhance the barrier, as well as restore additional Mana for yourself while you stand within it.

string.name: h

string.name: h
string.value: Uses #c#hp%# of Max HP to immediately recover #c80 Mana#.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nGrants the chance to invoke a spirit when attacking that deals damage to enemies and curses them. Enemies cursed by the spirit yield additional EXP and have a greater chance of dropping higher quality equipment upon defeat. Also increases Knockback Resistance permanently.\nRequired Skill: #cKishin Shoukan Lv. 20#

string.name: desc

string.name: h
string.value:
Upgrades Haku Reborn. Haku takes human form for #time sec. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

Haku's Spirit Walker Skills
#c[Haku's Gift 2]#: When Kanna's HP is below 90%, restores #hp% of max HP. (Cooldown: 120 sec)
#c[Foxfire 2]#: Summons a barrier made up of 3 wisps of foxfire for #w sec. When Kanna is hit, the foxfire absorbs the damage instead, then retaliates by exploding for #y% damage. (Cooldown: 60 sec)
#c[Haku's Blessing 2]#: Increases Magic ATT for you and your party members by #x% of Magic ATT of the fan Haku has equipped. (Always Applied)
#c[Breath of the Unseen 2]#: Kanna's final damage increased by 5% for each party member. (Always Applied)

string.value: Teleports the Wondroid to the desired destination. You cannot send it #cbeyond the range of WonderLync#.\r\n[Usage: #cPress the skill button and click on the desired destination#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Picks up the Wondroid and throws it forward. You cannot throw it #cbeyond the range of WonderLync#.\r\n[Usage: #cPress, and then release the skill button.#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Picks up the Wondroid and throws it forward. You cannot throw it #cbeyond the range of WonderLync#.\r\n[Usage: #cPress, and then release the skill button.#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to leap forward. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'jump' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to stand still. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'stop' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to resume following. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'follow' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc
string.value: Commands the Wondroid to lay in a prone position. \r\n[Usage: #cType the command 'down' in the chat window#]

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Delivers a series of unbelievably swift strikes. Successful strikes grant a buff that stacks up to 5 times. #cUsable during Sanrenzan, Blade Flash, and Shinsoku.

string.name: h
string.value:
Sword Energy Cost: 200, Successful hits grant a buff adding +#w% Final Damage per stack for #time sec.
1st Hit: An attack that deals #x% damage to up to 15 enemies, 15 times, activated 2 times.
2nd Hit: An attack that deals #y% damage to up to 15 enemies, 15 times, activated 2 times.
3rd Hit: An attack that deals #z% damage to up to 15 enemies, 15 times, activated 2 times.
4th Hit: An attack that deals #q% damage to up to 15 enemies, 15 times, activated 2 times.
5th Hit: An attack that deals #q2% damage to up to 15 enemies, 15 times, activated 2 times.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a Spiritstone that amplifies the abilities of you and your party. It grows more powerful as it absorbe mana. The effects of Spirit's Domain do not stack.

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, Spiritstone Duration: #time sec
#c[Basic Effect]# Deals #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies within range #attackCount times every #attackDelay sec. Periodically restores #y% of Max HP/MP, Final Damage +#x%, Status Resistance +#w
The Spiritstone grows more powerful with every #z mana absorbed from the caster, boosting its Basic Effect up to 3x.
When the Spiritstone is at full power, party members within range gain 2 Attack Speed, and the mana cost of the caster's skills are reduced to 0.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon brave Sengoku heroes for aid, randomly summoning two. Each warrior performs a unique attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes HP for jobs that do not utilize MP. Summons two Sengoku warriors. Summon Duration: #time sec, Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

#c[Uesugi Kenshin]# Damage: #x%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: #w, Ignore Defense +#indieIgnoreMobpdpR%
#c[Tsuchimikado Haruaki]# Damage: #y%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: #v, Damage Taken -#indieDamReduceR%
#c[Ayame]# Damage: #z%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: #q, Critical Damage +#indieCD%
#c[Takeda Shingen]# Damage: #u%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Hits: #s, Attack Power +#indiePad, Magic ATT +#indieMad

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon brave Sengoku heroes for aid, randomly summoning two. Each warrior performs a unique attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon brave Sengoku heroes for aid, randomly summoning two. Each warrior performs a unique attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.value: Calls upon brave Sengoku heroes for aid, randomly summoning two. Each warrior performs a unique attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls upon brave Sengoku heroes for aid, randomly summoning two. Each warrior performs a unique attack. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls a herd of critter cubs to your aid. Summons 4 critter cubs in the caster's location upon using the skill while pressing down. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summon Duration: #time sec. Summons between #x and at most #y groups of critter cubs, depending on the number of enemies within range.
Cubs periodically attack 3 times dealing #damage% damage.
When time runs out the cubs attack, dealing #selfDestruction% damage to as many as #mobCount enemies #z times
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Calls down drones to blast your enemies with a graviton beam. Swap modes by pressing the skill key again after casting. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Summons drones for #time sec. The drones have two modes of operation, and you can switch between them every 3 sec. Drone attacks prioritize the enemy with the highest Max HP within range.
#c[Beam Splitter]# The drones hover above 4 targets within range, and fire downward periodically dealing #x% damage to up to 8 enemies 4 times.
#c[Beam Amplifier]# Drone hovers over 1 target within range and blasts downward periodically dealing #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect 1,000 of a given Elunarium ore to increase its level, up to a maximum of level 5. The higher its level, the greater its effects. Each different kind of ore levels separately and provides different stats.

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (ATT & M. ATT) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Attack Power & Magic ATT grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Attack Power: +#indiePad, Magic ATT: +#indieMad. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Skill EXP) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel the amount of EXP gained from using skills grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, EXP Bonus for Skill Use: +#indieExp%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Boss Damage) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Boss Damage grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Boss Damage: +#indieBDR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Ignore Enemy DEF) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Ignore Enemy DEF stat grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Enemy DEF Ignored: +#indieIgnoreMobpdpR%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec, MP Cost: #mpCon

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Crit Rate) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Critical Rate grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Critical Rate: +#indieCr%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Crit Damage) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Critical Damage grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Critical Damage: +#indieCD%. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (Status Resistance) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel your Status Resistance grow with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, Status Resistance: +#indieAsrR. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Elunarium (All Stats) increases in level for every 1,000 collected, up to level 5. Its effects are enhanced at higher levels. You can feel all of your stats grow proportionately with each level.

string.name: h
string.value: Duration: #time sec, All Stats: +#indieAllStat. Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: name
string.value: Battoujutsu Ultimate Will - God of Blades

string.name: desc
string.value: Releases the maximum amount of Sword Energy required to materialize the blade god. \nAbsorbs Sword Energy from the enemy, performs a final attack #cat the end of its duration or by using the skill again#, and restores your Sword Energy.\nUnaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
Sword Energy Cost: #s, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, Damage: #damage%, Attack Duration: #time sec., Sword Energy Absorbed: #u for each enemy defeated.
Deals #y% damage when attacking 1 enemy and absorbs #q Sword Energy per attack.
Before disappearing, deals a final blow that attacks up to 10 enemies #w time(s) for #selfDestruction% damage, #z time(s), and recovers Sword Energy. #cMax Sword Energy Recovered:# #v#
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Conjures a magic circle that releases spirits wrongfully sacrificed to perform evil spells. After 5 uses, you can call forth an even larger circle.
Unaffected by attack reflection.
You cannot summon the circle yourself. It is periodically activated when you use the following skills:
#cShikigami Haunting and Vanquisher's Charm#

string.name: h
string.value:
Mana Cost: #epCon, periodically summons a giant magic circle, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.
The magic circle will disappear either when it moves a certain distance or reaches the top of the map, and souls that deal #y% damage #z times to #x enemies will appear in up to #u locations.
The giant magic circle summons souls in up to #u2 locations.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Your animal friends zoom in on an airplane and attack the enemy mercilessly. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, periodically attacks #x times, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount\nRecovers #u HP for you and nearby allies and ignores abnormal status.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Summon fellow bounty hunters who teleport between monsters, attack enemies, and use an airship to deliver a finishing blow to your foes. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Summons fellow bounty hunters to attack enemies and mark any enemies that are not defeated, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Damage: #damage%, Number of Attacks: #attackCount.\nAttacks marked enemies with an airship for #u% damage #w times.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Summons a #cFlame Bird# who wants to help save the world. Summon the Flame Bird in a hunting ground where #cmonsters near your level# appear. Defeat monsters when the bird is near to acquire #cFlame Bird's determination#. It counts towards your determination count, and also charges the Flame Bird's Energy. When its Energy is full, use the skill once more to temporarily ride around on the Flame Bird and attack nearby enemies. 

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF.#
#cYou cannot summon the Flame Bird if you have already collected all the determination you can for the day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Sense and tap into the invisible flow of spiritual power through the forms of natural objects and the harmony of the energy around you.\n#c(The number of discovered Mana Veins will be displayed in the buff window.)#\nAlso increases Knockback Resistance permanently.

string.name: h
string.value:
Permanently gain Insight Lv. 30 and increase Knockback Resistance by #stanceProp%.
#cEvery #cooltime sec#, Kanna will discover a Mana Vein in the area when one of the skills below is used.
#c[1st-4th Skills] Shikigami Haunting 3rd Hit#
#c[2nd Skills] Exorcist's Charm, Shikigami Charm#
#c[4th Skill] Falling Sakura#
The spiritual energy of nature flows within the Mana Vein, allowing Kanna's Mana to recover even more quickly This effect stacks with MP recovery from other skills. #cUp to #x# Mana Veins can be active at one time.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nSummon the Ghost Yaksha Trainee and command it to attack and push back enemies.\n\c#cLv. 20+ required to learn the 2nd Job Advancement skill 'Ghost Yaksha Brother'#

string.name: h
string.value:
#cMana Cost: #epCon#, Duration: #c#time sec#. Summons the Ghost Yaksha Shikigami.
While summoned, the Ghost Yaksha repeatedly attacks #cup to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times#.
#cUse the skill again# while the Ghost Yaksha is summoned to instantly dismiss it, #cpulling in nearby enemies# to be hit for #selfDestruction% damage#.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores an additional #c#w# Mana every second. If a barrier is deployed here, an even stronger barrier can be created by absorbing the Mana Vein's energy.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to attack enemies in front of you.

string.name: h
string.value: [2nd Hit]: #cDamage: #damage%#, Max Enemies Hit: #c#mobCount#, Attack Count: #c#attackCount#

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to attack enemies in front of you.

string.name: h
string.value: [3rd Hit]: #cDamage: #damage%#, Max Enemies Hit: #c#mobCount#, Attack Count: #c#attackCount#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c[Shikigami Skill]#
Summon the dependable Ghost Yaksha Brother and command it to attack and push back enemies.
Required Skill: #cGhost Yaksha Trainee Lv. 20#
\c#cLv. 20+ required to learn the 3rd Job Advancement skill 'Ghost Yaksha Lieutenant'#

string.value: #c[Spirit Walker Skill]#\nUse your power as a Spirit Walker to focus Mana around your feet, flinging you backward and leaving behind a vortex. (You can use the directional keys to make slight adjustments to the direction you fly.)

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nCreate a large paper shikigami that looks just like Kanna. The Shikigami Charm receives a share of Kanna's Mana each time Mana is consumed, and once enough Mana has been accumulated, it will burn, damaging nearby enemies.\nCan be toggled #cOn/Off#.

string.name: h
string.value: When activated, begins to accumulate Mana each time Kanna consumes Mana. Once charged with #x Mana, this skill activates an attack that damages up to 8 enemies near Kanna, for #w% damage on each of 15 hits, #y time(s).\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.value: Summons a large totem that emits a mysterious energy.\nThe totem's energy attracts enemies on the map, reduces enemy respawn speed, and increases respawn amount.\nThis totem will disappear once you move maps.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time, applies all of the passive and buff skills with a few exceptions, regardless of the mode.\r\nHowever, only skills with SP invested will be maintained, and buffs will disappear regardless of the remaining duration when this buff ends.\r\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value: Display your masterful swordsmanship by slicing down your enemies in a single blinding flash. This skill can be activated even while using certain other skills.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon. Stab enemies for #damage% damage #z time(s). Number of Attacks: #attackCount. Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount. \nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Yaksha: Great Oni Lord's Legion

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nOpen a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself to visit his wrath upon the wretched. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cMana Cost: #epCon#, invincible during casting and disarmament
#cDuration: #time sec#. Open a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself.
If a 4th or below Ghost Yaksha is dismissed, sacrifice will be accumulated according to the amount of time the ghost was summoned. If the accumulated sacrifice reaches #c#u sec+#, the Great Lord can be summoned.
The Great Lord repeatedly attacks #cup to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s).#
Upon re-using the skill, the portal will immediately close, and the Great Lord will perform his final attack, which #cattacks up to #y enemies, for #w% damage, #x time(s).#
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Yaksha: Great Oni Lord's Legion

string.name: desc
string.value: #c[Shikigami Skill]#\nOpen a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself to visit his wrath upon the wretched. Unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value:
#cMana Cost: #epCon#, invincible during casting and disarmament
#cDuration: #time sec#. Open a portal to the underworld, calling forth the Great Lord himself.
If a 4th or below Ghost Yaksha is dismissed, sacrifice will be accumulated according to the amount of time the ghost was summoned. If the accumulated sacrifice reaches #c#u sec+#, the Great Lord can be summoned.
The Great Lord repeatedly attacks #cup to #mobCount enemies, for #damage% damage, #attackCount time(s)#.
Upon re-using the skill, the portal will immediately close, and the Great Lord will perform his final attack, which #cattacks up to #y enemies, for #w% damage, #x time(s)#.
#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: name
string.value: The Greatest Show on Maple World Is Coming!

string.name: desc
string.value: Come one, come all! Witness the greatest show this world has ever seen. You won't believe it, and you'll never forget it! Hey guys...? Boss...? Well, it looks like Arby is having fun, at least. What about you, Eka? Fort, that fool... Why is he working so hard? *Sigh*...\nAdditional Attack will be applied while the circus is maintained, and additional attacks will be unaffected by attack reflection.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Duration: #time sec. Forms an area of effect that attacks up to #z enemies for #x% damage, #y time(s), every #w sec. If the mode changes during buff duration, it activates a tag attack that attacks up to #s enemies, for #q% damage, #u time(s). Tag Attack Cooldown: #v sec\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.name: desc
string.value: Mount the Anti-Gravity Cycle SFF-X. While mounted, you'll be considered flying, meaning you won't be able to use certain skills.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Forms a protective shield, equivalent to #s% of max HP and immune to knockback, for #time sec. Final Damage: +#s2%\nIf you press the skill key again, you will launch an All-Out Barrage, attacking up to #z enemies for #x% damage #y time(s) per volley, numbering #q volley(s) in total. All-Out Barrage Cooldown: #q2 sec\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: desc
string.value:
Defeat monsters near your level to collect traces of Magic Fireworks for the festival!
Once the fireworks explode, and you defeat the surrounding monsters, you'll level up anywhere from 1-15 levels!
The higher your designer rank, the better your chances of leveling up more.
Note: The level-up effect occurs for #cLv. 131-199 characters# only.

string.name: h
string.value: Activates additional level-up effect, between 1-15 levels, based on the rate of your designer rank.\n\nEarn 5 Troupe Points every time you defeat an enemy.

string.name: desc
string.value:
You can enjoy a variety of rides at the #c<Ride Attractions># prepared by Spiegelmann, and earn a lot of EXP and EXP booster perks.
The effect increases based on your designer rank. 
#cBeginner: 110% / When fever activates: 120%
Junior: 130% / When fever activates: 140%
Senior: 150% / When fever activates: 160%
Veteran or higher: 170% / When fever activates: 180%#

The #c<Ride Attractions># will end when you have ridden 50 times in one day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: A certain amount of EXP is immediately awarded based on your designer rank, and then the EXP booster effect is activated.\n\n#cObtain 5 Troupe Points every time you defeat monsters.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enjoy a variety of #c<Ride Attractions># prepared by Spiegelmann, and earn a lot of EXP and EXP booster perks.
The effect increases based on your designer rank. The #c<Ride Attractions># will close when you have ridden them 30 times in one day.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: desc
string.value:
The EXP buff effect you receive on the #c<Ride Attractions># prepared by Spiegelmann.
The effect increases based on your designer rank.
#cBeginner: 110% / When fever activates: 120%
Junior: 130% / When fever activates: 140%
Senior: 150% / When fever activates: 160%
Veteran or higher: 170% / When fever activates: 180%#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Blast your way to new enhancement material items with Spiegelmann's special #c<Human Cannonball Attraction>#!
You'll gain special items based on the region you're playing in, such as Maple World, Arcane River, and Grandis (after Cernium), with even more items available at higher designer ranks.
You can fire off the #c<Human Cannonball Attraction>#, #cby using the skill key directly#, up to 30 times a day. When the date changes, your count will reset.

#cRight-click to turn ON/OFF#

string.name: h
string.value: Obtain various enhancement material items based on your designer rank and region.\n\n#cObtain 5 Troupe Points every time you defeat monsters#

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann prepared this magical #cStage 1 Festival Cannon# for beginner designers.\nCollect #cmagic bullet materials# by defeating enemies, then #cfire the cannon by using the skill key directly#.\nSince this cannon is a rough prototype, it'll fire #cSloppy Confetti Pieces#.

string.name: h
string.value: Activate this skill to fire #cSloppy Confetti Pieces#. Acquire those pieces to obtain various enhancement material items, based on your designer rank and region.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann prepared this magical #cStage 2 Festival Cannon# for junior designers.\nCollect #cmagic bullet materials# by defeating enemies, then #cfire the cannon by using the skill key directly#.\nSince this cannon is somewhat enhanced, it'll fire #cNormal Confetti Pieces#.

string.name: h
string.value: Activate this skill to fire #cNormal Confetti Pieces#. Acquire those pieces to obtain various enhancement material items, based on your designer rank and region.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann prepared this magical #cStage 3 Festival Cannon# for senior designers.\nCollect #cmagic bullet materials# by defeating enemies, then #cfire the cannon by using the skill key directly#.\nSince this cannon is enhanced, it'll fire #cFancy Confetti Pieces#.

string.name: h
string.value: Activate this skill to fire #cFancy Confetti Pieces#. Acquire those pieces to obtain various enhancement material items, based on your designer rank and region.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann prepared this magical #cStage 4 Festival Cannon# for veteran and master designers.\nCollect #cmagic bullet materials# by defeating enemies, then #cfire the cannon by using the skill key directly#.\nSince this cannon is greatly enhanced, it'll fire #cSpecial Confetti Pieces#.

string.name: h
string.value: Activate this skill to fire #cFancy Confetti Pieces#. Acquire those pieces to obtain various enhancement material items, based on your designer rank and region.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A special ability granted to the festival designer.

During the #cevent period#, All Stats, Attack Power & Magic ATT, Ignore Defense, Critical, Critical Damage, etc. increase.
The higher your #cfestival designer rank# (up to veteran rank), the stronger the stats.

string.name: h
string.value:
All Stats +#strX
Attack Power & Magic ATT +#padX
Ignore Defense +#ignoreMobpdpR%
Critical Rate +#cr%
Critical Damage +#criticaldamage%
